quran.ayah_en: And ˹beware of˺ the Day the wrongdoer will bite his nails ˹in regret˺ and say, “Oh! I wish I had followed the Way along with the Messenger!

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰوَيْلَتَىٰ لَيْتَنِى لَمْ أَتَّخِذْ فُلَانًا خَلِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Woe to me! I wish I had never taken so-and-so as a close friend.

quran.ayah_ar: لَّقَدْ أَضَلَّنِى عَنِ ٱلذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَآءَنِى ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ لِلْإِنسَٰنِ خَذُولًۭا
quran.ayah_en: It was he who truly made me stray from the Reminder after it had reached me.” And Satan has always betrayed humanity.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ هَٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مَهْجُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: The Messenger has cried, “O my Lord! My people have indeed received this Quran with neglect.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِىٍّ عَدُوًّۭا مِّنَ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيًۭا وَنَصِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Similarly, We made enemies for every prophet from among the wicked, but sufficient is your Lord as a Guide and Helper.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ جُمْلَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَ ۖ وَرَتَّلْنَٰهُ تَرْتِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: The disbelievers say, “If only the Quran had been sent down to him all at once!” ˹We have sent it˺ as such ˹in stages˺ so We may reassure your heart with it. And We have revealed it at a deliberate pace.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا يَأْتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئْنَٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَحْسَنَ تَفْسِيرًا
quran.ayah_en: Whenever they bring you an argument, We come to you with the right refutation and the best explanation.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُحْشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ شَرٌّۭ مَّكَانًۭا وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Those who will be dragged into Hell on their faces will be in the worst place, and are ˹now˺ farthest from the ˹Right˺ Way.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلْنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ وَزِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: We certainly gave Moses the Book and appointed his brother Aaron as his helper.

quran.ayah_ar: فَقُلْنَا ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرْنَٰهُمْ تَدْمِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: We had ordered ˹them˺, “Go to the people who would deny Our signs.” Then We annihilated the deniers entirely.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍۢ لَّمَّا كَذَّبُوا۟ ٱلرُّسُلَ أَغْرَقْنَٰهُمْ وَجَعَلْنَٰهُمْ لِلنَّاسِ ءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا
quran.ayah_en: And when the people of Noah rejected the messengers, We drowned them, making them an example to humanity. And We have prepared a painful punishment for the wrongdoers.

quran.ayah_ar: وَعَادًۭا وَثَمُودَا۟ وَأَصْحَٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونًۢا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Also ˹We destroyed˺ ’Ȃd, Thamûd, and the people of the Water-pit, as well as many peoples in between.

quran.ayah_ar: وَكُلًّۭا ضَرَبْنَا لَهُ ٱلْأَمْثَٰلَ ۖ وَكُلًّۭا تَبَّرْنَا تَتْبِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: For each We set forth ˹various˺ lessons, and We ultimately destroyed each.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَى ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِىٓ أُمْطِرَتْ مَطَرَ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۚ أَفَلَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَرَوْنَهَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ نُشُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: They have certainly passed by the city ˹of Sodom˺, which had been showered with a dreadful rain ˹of stones˺. Have they not seen its ruins? But they do not expect to be resurrected.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوْكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا
quran.ayah_en: When they see you ˹O Prophet˺, they only make fun of you, ˹saying,˺ “Is this the one that Allah has sent as a messenger?

quran.ayah_ar: إِن كَادَ لَيُضِلُّنَا عَنْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لَوْلَآ أَن صَبَرْنَا عَلَيْهَا ۚ وَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ حِينَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْعَذَابَ مَنْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: He would have almost tricked us away from our gods, had we not been so devoted to them.” ˹But˺ soon they will know, when they face the punishment, who is far astray from the ˹Right˺ Way.

quran.ayah_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ أَفَأَنتَ تَكُونُ عَلَيْهِ وَكِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: Have you seen ˹O Prophet˺ the one who has taken their own desires as their god? Will you then be a keeper over them?

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ تَحْسَبُ أَنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ يَسْمَعُونَ أَوْ يَعْقِلُونَ ۚ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا كَٱلْأَنْعَٰمِ ۖ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: Or do you think that most of them listen or understand?

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيْفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوْ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنًۭا ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَا ٱلشَّمْسَ عَلَيْهِ دَلِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Have you not seen how your Lord extends the shade—He could have simply made it ˹remain˺ still if He so willed—then We make the sun its guide,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ قَبَضْنَٰهُ إِلَيْنَا قَبْضًۭا يَسِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: causing the shade to retreat gradually?

quran.ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًۭا وَٱلنَّوْمَ سُبَاتًۭا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: He is the One Who has made the night for you as a cover, and ˹made˺ sleep for resting, and the day for rising.

quran.ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ طَهُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: And He is the One Who sends the winds ushering in His mercy, and We send down pure rain from the sky,

quran.ayah_ar: لِّنُحْۦِىَ بِهِۦ بَلْدَةًۭ مَّيْتًۭا وَنُسْقِيَهُۥ مِمَّا خَلَقْنَآ أَنْعَٰمًۭا وَأَنَاسِىَّ كَثِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: giving life to a lifeless land, and providing water for countless animals and humans of Our Own creation.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَٰهُ بَيْنَهُمْ لِيَذَّكَّرُوا۟ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: We certainly disperse it among them so they may be mindful, but most people persist in ungratefulness.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَبَعَثْنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍۢ نَّذِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Had We willed, We could have easily sent a warner to every society.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدْهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادًۭا كَبِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: So do not yield to the disbelievers, but strive diligently against them with this ˹Quran˺.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ هَٰذَا عَذْبٌۭ فُرَاتٌۭ وَهَٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌۭ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخًۭا وَحِجْرًۭا مَّحْجُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: And He is the One Who merges the two bodies of water: one fresh and palatable and the other salty and bitter, placing between them a barrier they cannot cross.

quran.ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ بَشَرًۭا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبًۭا وَصِهْرًۭا ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: And He is the One Who creates human beings from a ˹humble˺ liquid, then establishes for them bonds of kinship and marriage. For your Lord is Most Capable.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمْ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلْكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Yet they worship besides Allah what can neither benefit nor harm them. And the disbeliever always collaborates against their Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَٰكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرًۭا وَنَذِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: And We have sent you ˹O Prophet˺ only as a deliverer of good news and a warner.

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Say, “I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹message˺, but whoever wishes, let them pursue the Way to their Lord.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْحَىِّ ٱلَّذِى لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِهِۦ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًا
quran.ayah_en: Put your trust in the Ever-Living, Who never dies, and glorify His praises. Sufficient is He as All-Aware of the sins of His servants.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍۢ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۚ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ فَسْـَٔلْ بِهِۦ خَبِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹He is˺ the One Who created the heavens and the earth and everything in between in six Days, then established Himself on the Throne. ˹He is˺ the Most Compassionate! Ask ˹none other than˺ the All-Knowledgeable about Himself.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلرَّحْمَٰنِ قَالُوا۟ وَمَا ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ أَنَسْجُدُ لِمَا تَأْمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمْ نُفُورًۭا ۩
quran.ayah_en: When it is said to them, “Prostrate to the Most Compassionate,” they ask ˹in disgust˺, “What is ‘the Most Compassionate’? Will we prostrate to whatever you order us to?” And it only drives them farther away.

quran.ayah_ar: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًۭا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجًۭا وَقَمَرًۭا مُّنِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Blessed is the One Who has placed constellations in the sky, as well as a ˹radiant˺ lamp and a luminous moon.

quran.ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ خِلْفَةًۭ لِّمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَوْ أَرَادَ شُكُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: And He is the One Who causes the day and the night to alternate, ˹as a sign˺ for whoever desires to be mindful or to be grateful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ هَوْنًۭا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلْجَٰهِلُونَ قَالُوا۟ سَلَٰمًۭا
quran.ayah_en: The ˹true˺ servants of the Most Compassionate are those who walk on the earth humbly, and when the foolish address them ˹improperly˺, they only respond with peace.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَبِيتُونَ لِرَبِّهِمْ سُجَّدًۭا وَقِيَٰمًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹They are˺ those who spend ˹a good portion of˺ the night, prostrating themselves and standing before their Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
quran.ayah_en: ˹They are˺ those who pray, “Our Lord! Keep the punishment of Hell away from us, for its punishment is indeed unrelenting.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا سَآءَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّۭا وَمُقَامًۭا
quran.ayah_en: It is certainly an evil place to settle and reside.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَنفَقُوا۟ لَمْ يُسْرِفُوا۟ وَلَمْ يَقْتُرُوا۟ وَكَانَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹They are˺ those who spend neither wastefully nor stingily, but moderately in between.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدْعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقْتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفْسَ ٱلَّتِى حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا يَزْنُونَ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ يَلْقَ أَثَامًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹They are˺ those who do not invoke any other god besides Allah, nor take a ˹human˺ life—made sacred by Allah—except with ˹legal˺ right, nor commit fornication. And whoever does ˹any of˺ this will face the penalty.

quran.ayah_ar: يُضَٰعَفْ لَهُ ٱلْعَذَابُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ وَيَخْلُدْ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا
quran.ayah_en: Their punishment will be multiplied on the Day of Judgment, and they will remain in it forever, in disgrace.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًۭا صَٰلِحًۭا فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ حَسَنَٰتٍۢ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
quran.ayah_en: As for those who repent, believe, and do good deeds, they are the ones whose evil deeds Allah will change into good deeds. For Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحًۭا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابًۭا
quran.ayah_en: And whoever repents and does good has truly turned to Allah properly.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشْهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِٱللَّغْوِ مَرُّوا۟ كِرَامًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹They are˺ those who do not bear false witness, and when they come across falsehood, they pass ˹it˺ by with dignity.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَمْ يَخِرُّوا۟ عَلَيْهَا صُمًّۭا وَعُمْيَانًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹They are˺ those who, when reminded of the revelation of their Lord, do not turn a blind eye or a deaf ear to it.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍۢ وَٱجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
quran.ayah_en: ˹They are˺ those who pray, “Our Lord! Bless us with ˹pious˺ spouses and offspring who will be the joy of our hearts, and make us models for the righteous.”

quran.ayah_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ يُجْزَوْنَ ٱلْغُرْفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ وَيُلَقَّوْنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةًۭ وَسَلَٰمًا
quran.ayah_en: It is they who will be rewarded with ˹elevated˺ mansions ˹in Paradise˺ for their perseverance, and will be received with salutations and ˹greetings of˺ peace,

quran.ayah_ar: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ حَسُنَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّۭا وَمُقَامًۭا
quran.ayah_en: staying there forever. What an excellent place to settle and reside!

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ مَا يَعْبَؤُا۟ بِكُمْ رَبِّى لَوْلَا دُعَآؤُكُمْ ۖ فَقَدْ كَذَّبْتُمْ فَسَوْفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامًۢا
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “You ˹all˺ would not ˹even˺ matter to my Lord were it not for your faith ˹in Him˺. But now you ˹disbelievers˺ have denied ˹the truth˺, so the torment is bound to come.”

quran.ayah_ar: طسٓمٓ
quran.ayah_en: Ṭa-Sĩn-Mĩm.

quran.ayah_ar: تِلْكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
quran.ayah_en: These are the verses of the clear Book.

quran.ayah_ar: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٌۭ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Perhaps you ˹O Prophet˺ will grieve yourself to death over their disbelief.

quran.ayah_ar: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةًۭ فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَٰقُهُمْ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ
quran.ayah_en: If We willed, We could send down upon them a ˹compelling˺ sign from the heavens, leaving their necks bent in ˹utter˺ submission to it.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Whatever new reminder comes to them from the Most Compassionate, they always turn away from it.

quran.ayah_ar: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They have certainly denied ˹the truth˺, so they will soon face the consequences of their ridicule.

quran.ayah_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۢ كَرِيمٍ
quran.ayah_en: Have they failed to look at the earth, ˹to see˺ how many types of fine plants We have caused to grow in it?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Remember˺ when your Lord called out to Moses, “Go to the wrongdoing people—

quran.ayah_ar: قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ أَلَا يَتَّقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: the people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear ˹Allah˺?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
quran.ayah_en: He replied, “My Lord! I fear that they will reject me.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِى وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِى فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَٰرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And ˹so˺ my heart will be broken and my tongue will be tied. So send Aaron along ˹as a messenger˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَهُمْ عَلَىَّ ذَنۢبٌۭ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ
quran.ayah_en: Also, they have a charge against me, so I fear they may kill me.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ فَٱذْهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Allah responded, “Certainly not! So go, both of you, with Our signs. We will be with you, listening.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Go to Pharaoh and say, ‘We are messengers from the Lord of all worlds,

quran.ayah_ar: أَنْ أَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹commanded to say:˺ ‘Let the Children of Israel go with us.’’”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًۭا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Pharaoh protested, “Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you stayed several years of your life in our care?

quran.ayah_ar: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِى فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then you did what you did, being ˹utterly˺ ungrateful!”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًۭا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
quran.ayah_en: Moses replied, “I did it then, lacking guidance.

quran.ayah_ar: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًۭا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and made me one of the messengers.

quran.ayah_ar: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌۭ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَىَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
quran.ayah_en: How can that be a ‘favour,’ of which you remind me, when ˹it was only because˺ you ˹have˺ enslaved the Children of Israel?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَا رَبُّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Pharaoh asked, “And what is ‘the Lord of all worlds’?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Moses replied, “˹He is˺ the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, if only you had sure faith.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ لِمَنْ حَوْلَهُۥٓ أَلَا تَسْتَمِعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Pharaoh said to those around him, “Did you hear ˹what he said˺?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Moses added, “˹He is˺ your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Pharaoh said ˹mockingly˺, “Your messenger, who has been sent to you, must be insane.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Moses responded: “˹He is˺ the Lord of the east and west, and everything in between, if only you had any sense.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذْتَ إِلَٰهًا غَيْرِى لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Pharaoh threatened, “If you take any other god besides me, I will certainly have you imprisoned.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ أَوَلَوْ جِئْتُكَ بِشَىْءٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Moses responded, “Even if I bring you a clear proof?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Pharaoh demanded, “Bring it then, if what you say is true.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: So he threw down his staff and—behold!—it became a real snake.

quran.ayah_ar: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then he drew his hand ˹out of his collar˺ and it was ˹shining˺ white for all to see.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Pharaoh said to the chiefs around him, “He is indeed a skilled magician,

quran.ayah_ar: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: who seeks to drive you from your land by his magic. So what do you propose?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبْعَثْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They replied, “Let him and his brother wait and dispatch mobilizers to all cities

quran.ayah_ar: يَأْتُوكَ بِكُلِّ سَحَّارٍ عَلِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: to bring you every skilled magician.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَجُمِعَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ لِمِيقَٰتِ يَوْمٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: So the magicians were assembled at the set time on the appointed day.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقِيلَ لِلنَّاسِ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّجْتَمِعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And the people were asked, “Will you join the gathering,

quran.ayah_ar: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَٰلِبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: so that we may follow the magicians if they prevail?”

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا۟ لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَٰلِبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: When the magicians came, they asked Pharaoh, “Shall we have a ˹suitable˺ reward if we prevail?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًۭا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: He replied, “Yes, and you will then certainly be among those closest to me.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Moses said to them, “Cast whatever you wish to cast.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَٰلِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: So they cast down their ropes and staffs, saying, “By Pharaoh’s might, it is we who will surely prevail.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Then Moses threw down his staff, and—behold!—it devoured the objects of their illusion!

quran.ayah_ar: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سَٰجِدِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So the magicians fell down, prostrating.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They declared, “We ˹now˺ believe in the Lord of all worlds—

quran.ayah_ar: رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: the Lord of Moses and Aaron.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَٰفٍۢ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Pharaoh threatened, “How dare you believe in him before I give you permission? He must be your master who taught you magic, but soon you will see. I will certainly cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides, then crucify you all.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ لَا ضَيْرَ ۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They responded, “˹That would be˺ no harm! Surely to our Lord we will ˹all˺ return.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We really hope that our Lord will forgive our sins, as we are the first to believe.”

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِىٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And We inspired Moses, ˹saying,˺ “Leave with My servants at night, for you will surely be pursued.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَرْسَلَ فِرْعَوْنُ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then Pharaoh sent mobilizers to all cities,

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَشِرْذِمَةٌۭ قَلِيلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹and said,˺ “These ˹outcasts˺ are just a handful of people,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُمْ لَنَا لَغَآئِظُونَ
quran.ayah_en: who have really enraged us,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّا لَجَمِيعٌ حَٰذِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: but we are all on the alert.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَخْرَجْنَٰهُم مِّن جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: So We lured the tyrants out of ˹their˺ gardens, springs,

quran.ayah_ar: وَكُنُوزٍۢ وَمَقَامٍۢ كَرِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: treasures, and splendid residences.

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ وَأَوْرَثْنَٰهَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
quran.ayah_en: So it was. And We awarded it ˹all˺ to the Children of Israel.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَتْبَعُوهُم مُّشْرِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And so they pursued them at sunrise.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ
quran.ayah_en: When the two groups came face to face, the companions of Moses cried out, “We are overtaken for sure.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
quran.ayah_en: Moses reassured ˹them˺, “Absolutely not! My Lord is certainly with me—He will guide me.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ ۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍۢ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: So We inspired Moses: “Strike the sea with your staff,” and the sea was split, each part was like a huge mountain.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَزْلَفْنَا ثَمَّ ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We drew the pursuers to that place,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنجَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and delivered Moses and those with him all together.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then We drowned the others.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
quran.ayah_en: Relate to them ˹O Prophet˺ the story of Abraham,

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: when he questioned his father and his people, “What is that you worship ˹besides Allah˺?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًۭا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They replied, “We worship idols, to which we are fully devoted.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ هَلْ يَسْمَعُونَكُمْ إِذْ تَدْعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Abraham asked, “Can they hear you when you call upon them?

quran.ayah_ar: أَوْ يَنفَعُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَضُرُّونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or can they benefit or harm you?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They replied, “No! But we found our forefathers doing the same.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Abraham responded, “Have you ˹really˺ considered what you have been worshipping—

quran.ayah_ar: أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُمُ ٱلْأَقْدَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: you and your ancestors?

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّۭ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They are ˹all˺ enemies to me, except the Lord of all worlds.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَنِى فَهُوَ يَهْدِينِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹He is˺ the One Who created me, and He ˹alone˺ guides me.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِى هُوَ يُطْعِمُنِى وَيَسْقِينِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹He is˺ the One Who provides me with food and drink.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا مَرِضْتُ فَهُوَ يَشْفِينِ
quran.ayah_en: And He ˹alone˺ heals me when I am sick.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِى يُمِيتُنِى ثُمَّ يُحْيِينِ
quran.ayah_en: And He ˹is the One Who˺ will cause me to die, and then bring me back to life.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: And He is ˹the One˺ Who, I hope, will forgive my flaws on Judgment Day.”

quran.ayah_ar: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًۭا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
quran.ayah_en: “My Lord! Grant me wisdom, and join me with the righteous.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍۢ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Bless me with honourable mention among later generations.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱجْعَلْنِى مِن وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: Make me one of those awarded the Garden of Bliss.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱغْفِرْ لِأَبِىٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
quran.ayah_en: Forgive my father, for he is certainly one of the misguided.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا تُخْزِنِى يَوْمَ يُبْعَثُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And do not disgrace me on the Day all will be resurrected—

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌۭ وَلَا بَنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: the Day when neither wealth nor children will be of any benefit.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍۢ سَلِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Only those who come before Allah with a pure heart ˹will be saved˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹On that Day˺ Paradise will be brought near to the God-fearing,

quran.ayah_ar: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِلْغَاوِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and the Hellfire will be displayed to the deviant.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And it will be said to them, “Where are those you used to worship

quran.ayah_ar: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: besides Allah? Can they help you or even help themselves?”

quran.ayah_ar: فَكُبْكِبُوا۟ فِيهَا هُمْ وَٱلْغَاوُۥنَ
quran.ayah_en: Then the idols will be hurled headlong into Hell, along with the deviant

quran.ayah_ar: وَجُنُودُ إِبْلِيسَ أَجْمَعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and the soldiers of Iblis, all together.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ وَهُمْ فِيهَا يَخْتَصِمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: There the deviant will cry while disputing with their idols,

quran.ayah_ar: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
quran.ayah_en: “By Allah! We were clearly mistaken,

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ نُسَوِّيكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: when we made you equal to the Lord of all worlds.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَضَلَّنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And none led us astray other than the wicked.

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَا لَنَا مِن شَٰفِعِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Now we have none to intercede for us,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا صَدِيقٍ حَمِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: nor a close friend.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةًۭ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: If only we could have a second chance, then we would be believers.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: The people of Noah rejected the messengers

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: when their brother Noah said to them, “Will you not fear ˹Allah˺?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: I am truly a trustworthy messenger to you.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
quran.ayah_en: So fear Allah, and obey me.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹message˺. My reward is only from the Lord of all worlds.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
quran.ayah_en: So fear Allah, and obey me.”

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لَكَ وَٱتَّبَعَكَ ٱلْأَرْذَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They argued, “How can we believe in you, when you are followed ˹only˺ by the lowest of the low?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِى بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: He responded, “And what knowledge do I have of what they do?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّى ۖ لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Their judgment is with my Lord, if you had any sense!

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِطَارِدِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: I am not going to expel the believers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنْ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: I am only sent with a clear warning.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَرْجُومِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They threatened, “If you do not desist, O  Noah, you will surely be stoned ˹to death˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى كَذَّبُونِ
quran.ayah_en: Noah prayed, “My Lord! My people have truly rejected me.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱفْتَحْ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًۭا وَنَجِّنِى وَمَن مَّعِىَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So judge between me and them decisively, and save me and the believers with me.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَنجَيْنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
quran.ayah_en: So We saved him and those with him in the fully loaded Ark.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا بَعْدُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then afterwards We drowned the rest.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: The people of ’ad rejected the messengers

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: when their brother Hûd said to them, “Will you not fear ˹Allah˺?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: I am truly a trustworthy messenger to you.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
quran.ayah_en: So fear Allah, and obey me.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹message˺. My reward is only from the Lord of all worlds.

quran.ayah_ar: أَتَبْنُونَ بِكُلِّ رِيعٍ ءَايَةًۭ تَعْبَثُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Why˺ do you build a landmark on every high place in vanity,

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَتَّخِذُونَ مَصَانِعَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَخْلُدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and construct castles, as if you are going to live forever,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا بَطَشْتُم بَطَشْتُمْ جَبَّارِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and act so viciously when you attack ˹others˺?

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
quran.ayah_en: So fear Allah, and obey me.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَمَدَّكُم بِمَا تَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Fear the One Who has provided you with ˹the good˺ things you know:

quran.ayah_ar: أَمَدَّكُم بِأَنْعَٰمٍۢ وَبَنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: He provided you with cattle, and children,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَنَّٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍ
quran.ayah_en: and gardens, and springs.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: I truly fear for you the torment of a tremendous day.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْوَٰعِظِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They responded, “It is all the same to us whether you warn ˹us˺ or not.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا خُلُقُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: This is simply the tradition of our predecessors.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And we will never be punished.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَٰهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So they rejected him, and ˹so˺ We destroyed them. Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: The people of Thamûd rejected the messengers

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: when their brother salih said to them, “Will you not fear ˹Allah˺?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: I am truly a trustworthy messenger to you.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
quran.ayah_en: So fear Allah, and obey me.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹message˺. My reward is only from the Lord of all worlds.

quran.ayah_ar: أَتُتْرَكُونَ فِى مَا هَٰهُنَآ ءَامِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Do you think you will be ˹forever˺ left secure in what you have here:

quran.ayah_ar: فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: amid gardens and springs,

quran.ayah_ar: وَزُرُوعٍۢ وَنَخْلٍۢ طَلْعُهَا هَضِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹various˺ crops, and palm trees ˹loaded˺ with tender fruit;

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًۭا فَٰرِهِينَ
quran.ayah_en: to carve homes in the mountains with great skill?

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
quran.ayah_en: So fear Allah, and obey me.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا تُطِيعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And do not follow the command of the transgressors,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
quran.ayah_en: who spread corruption throughout the land, never setting things right.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَحَّرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They replied, “You are simply bewitched!

quran.ayah_ar: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌۭ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: You are only a human being like us, so bring forth a sign if what you say is true.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٌۭ لَّهَا شِرْبٌۭ وَلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: salih said, “Here is a camel. She will have her turn to drink as you have yours, each on an appointed day.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍۢ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And do not ever touch her with harm, or you will be overtaken by the torment of a tremendous day.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ نَٰدِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: But they killed her, becoming regretful.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So the punishment overtook them. Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: The people of Lot rejected the messengers

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: when their brother Lot said to them, “Will you not fear ˹Allah˺?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: I am truly a trustworthy messenger to you.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
quran.ayah_en: So fear Allah, and obey me.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹message˺. My reward is only from the Lord of all worlds.

quran.ayah_ar: أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلذُّكْرَانَ مِنَ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Why do you ˹men˺ lust after fellow men,

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُونَ
quran.ayah_en: leaving the wives that your Lord has created for you? In fact, you are a transgressing people.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْرَجِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They threatened, “If you do not desist, O  Lot, you will surely be expelled.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ إِنِّى لِعَمَلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلْقَالِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Lot responded, “I am truly one of those who despise your ˹shameful˺ practice.

quran.ayah_ar: رَبِّ نَجِّنِى وَأَهْلِى مِمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: My Lord! Save me and my family from ˹the consequences of˺ what they do.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَنَجَّيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So We saved him and all of his family,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا عَجُوزًۭا فِى ٱلْغَٰبِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: except an old woman, who was one of the doomed.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then We utterly destroyed the rest,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًۭا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: pouring upon them a rain ˹of brimstone˺. How evil was the rain of those who had been warned!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَ أَصْحَٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: The residents of the Forest rejected the messengers

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: when Shu’aib said to them, “Will you not fear ˹Allah˺?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: I am truly a trustworthy messenger to you.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
quran.ayah_en: So fear Allah, and obey me.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹message˺. My reward is only from the Lord of all worlds.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ أَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْسِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Give full measure, and cause no loss ˹to others˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَزِنُوا۟ بِٱلْقِسْطَاسِ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: Weigh with an even balance,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and do not defraud people of their property. Nor go about spreading corruption in the land.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ وَٱلْجِبِلَّةَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And fear the One Who created you and ˹all˺ earlier peoples.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَحَّرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They replied, “You are simply bewitched!

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌۭ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْكَٰذِبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Also, you are only a human being like us, and we think you are indeed a liar.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So cause ˹deadly˺ pieces of the sky to fall upon us, if what you say is true.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّىٓ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Shu’aib responded, “My Lord knows best whatever you do.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
quran.ayah_en: So they rejected him, and ˹so˺ were overtaken by the torment of the day of the ˹deadly˺ cloud. That was really a torment of a tremendous day.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَنزِيلُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: This is certainly a revelation from the Lord of all worlds,

quran.ayah_ar: نَزَلَ بِهِ ٱلرُّوحُ ٱلْأَمِينُ
quran.ayah_en: which the trustworthy spirit ˹Gabriel˺ brought down

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنذِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: into your heart ˹O Prophet˺—so that you may be one of the warners—

quran.ayah_ar: بِلِسَانٍ عَرَبِىٍّۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: in a clear Arabic tongue.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَفِى زُبُرِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And it has indeed been ˹foretold˺ in the Scriptures of those before.

quran.ayah_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ ءَايَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَٰٓؤُا۟ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
quran.ayah_en: Was it not sufficient proof for the deniers that it has been recognized by the knowledgeable among the Children of Israel?

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَوْ نَزَّلْنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ بَعْضِ ٱلْأَعْجَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Had We revealed it to a non-Arab,

quran.ayah_ar: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: who would then recite it to the deniers ˹in fluent Arabic˺, still they would not have believed in it!

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ سَلَكْنَٰهُ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: This is how We allow denial ˹to steep˺ into the hearts of the wicked.

quran.ayah_ar: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
quran.ayah_en: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment,

quran.ayah_ar: فَيَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةًۭ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: which will take them by surprise when they least expect ˹it˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَيَقُولُوا۟ هَلْ نَحْنُ مُنظَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Then they will cry, “Can we be allowed more time?”

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Do they ˹really˺ seek to hasten Our torment?

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَرَءَيْتَ إِن مَّتَّعْنَٰهُمْ سِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Imagine ˹O Prophet˺ if We allowed them enjoyment for years,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ جَآءَهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: then there came to them what they had been threatened with:

quran.ayah_ar: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُمَتَّعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: would that enjoyment be of any benefit to them ˹at all˺?

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: We have never destroyed a society without warners

quran.ayah_ar: ذِكْرَىٰ وَمَا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: to remind ˹them˺, for We would never wrong ˹anyone˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا تَنَزَّلَتْ بِهِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ
quran.ayah_en: It was not the devils who brought this ˹Quran˺ down:

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُمْ وَمَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: it is not for them ˹to do so˺, nor can they,

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّمْعِ لَمَعْزُولُونَ
quran.ayah_en: for they are strictly barred from ˹even˺ overhearing ˹it˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So do not ever call upon any other god besides Allah, or you will be one of the punished.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنذِرْ عَشِيرَتَكَ ٱلْأَقْرَبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And warn ˹all, starting with˺ your closest relatives,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and be gracious to the believers who follow you.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌۭ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: But if they disobey you, say, “I am certainly free of what you do.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: Put your trust in the Almighty, Most Merciful,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى يَرَىٰكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
quran.ayah_en: Who sees you when you rise ˹for prayer at night˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَقَلُّبَكَ فِى ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
quran.ayah_en: as well as your movements ˹in prayer˺ along with ˹fellow˺ worshippers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: He ˹alone˺ is indeed the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

quran.ayah_ar: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ
quran.ayah_en: Shall I inform you of whom the devils ˹actually˺ descend upon?

quran.ayah_ar: تَنَزَّلُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: They descend upon every sinful liar,

quran.ayah_ar: يُلْقُونَ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ كَٰذِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: who gives an ˹attentive˺ ear ˹to half-truths˺, mostly passing on sheer lies.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلشُّعَرَآءُ يَتَّبِعُهُمُ ٱلْغَاوُۥنَ
quran.ayah_en: As for poets, they are followed ˹merely˺ by deviants.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍۢ يَهِيمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Do you not see how they rant in every field,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُمْ يَقُولُونَ مَا لَا يَفْعَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: only saying what they never do?

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًۭا وَٱنتَصَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَىَّ مُنقَلَبٍۢ يَنقَلِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Except those who believe, do good, remember Allah often, and ˹poetically˺ avenge ˹the believers˺ after being wrongfully slandered. The wrongdoers will come to know what ˹evil˺ end they will meet.

quran.ayah_ar: طسٓ ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ وَكِتَابٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
quran.ayah_en: Ṭa-Sĩn. These are the verses of the Quran; the clear Book.

quran.ayah_ar: هُدًۭى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹It is˺ a guide and good news for the believers:

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹those˺ who establish prayer, pay alms-tax, and have sure faith in the Hereafter.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمْ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ فَهُمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
quran.ayah_en: As for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have certainly made their ˹evil˺ deeds appealing to them, so they wander blindly.

quran.ayah_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ ٱلْعَذَابِ وَهُمْ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: It is they who will suffer a dreadful torment, and in the Hereafter they will ˹truly˺ be the greatest losers.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ
quran.ayah_en: And indeed, you ˹O Prophet˺ are receiving the Quran from the One ˹Who is˺ All-Wise, All-Knowing.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهْلِهِۦٓ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًۭا سَـَٔاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوْ ءَاتِيكُم بِشِهَابٍۢ قَبَسٍۢ لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَصْطَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Remember˺ when Moses said to his family, “I have spotted a fire. I will either bring you some directions from there, or a burning torch so you may warm yourselves.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِىَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَسُبْحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: But when he came to it, he was called ˹by Allah˺, “Blessed is the one at the fire, and whoever is around it! Glory be to Allah, the Lord of all worlds.

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: O  Moses! It is truly I. I am Allah—the Almighty, All-Wise.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَلْقِ عَصَاكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهْتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنٌّۭ وَلَّىٰ مُدْبِرًۭا وَلَمْ يُعَقِّبْ ۚ يَٰمُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفْ إِنِّى لَا يَخَافُ لَدَىَّ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Now, throw down your staff!” But when he saw it slithering like a snake, he ran away without looking back. ˹Allah reassured him,˺ “O Moses! Do not be afraid! Messengers should have no fear in My presence.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسْنًۢا بَعْدَ سُوٓءٍۢ فَإِنِّى غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Fear is˺ only for those who do wrong. But if they later mend ˹their˺ evil ˹ways˺ with good, then I am certainly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَدْخِلْ يَدَكَ فِى جَيْبِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍۢ ۖ فِى تِسْعِ ءَايَٰتٍ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۭا فَٰسِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Now put your hand through ˹the opening of˺ your collar, it will come out ˹shining˺ white, unblemished. They have truly been a rebellious people.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَٰتُنَا مُبْصِرَةًۭ قَالُوا۟ هَٰذَا سِحْرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: But when Our enlightening signs came to them, they said, “This is pure magic.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَحَدُوا۟ بِهَا وَٱسْتَيْقَنَتْهَآ أَنفُسُهُمْ ظُلْمًۭا وَعُلُوًّۭا ۚ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And, although their hearts were convinced the signs were true, they still denied them wrongfully and arrogantly. See then what was the end of the corruptors!

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَٰنَ عِلْمًۭا ۖ وَقَالَا ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٍۢ مِّنْ عِبَادِهِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We granted knowledge to David and Solomon. And they said ˹in acknowledgment˺, “All praise is for Allah Who has privileged us over many of His faithful servants.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيْمَٰنُ دَاوُۥدَ ۖ وَقَالَ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ عُلِّمْنَا مَنطِقَ ٱلطَّيْرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَضْلُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
quran.ayah_en: And David was succeeded by Solomon, who said, “O people! We have been taught the language of birds, and been given everything ˹we need˺. This is indeed a great privilege.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيْمَٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيْرِ فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Solomon’s forces of jinn, humans, and birds were rallied for him, perfectly organized.

quran.ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ وَادِ ٱلنَّمْلِ قَالَتْ نَمْلَةٌۭ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّمْلُ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ مَسَٰكِنَكُمْ لَا يَحْطِمَنَّكُمْ سُلَيْمَٰنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And when they came across a valley of ants, an ant warned, “O ants! Go quickly into your homes so Solomon and his armies do not crush you, unknowingly.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكًۭا مِّن قَوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِىٓ أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَىَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَٰلِحًۭا تَرْضَىٰهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِى بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِى عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So Solomon smiled in amusement at her words, and prayed, “My Lord! Inspire me to ˹always˺ be thankful for Your favours which You have blessed me and my parents with, and to do good deeds that please you. Admit me, by Your mercy, into ˹the company of˺ Your righteous servants.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيْرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِىَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلْهُدْهُدَ أَمْ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْغَآئِبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹One day˺ he inspected the birds, and wondered, “Why is it that I cannot see the hoopoe? Or could he be absent?

quran.ayah_ar: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُۥ عَذَابًۭا شَدِيدًا أَوْ لَأَا۟ذْبَحَنَّهُۥٓ أَوْ لَيَأْتِيَنِّى بِسُلْطَٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: I will surely subject him to a severe punishment, or ˹even˺ slaughter him, unless he brings me a compelling excuse.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَكَثَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍۢ فَقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمْ تُحِطْ بِهِۦ وَجِئْتُكَ مِن سَبَإٍۭ بِنَبَإٍۢ يَقِينٍ
quran.ayah_en: It was not long before the bird came and said, “I have found out something you do not know. I have just come to you from Sheba with sure news.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنِّى وَجَدتُّ ٱمْرَأَةًۭ تَمْلِكُهُمْ وَأُوتِيَتْ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَلَهَا عَرْشٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, I found a woman ruling over them, who has been given everything ˹she needs˺, and who has a magnificent throne.

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَدتُّهَا وَقَوْمَهَا يَسْجُدُونَ لِلشَّمْسِ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ فَصَدَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ فَهُمْ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: I found her and her people prostrating to the sun instead of Allah. For Satan has made their deeds appealing to them—hindering them from the ˹Right˺ Way and leaving them unguided—

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَّا يَسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى يُخْرِجُ ٱلْخَبْءَ فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُخْفُونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: so they do not prostrate to Allah, Who brings forth what is hidden in the heavens and the earth, and knows what you ˹all˺ conceal and what you reveal.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ ۩
quran.ayah_en: ˹He is˺ Allah! There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him, the Lord of the Mighty Throne.”

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰذِبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Solomon said, “We will see whether you are telling the truth or lying.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱذْهَب بِّكِتَٰبِى هَٰذَا فَأَلْقِهْ إِلَيْهِمْ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا يَرْجِعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Go with this letter of mine and deliver it to them, then stand aside and see how they will respond.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَتْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ إِنِّىٓ أُلْقِىَ إِلَىَّ كِتَٰبٌۭ كَرِيمٌ
quran.ayah_en: The Queen ˹later˺ announced, “O chiefs! Indeed, a noble letter has been delivered to me.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيْمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: It is from Solomon, and it reads: ‘In the Name of Allah—the Most Compassionate, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَىَّ وَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Do not be arrogant with me, but come to me, fully submitting ˹to Allah˺.’”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَتْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَفْتُونِى فِىٓ أَمْرِى مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمْرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشْهَدُونِ
quran.ayah_en: She said, “O chiefs! Advise me in this matter of mine, for I would never make any decision without you.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ نَحْنُ أُو۟لُوا۟ قُوَّةٍۢ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ بَأْسٍۢ شَدِيدٍۢ وَٱلْأَمْرُ إِلَيْكِ فَٱنظُرِى مَاذَا تَأْمُرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They responded, “We are a people of strength and great ˹military˺ might, but the decision is yours, so decide what you will command.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَتْ إِنَّ ٱلْمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُوا۟ قَرْيَةً أَفْسَدُوهَا وَجَعَلُوٓا۟ أَعِزَّةَ أَهْلِهَآ أَذِلَّةًۭ ۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: She reasoned, “Indeed, when kings invade a land, they ruin it and debase its nobles. They really do so!

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنِّى مُرْسِلَةٌ إِلَيْهِم بِهَدِيَّةٍۢ فَنَاظِرَةٌۢ بِمَ يَرْجِعُ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: But I will certainly send him a gift, and see what ˹response˺ my envoys will return with.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ سُلَيْمَٰنَ قَالَ أَتُمِدُّونَنِ بِمَالٍۢ فَمَآ ءَاتَىٰنِۦَ ٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌۭ مِّمَّآ ءَاتَىٰكُم بَلْ أَنتُم بِهَدِيَّتِكُمْ تَفْرَحُونَ
quran.ayah_en: When the chief-envoy came to him, Solomon said, “Do you offer me wealth? What Allah has granted me is far greater than what He has granted you. No! It is you who rejoice in ˹receiving˺ gifts.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱرْجِعْ إِلَيْهِمْ فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّهُم بِجُنُودٍۢ لَّا قِبَلَ لَهُم بِهَا وَلَنُخْرِجَنَّهُم مِّنْهَآ أَذِلَّةًۭ وَهُمْ صَٰغِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Go back to them, for we will certainly mobilize against them forces which they can never resist, and we will drive them out from there in disgrace, fully humbled.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَيُّكُمْ يَأْتِينِى بِعَرْشِهَا قَبْلَ أَن يَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Solomon asked, “O chiefs! Which of you can bring me her throne before they come to me in ˹full˺ submission?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ عِفْرِيتٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَ ۖ وَإِنِّى عَلَيْهِ لَقَوِىٌّ أَمِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: One mighty jinn responded, “I can bring it to you before you rise from this council of yours. And I am quite strong and trustworthy for this ˹task˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ ٱلَّذِى عِندَهُۥ عِلْمٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن يَرْتَدَّ إِلَيْكَ طَرْفُكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهُ مُسْتَقِرًّا عِندَهُۥ قَالَ هَٰذَا مِن فَضْلِ رَبِّى لِيَبْلُوَنِىٓ ءَأَشْكُرُ أَمْ أَكْفُرُ ۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّى غَنِىٌّۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: But the one who had knowledge of the Scripture said, “I can bring it to you in the blink of an eye.” So when Solomon saw it placed before him, he exclaimed, “This is by the grace of my Lord to test me whether I am grateful or ungrateful. And whoever is grateful, it is only for their own good. But whoever is ungrateful, surely my Lord is Self-Sufficient, Most Generous.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ نَكِّرُوا۟ لَهَا عَرْشَهَا نَنظُرْ أَتَهْتَدِىٓ أَمْ تَكُونُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Then˺ Solomon said, “Disguise her throne for her so we may see whether she will recognize ˹it˺ or she will not be able to.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْ قِيلَ أَهَٰكَذَا عَرْشُكِ ۖ قَالَتْ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ ۚ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلْعِلْمَ مِن قَبْلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسْلِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So when she arrived, it was said ˹to her˺, “Is your throne like this?” She replied, “It looks to be the same. We have ˹already˺ received knowledge ˹of Solomon’s prophethood˺ and have submitted ˹to Allah˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعْبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتْ مِن قَوْمٍۢ كَٰفِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: But she had been hindered by what she used to worship instead of Allah, for she was indeed from a disbelieving people.

quran.ayah_ar: قِيلَ لَهَا ٱدْخُلِى ٱلصَّرْحَ ۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَتْهُ حَسِبَتْهُ لُجَّةًۭ وَكَشَفَتْ عَن سَاقَيْهَا ۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ صَرْحٌۭ مُّمَرَّدٌۭ مِّن قَوَارِيرَ ۗ قَالَتْ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى وَأَسْلَمْتُ مَعَ سُلَيْمَٰنَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then she was told, “Enter the palace.” But when she saw the hall, she thought it was a body of water, so she bared her legs. Solomon said. “It is just a palace paved with crystal.” ˹At last˺ she declared, “My Lord! I have certainly wronged my soul. Now I ˹fully˺ submit myself along with Solomon to Allah, the Lord of all worlds.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمْ فَرِيقَانِ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And We certainly sent to the people of Thamûd their brother salih, proclaiming, “Worship Allah,” but they suddenly split into two opposing groups.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰقَوْمِ لِمَ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ ۖ لَوْلَا تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: He urged ˹the disbelieving group˺, “O my people! Why do you ˹seek to˺ hasten the torment If only you sought Allah’s forgiveness so you may be shown mercy!”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ ٱطَّيَّرْنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَ ۚ قَالَ طَٰٓئِرُكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌۭ تُفْتَنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They replied, “You and your followers are a bad omen for us.” He responded, “Your omens are destined by Allah. In fact, you are ˹only˺ a people being tested.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَكَانَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ تِسْعَةُ رَهْطٍۢ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And there were in the city nine ˹elite˺ men who spread corruption in the land, never doing what is right.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ تَقَاسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهْلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدْنَا مَهْلِكَ أَهْلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They vowed, “Let us swear by Allah that we will take him and his family down by night. Then we will certainly say to his ˹closest˺ heirs, ‘We did not witness the murder of his family. We are definitely telling the truth.’”

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًۭا وَمَكَرْنَا مَكْرًۭا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And ˹so˺ they made a plan, but We too made a plan, while they were unaware.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ مَكْرِهِمْ أَنَّا دَمَّرْنَٰهُمْ وَقَوْمَهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
quran.ayah_en: See then what the consequences of their plan were: We ˹utterly˺ destroyed them and their people all together.

quran.ayah_ar: فَتِلْكَ بُيُوتُهُمْ خَاوِيَةًۢ بِمَا ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: So their homes are there, ˹but completely˺ ruined because of their wrongdoing. Surely in this is a lesson for people of knowledge.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنجَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ يَتَّقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And We delivered those who were faithful and were mindful ˹of Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلْفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمْ تُبْصِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And ˹remember˺ Lot, when he rebuked ˹the men of˺ his people, “Do you commit that shameful deed while you can see ˹one another˺?

quran.ayah_ar: أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهْوَةًۭ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌۭ تَجْهَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Do you really lust after men instead of women? In fact, you are ˹only˺ a people acting ignorantly.”

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ أَخْرِجُوٓا۟ ءَالَ لُوطٍۢ مِّن قَرْيَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ أُنَاسٌۭ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: But his people’s only response was to say, “Expel Lot’s followers from your land! They are a people who wish to remain chaste!”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَنجَيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَٰهَا مِنَ ٱلْغَٰبِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So We delivered him and his family, except his wife. We had destined her to be one of the doomed.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًۭا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And We poured upon them a rain ˹of brimstone˺. How evil was the rain of those who had been warned!

quran.ayah_ar: قُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصْطَفَىٰٓ ۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيْرٌ أَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Praise be to Allah, and peace be upon the servants He has chosen.” ˹Ask the disbelievers,˺ “Which is better: Allah or whatever ˹gods˺ they associate ˹with Him˺?”

quran.ayah_ar: أَمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ حَدَآئِقَ ذَاتَ بَهْجَةٍۢ مَّا كَانَ لَكُمْ أَن تُنۢبِتُوا۟ شَجَرَهَآ ۗ أَءِلَٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ يَعْدِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or ˹ask them,˺ “Who created the heavens and the earth, and sends down rain for you from the sky, by which We cause delightful gardens to grow? You could never cause their trees to grow. Was it another god besides Allah?” Absolutely not! But they are a people who set up equals ˹to Allah˺!

quran.ayah_ar: أَمَّن جَعَلَ ٱلْأَرْضَ قَرَارًۭا وَجَعَلَ خِلَٰلَهَآ أَنْهَٰرًۭا وَجَعَلَ لَهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ حَاجِزًا ۗ أَءِلَٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or ˹ask them,˺ “Who made the earth a place of settlement, caused rivers to flow through it, placed firm mountains upon it, and set a barrier between ˹fresh and salt˺ bodies of water? Was it another god besides Allah?” Absolutely not! But most of them do not know.

quran.ayah_ar: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ ٱلْمُضْطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكْشِفُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَيَجْعَلُكُمْ خُلَفَآءَ ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَءِلَٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or ˹ask them,˺ “Who responds to the distressed when they cry to Him, relieving ˹their˺ affliction, and ˹Who˺ makes you successors in the earth? Is it another god besides Allah? Yet you are hardly mindful!”

quran.ayah_ar: أَمَّن يَهْدِيكُمْ فِى ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ وَمَن يُرْسِلُ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦٓ ۗ أَءِلَٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ تَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or ˹ask them,˺ “Who guides you in the darkness of the land and sea, Is it another god besides Allah? Exalted is Allah above what they associate ˹with Him˺!

quran.ayah_ar: أَمَّن يَبْدَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ وَمَن يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَءِلَٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قُلْ هَاتُوا۟ بُرْهَٰنَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Or ˹ask them,˺ “Who originates the creation then resurrects it, and gives you provisions from the heavens and the earth? Is it another god besides Allah?” Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Show ˹me˺ your proof, if what you say is true.”

quran.ayah_ar: قُل لَّا يَعْلَمُ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْغَيْبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبْعَثُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “None in the heavens and the earth has knowledge of the unseen except Allah. Nor do they know when they will be resurrected.

quran.ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱدَّٰرَكَ عِلْمُهُمْ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّۢ مِّنْهَا ۖ بَلْ هُم مِّنْهَا عَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: No! Their knowledge of the Hereafter amounts to ignorance. In fact, they are in doubt about it. In truth, they are ˹totally˺ blind to it.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبًۭا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخْرَجُونَ
quran.ayah_en: The disbelievers ask, “When we and our fathers are reduced to dust, will we really be brought forth ˹alive˺?

quran.ayah_ar: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا هَٰذَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We have already been promised this, as well as our forefathers earlier. This is nothing but ancient fables!”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Travel throughout the land and see the fate of the wicked.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُن فِى ضَيْقٍۢ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Do not grieve for them, nor be distressed by their schemes.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They ask ˹the believers˺, “When will this threat come to pass, if what you say is true?”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعْضُ ٱلَّذِى تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Perhaps some of what you seek to hasten is close at hand.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Surely your Lord is ever Bountiful to humanity, but most of them are ungrateful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمْ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And surely your Lord knows what their hearts conceal and what they reveal.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا مِنْ غَآئِبَةٍۢ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا فِى كِتَٰبٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
quran.ayah_en: For there is nothing hidden in the heavens or the earth without being ˹written˺ in a perfect Record.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ يَقُصُّ عَلَىٰ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ أَكْثَرَ ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, this Quran clarifies for the Children of Israel most of what they differ over.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَهُدًۭى وَرَحْمَةٌۭ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And it is truly a guide and mercy for the believers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقْضِى بَيْنَهُم بِحُكْمِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: Your Lord will certainly judge between them by His justice, for He is the Almighty, All-Knowing.

quran.ayah_ar: فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلْمُبِينِ
quran.ayah_en: So put your trust in Allah, for you are surely upon the ˹Path of˺ clear truth.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّكَ لَا تُسْمِعُ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَلَا تُسْمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوْا۟ مُدْبِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: You certainly cannot make the dead hear ˹the truth˺. Nor can you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs and walk away.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَٰدِى ٱلْعُمْىِ عَن ضَلَٰلَتِهِمْ ۖ إِن تُسْمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Nor can you lead the blind out of their misguidance. You can make none hear ˹the truth˺ except those who believe in Our revelations, ˹fully˺ submitting ˹to Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ وَإِذَا وَقَعَ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ أَخْرَجْنَا لَهُمْ دَآبَّةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ تُكَلِّمُهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ كَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا لَا يُوقِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And when the decree ˹of the Hour˺ comes to pass against them, We will bring forth for them a beast from the earth, telling them that the people had no sure faith in Our revelations.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍۢ فَوْجًۭا مِّمَّن يُكَذِّبُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Watch for˺ the Day We will gather from every faith-community a group of those who denied Our revelations, and they will be driven in ranks.

quran.ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُو قَالَ أَكَذَّبْتُم بِـَٔايَٰتِى وَلَمْ تُحِيطُوا۟ بِهَا عِلْمًا أَمَّاذَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: When they ˹finally˺ come before their Lord, He will ask ˹them˺, “Did you deny My revelations without ˹even˺ comprehending them? Or what ˹exactly˺ did you do?”

quran.ayah_ar: وَوَقَعَ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُوا۟ فَهُمْ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And the decree ˹of torment˺ will be justified against them for their wrongdoing, leaving them speechless.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا جَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِيَسْكُنُوا۟ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبْصِرًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Do they not see that We made the night for them to rest in and the day bright? Surely in this are signs for those who believe.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوْهُ دَٰخِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And ˹beware of˺ the Day the Trumpet will be blown, and all those in the heavens and all those on the earth will be horrified ˹to the point of death˺, except those Allah wills ˹to spare˺. And all will come before Him, fully humbled.

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَرَى ٱلْجِبَالَ تَحْسَبُهَا جَامِدَةًۭ وَهِىَ تَمُرُّ مَرَّ ٱلسَّحَابِ ۚ صُنْعَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَتْقَنَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَفْعَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Now you see the mountains, thinking they are firmly fixed, but they are travelling ˹just˺ like clouds. ˹That is˺ the design of Allah, Who has perfected everything. Surely He is All-Aware of what you do.

quran.ayah_ar: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلْحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْهَا وَهُم مِّن فَزَعٍۢ يَوْمَئِذٍ ءَامِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Whoever comes with a good deed will be rewarded with what is better, and they will be secure from the horror on that Day.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتْ وُجُوهُهُمْ فِى ٱلنَّارِ هَلْ تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And whoever comes with an evil deed will be hurled face-first into the Fire. Are you rewarded except for what you used to do?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّمَآ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ رَبَّ هَٰذِهِ ٱلْبَلْدَةِ ٱلَّذِى حَرَّمَهَا وَلَهُۥ كُلُّ شَىْءٍۢ ۖ وَأُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I have only been commanded to worship the Lord of this city ˹of Mecca˺, Who has made it sacred, and to Him belongs everything. And I am commanded to be one of those who ˹fully˺ submit ˹to Him˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنْ أَتْلُوَا۟ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهْتَدِى لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَقُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُنذِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and to recite the Quran.” Then whoever chooses to be guided, it is only for their own good. But whoever chooses to stray, say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I am only a warner.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ سَيُرِيكُمْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَتَعْرِفُونَهَا ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And say, “All praise is for Allah! He will show you His signs, and you will recognize them. And your Lord is never unaware of what you do.”

quran.ayah_ar: طسٓمٓ
quran.ayah_en: Ṭa-Sĩn-Mĩm.

quran.ayah_ar: تِلْكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
quran.ayah_en: These are the verses of the clear Book.

quran.ayah_ar: نَتْلُوا۟ عَلَيْكَ مِن نَّبَإِ مُوسَىٰ وَفِرْعَوْنَ بِٱلْحَقِّ لِقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: We narrate to you ˹O Prophet˺ part of the story of Moses and Pharaoh in truth for people who believe.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِرْعَوْنَ عَلَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَجَعَلَ أَهْلَهَا شِيَعًۭا يَسْتَضْعِفُ طَآئِفَةًۭ مِّنْهُمْ يُذَبِّحُ أَبْنَآءَهُمْ وَيَسْتَحْىِۦ نِسَآءَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, Pharaoh ˹arrogantly˺ elevated himself in the land and divided its people into ˹subservient˺ groups, one of which he persecuted, slaughtering their sons and keeping their women. He was truly one of the corruptors.

quran.ayah_ar: وَنُرِيدُ أَن نَّمُنَّ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتُضْعِفُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَنَجْعَلَهُمْ أَئِمَّةًۭ وَنَجْعَلَهُمُ ٱلْوَٰرِثِينَ
quran.ayah_en: But it was Our Will to favour those who were oppressed in the land, making them models ˹of faith˺ as well as successors;

quran.ayah_ar: وَنُمَكِّنَ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَنُرِىَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا مِنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَحْذَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and to establish them in the land; and through them show Pharaoh, Haman,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَرْضِعِيهِ ۖ فَإِذَا خِفْتِ عَلَيْهِ فَأَلْقِيهِ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَلَا تَخَافِى وَلَا تَحْزَنِىٓ ۖ إِنَّا رَآدُّوهُ إِلَيْكِ وَجَاعِلُوهُ مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We inspired the mother of Moses: “Nurse him, but when you fear for him, put him then into the river, and do not fear or grieve. We will certainly return him to you, and make him one of the messengers.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلْتَقَطَهُۥٓ ءَالُ فِرْعَوْنَ لِيَكُونَ لَهُمْ عَدُوًّۭا وَحَزَنًا ۗ إِنَّ فِرْعَوْنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا كَانُوا۟ خَٰطِـِٔينَ
quran.ayah_en: And ˹it so happened that˺ Pharaoh’s people picked him up, only to become their enemy and source of grief. Surely Pharaoh, Haman, and their soldiers were sinful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُ فِرْعَوْنَ قُرَّتُ عَيْنٍۢ لِّى وَلَكَ ۖ لَا تَقْتُلُوهُ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَنفَعَنَآ أَوْ نَتَّخِذَهُۥ وَلَدًۭا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Pharaoh’s wife said ˹to him˺, “˹This baby is˺ a source of joy for me and you. Do not kill him. Perhaps he may be useful to us or we may adopt him as a son.” They were unaware ˹of what was to come˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَصْبَحَ فُؤَادُ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰ فَٰرِغًا ۖ إِن كَادَتْ لَتُبْدِى بِهِۦ لَوْلَآ أَن رَّبَطْنَا عَلَىٰ قَلْبِهَا لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And the heart of Moses’ mother ached so much that she almost gave away his identity, had We not reassured her heart in order for her to have faith ˹in Allah’s promise˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالَتْ لِأُخْتِهِۦ قُصِّيهِ ۖ فَبَصُرَتْ بِهِۦ عَن جُنُبٍۢ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And she said to his sister, “Keep track of him!” So she watched him from a distance, while they were unaware.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ وَحَرَّمْنَا عَلَيْهِ ٱلْمَرَاضِعَ مِن قَبْلُ فَقَالَتْ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَهْلِ بَيْتٍۢ يَكْفُلُونَهُۥ لَكُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُۥ نَٰصِحُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And We had caused him to refuse all wet-nurses at first, so his sister suggested, “Shall I direct you to a family who will bring him up for you and take good care of him?”

quran.ayah_ar: فَرَدَدْنَٰهُ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّهِۦ كَىْ تَقَرَّ عَيْنُهَا وَلَا تَحْزَنَ وَلِتَعْلَمَ أَنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّۭ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: This is how We returned him to his mother so that her heart would be put at ease, and not grieve, and that she would know that Allah’s promise is ˹always˺ true. But most people do not know.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَٱسْتَوَىٰٓ ءَاتَيْنَٰهُ حُكْمًۭا وَعِلْمًۭا ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And when he reached full strength and maturity, We gave him wisdom and knowledge. This is how We reward the good-doers.

quran.ayah_ar: وَدَخَلَ ٱلْمَدِينَةَ عَلَىٰ حِينِ غَفْلَةٍۢ مِّنْ أَهْلِهَا فَوَجَدَ فِيهَا رَجُلَيْنِ يَقْتَتِلَانِ هَٰذَا مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ وَهَٰذَا مِنْ عَدُوِّهِۦ ۖ فَٱسْتَغَٰثَهُ ٱلَّذِى مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ عَلَى ٱلَّذِى مِنْ عَدُوِّهِۦ فَوَكَزَهُۥ مُوسَىٰ فَقَضَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ۖ قَالَ هَٰذَا مِنْ عَمَلِ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَدُوٌّۭ مُّضِلٌّۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: ˹One day˺ he entered the city unnoticed by its people. There he found two men fighting: one of his own people, and the other of his enemies. The man from his people called to him for help against his foe. So Moses punched him, causing his death. Moses cried, “This is from Satan’s handiwork. He is certainly a sworn, misleading enemy.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى فَٱغْفِرْ لِى فَغَفَرَ لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: He pleaded, “My Lord! I have definitely wronged my soul, so forgive me.” So He forgave him, ˹for˺ He is indeed the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ فَلَنْ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرًۭا لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Moses pledged, “My Lord! For all Your favours upon me, I will never side with the wicked.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَصْبَحَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ خَآئِفًۭا يَتَرَقَّبُ فَإِذَا ٱلَّذِى ٱسْتَنصَرَهُۥ بِٱلْأَمْسِ يَسْتَصْرِخُهُۥ ۚ قَالَ لَهُۥ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّكَ لَغَوِىٌّۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: And so Moses became fearful, watching out in the city, when suddenly the one who sought his help the day before cried out to him again for help. Moses rebuked him, “Indeed, you are clearly a trouble-maker.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَمَّآ أَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يَبْطِشَ بِٱلَّذِى هُوَ عَدُوٌّۭ لَّهُمَا قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ أَتُرِيدُ أَن تَقْتُلَنِى كَمَا قَتَلْتَ نَفْسًۢا بِٱلْأَمْسِ ۖ إِن تُرِيدُ إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَ جَبَّارًۭا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا تُرِيدُ أَن تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُصْلِحِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then when Moses was about to lay his hands on their foe, the enemy said, “O Moses! Do you intend to kill me as you killed a man yesterday? You only want to be a tyrant in the land. You do not intend to make peace!”

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَآءَ رَجُلٌۭ مِّنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱلْمَلَأَ يَأْتَمِرُونَ بِكَ لِيَقْتُلُوكَ فَٱخْرُجْ إِنِّى لَكَ مِنَ ٱلنَّٰصِحِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And there came a man, rushing from the farthest end of the city. He said, “O Moses! The chiefs are actually conspiring against you to put you to death, so leave ˹the city˺. I really advise you ˹to do so˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَخَرَجَ مِنْهَا خَآئِفًۭا يَتَرَقَّبُ ۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِى مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So Moses left the city in a state of fear and caution, praying, “My Lord! Deliver me from the wrongdoing people.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلْقَآءَ مَدْيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّىٓ أَن يَهْدِيَنِى سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
quran.ayah_en: And as he made his way towards Midian, he said, “I trust my Lord will guide me to the right way.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَمَّا وَرَدَ مَآءَ مَدْيَنَ وَجَدَ عَلَيْهِ أُمَّةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْقُونَ وَوَجَدَ مِن دُونِهِمُ ٱمْرَأَتَيْنِ تَذُودَانِ ۖ قَالَ مَا خَطْبُكُمَا ۖ قَالَتَا لَا نَسْقِى حَتَّىٰ يُصْدِرَ ٱلرِّعَآءُ ۖ وَأَبُونَا شَيْخٌۭ كَبِيرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: When he arrived at the well of Midian, he found a group of people watering ˹their herds˺. Apart from them, he noticed two women holding back ˹their herd˺.
