quran.ayah_en: Yet he already misled great multitudes of you. Did you not have any sense?

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: This is the Hell you were warned of.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Burn in it Today for your disbelief.”

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: On this Day We will seal their mouths, their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify to what they used to commit.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Had We willed, We could have easily blinded their eyes, so they would struggle to find their way. How then could they see?

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّۭا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And had We willed, We could have transfigured them on the spot, so they could neither progress forward nor turn back.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And whoever We grant a long life, We reverse them in development. Will they not then understand?

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ وَقُرْءَانٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: We have not taught him poetry, nor is it fitting for him. This ˹Book˺ is only a Reminder and a clear Quran

quran.ayah_ar: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّۭا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: to warn whoever is ˹truly˺ alive and fulfil the decree ˹of torment˺ against the disbelievers.

quran.ayah_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَٰمًۭا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَٰلِكُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Do they not see that We singlehandedly created for them, among other things, cattle which are under their control?

quran.ayah_ar: وَذَلَّلْنَٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And We have subjected these ˹animals˺ to them, so they may ride some and eat others.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And they derive from them other benefits and drinks. Will they not then give thanks?

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةًۭ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Still they have taken other gods besides Allah, hoping to be helped ˹by them˺.

quran.ayah_ar: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌۭ مُّحْضَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They cannot help the pagans, even though they serve the idols as dedicated guards.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: So do not let their words grieve you ˹O Prophet˺. Indeed, We ˹fully˺ know what they conceal and what they reveal.

quran.ayah_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍۢ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Do people not see that We have created them from a sperm-drop, then—behold!—they openly challenge ˹Us˺?

quran.ayah_ar: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًۭا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: And they argue with Us—forgetting they were created—saying, “Who will give life to decayed bones?”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍۢ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “They will be revived by the One Who produced them the first time, for He has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of every created being.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًۭا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹He is the One˺ Who gives you fire from green trees, and—behold!—you kindle ˹fire˺ from them.

quran.ayah_ar: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: Can the One Who created the heavens and the earth not ˹easily˺ resurrect these ˹deniers˺?” Yes ˹He can˺! For He is the Master Creator, All-Knowing.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
quran.ayah_en: All it takes, when He wills something ˹to be˺, is simply to say to it: “Be!” And it is!

quran.ayah_ar: فَسُبْحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: So glory be to the One in Whose Hands is the authority over all things, and to Whom ˹alone˺ you will ˹all˺ be returned.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلصَّٰٓفَّٰتِ صَفًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: By those ˹angels˺ lined up in ranks,

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلزَّٰجِرَٰتِ زَجْرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and those who diligently drive ˹the clouds˺,

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلتَّٰلِيَٰتِ ذِكْرًا
quran.ayah_en: and those who recite the Reminder!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ إِلَٰهَكُمْ لَوَٰحِدٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Surely your God is One!

quran.ayah_ar: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَشَٰرِقِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹He is˺ the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, and the Lord of all points of sunrise.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We have adorned the lowest heaven with the stars for decoration

quran.ayah_ar: وَحِفْظًۭا مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَٰنٍۢ مَّارِدٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹for˺ protection from every rebellious devil.

quran.ayah_ar: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: They cannot listen to the highest assembly ˹of angels˺ for they are pelted from every side,

quran.ayah_ar: دُحُورًۭا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ وَاصِبٌ
quran.ayah_en: ˹fiercely˺ driven away. And they will suffer an everlasting torment.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ ٱلْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌۭ ثَاقِبٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: But whoever manages to stealthily eavesdrop is ˹instantly˺ pursued by a piercing flare.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَٰهُم مِّن طِينٍۢ لَّازِبٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: So ask them ˹O Prophet˺, which is harder to create: them or other marvels of Our creation?

quran.ayah_ar: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: In fact, you are astonished ˹by their denial˺, while they ridicule ˹you˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ لَا يَذْكُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: When they are reminded, they are never mindful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا۟ ءَايَةًۭ يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And whenever they see a sign, they make fun of it,

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
quran.ayah_en: saying, “This is nothing but pure magic.

quran.ayah_ar: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًۭا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
quran.ayah_en: When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be resurrected?

quran.ayah_ar: أَوَءَابَآؤُنَا ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And our forefathers as well?”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنتُمْ دَٰخِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, “Yes! And you will be fully humbled.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: It will only take one Blast, then at once they will see ˹it all˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ يَٰوَيْلَنَا هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: They will cry, “Oh, woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!”

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision which you used to deny.”

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Allah will say to the angels,˺ “Gather ˹all˺ the wrongdoers along with their peers, and whatever they used to worship

quran.ayah_ar: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: instead of Allah, then lead them ˹all˺ to the path of Hell.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُم مَّسْـُٔولُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And detain them, for they must be questioned.”

quran.ayah_ar: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Then they will be asked,˺ “What is the matter with you that you can no longer help each other?”

quran.ayah_ar: بَلْ هُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: In fact, on that Day they will be ˹fully˺ submissive.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They will turn on each other, throwing blame.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
quran.ayah_en: The misled will say, “It was you who deluded us away from what is right.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: The misleaders will reply, “No! You disbelieved on your own.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَٰنٍۭ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًۭا طَٰغِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We had no authority over you. In fact, you yourselves were a transgressing people.

quran.ayah_ar: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ ۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: The decree of our Lord has come to pass against us ˹all˺: we will certainly taste ˹the punishment˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَغْوَيْنَٰكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَٰوِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We caused you to deviate, for we ourselves were deviant.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Surely on that Day they will ˹all˺ share in the punishment.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: That is certainly how We deal with the wicked.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: For whenever it was said to them ˹in the world˺, “There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Allah,” they acted arrogantly

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍۢ مَّجْنُونٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: and argued, “Should we really abandon our gods for a mad poet?”

quran.ayah_ar: بَلْ جَآءَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: In fact, he came with the truth, confirming ˹earlier˺ messengers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَآئِقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَلِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: You will certainly taste the painful torment,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and will only be rewarded for what you used to do.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
quran.ayah_en: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

quran.ayah_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌۭ مَّعْلُومٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: They will have a known provision:

quran.ayah_ar: فَوَٰكِهُ ۖ وَهُم مُّكْرَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: fruits ˹of every type˺. And they will be honoured

quran.ayah_ar: فِى جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: in the Gardens of Bliss,

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍۢ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: facing each other on thrones.

quran.ayah_ar: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِكَأْسٍۢ مِّن مَّعِينٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: A drink ˹of pure wine˺ will be passed around to them from a flowing stream:

quran.ayah_ar: بَيْضَآءَ لَذَّةٍۢ لِّلشَّٰرِبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: crystal-white, delicious to drink.

quran.ayah_ar: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌۭ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
quran.ayah_en: It will neither harm ˹them˺, nor will they be intoxicated by it.

quran.ayah_ar: وَعِندَهُمْ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ عِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: And with them will be maidens of modest gaze and gorgeous eyes,

quran.ayah_ar: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌۭ مَّكْنُونٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: as if they were pristine pearls.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Then they will turn to one another inquisitively.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ قَآئِلٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّى كَانَ لِى قَرِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: One of them will say, “I once had a companion ˹in the world˺

quran.ayah_ar: يَقُولُ أَءِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصَدِّقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: who used to ask ˹me˺, ‘Do you actually believe ˹in resurrection˺?

quran.ayah_ar: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًۭا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
quran.ayah_en: When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be brought to judgment?’”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّطَّلِعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: He will ˹then˺ ask, “Would you care to see ˹his fate˺?”

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱطَّلَعَ فَرَءَاهُ فِى سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: Then he ˹and the others˺ will look and spot him in the midst of the Hellfire.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ تَٱللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ
quran.ayah_en: He will ˹then˺ say, “By Allah! You nearly ruined me.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Had it not been for the grace of my Lord, I ˹too˺ would have certainly been among those brought ˹to Hell˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Then he will ask his fellow believers,˺ “Can you imagine that we will never die,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: except our first death, nor be punished ˹like the others˺?”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: This is truly the ultimate triumph.

quran.ayah_ar: لِمِثْلِ هَٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ ٱلْعَٰمِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: For such ˹honour˺ all should strive.

quran.ayah_ar: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌۭ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
quran.ayah_en: Is this ˹bliss˺ a better accommodation or the tree of Zaqqûm?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَٰهَا فِتْنَةًۭ لِّلظَّٰلِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We have surely made it a test for the wrongdoers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌۭ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, it is a tree that grows in the depths of Hell,

quran.ayah_ar: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُۥ رُءُوسُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ
quran.ayah_en: bearing fruit like devils’ heads.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَءَاكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ
quran.ayah_en: The evildoers will certainly ˹be left to˺ eat from it, filling up their bellies with it.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًۭا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Then on top of that they will be given a blend of boiling drink.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: Then they will ultimately return to ˹their place in˺ Hell.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا۟ ءَابَآءَهُمْ ضَآلِّينَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, they found their forefathers astray,

quran.ayah_ar: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: so they rushed in their footsteps!

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And surely most of the earlier generations had strayed before them,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: although We had certainly sent warners among them.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: See then what was the end of those who had been warned.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
quran.ayah_en: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ نَادَىٰنَا نُوحٌۭ فَلَنِعْمَ ٱلْمُجِيبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, Noah cried out to Us, and how excellent are We in responding!

quran.ayah_ar: وَنَجَّيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: We delivered him and his family from the great distress,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُۥ هُمُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and made his descendants the sole survivors.

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And We blessed him ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:

quran.ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍۢ فِى ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: “Peace be upon Noah among all peoples.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹For˺ he was truly one of Our faithful servants.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then We drowned the others.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ لَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ
quran.ayah_en: And indeed, one of those who followed his way was Abraham.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ جَآءَ رَبَّهُۥ بِقَلْبٍۢ سَلِيمٍ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Remember˺ when he came to his Lord with a pure heart,

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and said to his father and his people, “What are you worshipping?

quran.ayah_ar: أَئِفْكًا ءَالِهَةًۭ دُونَ ٱللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Is it false gods that you desire instead of Allah?

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: What then do you expect from the Lord of all worlds?”

quran.ayah_ar: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةًۭ فِى ٱلنُّجُومِ
quran.ayah_en: He later looked up to the stars ˹in contemplation˺,

quran.ayah_ar: فَقَالَ إِنِّى سَقِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: then said, “I am really sick.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَتَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So they turned their backs on him and went away.

quran.ayah_ar: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Then he ˹stealthily˺ advanced towards their gods, and said ˹mockingly˺, “Will you not eat ˹your offerings˺?

quran.ayah_ar: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنطِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: What is wrong with you that you cannot speak?”

quran.ayah_ar: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًۢا بِٱلْيَمِينِ
quran.ayah_en: Then he swiftly turned on them, striking ˹them˺ with his right hand.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَقْبَلُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ
quran.ayah_en: Later, his people came rushing towards him ˹furiously˺.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ
quran.ayah_en: He argued, “How can you worship what you carve ˹with your own hands˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: when it is Allah Who created you and whatever you do?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَٰنًۭا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: They said ˹to one another˺, “Build him a furnace and cast him into the blazing fire.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَرَادُوا۟ بِهِۦ كَيْدًۭا فَجَعَلْنَٰهُمُ ٱلْأَسْفَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And so they sought to harm him, but We made them inferior.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
quran.ayah_en: He later said, “I am leaving ˹in obedience˺ to my Lord. He will guide me.

quran.ayah_ar: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
quran.ayah_en: My Lord! Bless me with righteous offspring.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَبَشَّرْنَٰهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ حَلِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: So We gave him good news of a forbearing son.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ قَالَ يَٰبُنَىَّ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ فِى ٱلْمَنَامِ أَنِّىٓ أَذْبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then when the boy reached the age to work with him, Abraham said, “O my dear son! I have seen in a dream that I ˹must˺ sacrifice you. So tell me what you think.” He replied, “O my dear father! Do as you are commanded. Allah willing, you will find me steadfast.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَمَّآ أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُۥ لِلْجَبِينِ
quran.ayah_en: Then when they submitted ˹to Allah’s Will˺, and Abraham laid him on the side of his forehead ˹for sacrifice˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَنَٰدَيْنَٰهُ أَن يَٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: We called out to him, “O Abraham!

quran.ayah_ar: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: You have already fulfilled the vision.” Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْبَلَٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلْمُبِينُ
quran.ayah_en: That was truly a revealing test.

quran.ayah_ar: وَفَدَيْنَٰهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And We ransomed his son with a great sacrifice,

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and blessed Abraham ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:

quran.ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
quran.ayah_en: “Peace be upon Abraham.”

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: This is how We reward the good-doers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: He was truly one of Our faithful servants.

quran.ayah_ar: وَبَشَّرْنَٰهُ بِإِسْحَٰقَ نَبِيًّۭا مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We ˹later˺ gave him good news of Isaac—a prophet, and one of the righteous.

quran.ayah_ar: وَبَٰرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسْحَٰقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌۭ وَظَالِمٌۭ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ مُبِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: We blessed him and Isaac as well. Some of their descendants did good, while others clearly wronged themselves.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And We certainly showed favour to Moses and Aaron,

quran.ayah_ar: وَنَجَّيْنَٰهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: and delivered them and their people from the great distress.

quran.ayah_ar: وَنَصَرْنَٰهُمْ فَكَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَٰلِبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We helped them so it was they who prevailed.

quran.ayah_ar: وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُمَا ٱلْكِتَٰبَ ٱلْمُسْتَبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We gave them the clear Scripture,

quran.ayah_ar: وَهَدَيْنَٰهُمَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ
quran.ayah_en: and guided them to the Straight Path.

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And We blessed them ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:

quran.ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: “Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They were truly ˹two˺ of Our faithful servants.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And Elias was indeed one of the messengers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Remember˺ when he said to his people, “Will you not fear ˹Allah˺?

quran.ayah_ar: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًۭا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْخَٰلِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Do you call upon ˹the idol of˺ Ba’l and abandon the Best of Creators—

quran.ayah_ar: ٱللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?”

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: But they rejected him, so they will certainly be brought ˹for punishment˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
quran.ayah_en: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We blessed him ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:

quran.ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِلْ يَاسِينَ
quran.ayah_en: “Peace be upon Elias.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: He was truly one of Our faithful servants.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ لُوطًۭا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And Lot was indeed one of the messengers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Remember˺ when We delivered him and all of his family,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا عَجُوزًۭا فِى ٱلْغَٰبِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: except an old woman, who was one of the doomed.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then We ˹utterly˺ destroyed the rest.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِم مُّصْبِحِينَ
quran.ayah_en: You ˹Meccans˺ certainly pass by their ruins day

quran.ayah_ar: وَبِٱلَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and night. Will you not then understand?

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And Jonah was indeed one of the messengers.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Remember˺ when he fled to the overloaded ship.

quran.ayah_ar: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُدْحَضِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then ˹to save it from sinking,˺ he drew straws ˹with other passengers˺. He lost ˹and was thrown overboard˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلْتَقَمَهُ ٱلْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Then the whale engulfed him while he was blameworthy.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَوْلَآ أَنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَبِّحِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Had he not ˹constantly˺ glorified ˹Allah˺,

quran.ayah_ar: لَلَبِثَ فِى بَطْنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
quran.ayah_en: he would have certainly remained in its belly until the Day of Resurrection.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ فَنَبَذْنَٰهُ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: But We cast him onto the open ˹shore˺, ˹totally˺ worn out,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنۢبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةًۭ مِّن يَقْطِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: and caused a squash plant to grow over him.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَرْسَلْنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِا۟ئَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: We ˹later˺ sent him ˹back˺ to ˹his city of˺ at least one hundred thousand people,

quran.ayah_ar: فَـَٔامَنُوا۟ فَمَتَّعْنَٰهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: who then believed ˹in him˺, so We allowed them enjoyment for a while.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ ٱلْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Ask them ˹O Prophet˺ if your Lord has daughters, while the pagans ˹prefer to˺ have sons.

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَٰثًۭا وَهُمْ شَٰهِدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or ˹ask them˺ if We created the angels as females right before their eyes.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَآ إِنَّهُم مِّنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, it is one of their ˹outrageous˺ fabrications to say,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَدَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: “Allah has children.” They are simply liars.

quran.ayah_ar: أَصْطَفَى ٱلْبَنَاتِ عَلَى ٱلْبَنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

quran.ayah_ar: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Will you not then be mindful?

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَٰنٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Or do you have ˹any˺ compelling proof?

quran.ayah_ar: فَأْتُوا۟ بِكِتَٰبِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then bring ˹us˺ your scripture, if what you say is true!

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَعَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُۥ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًۭا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ ٱلْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They have also established a ˹marital˺ relationship between Him and the jinn. Yet the jinn ˹themselves˺ know well that such people will certainly be brought ˹for punishment˺.

quran.ayah_ar: سُبْحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Glorified is Allah far above what they claim!

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
quran.ayah_en: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Surely you ˹pagans˺ and whatever ˹idols˺ you worship

quran.ayah_ar: مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَٰتِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: can never lure ˹anyone˺ away from Him

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: except those ˹destined˺ to burn in Hell.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٌۭ مَّعْلُومٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: ˹The angels respond,˺ “There is not one of us without an assigned station ˹of worship˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلصَّآفُّونَ
quran.ayah_en: We are indeed the ones lined up in ranks ˹for Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْمُسَبِّحُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And we are indeed the ones ˹constantly˺ glorifying ˹His praise˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِن كَانُوا۟ لَيَقُولُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They certainly used to say,

quran.ayah_ar: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: “If only we had a Reminder like ˹those of˺ earlier peoples,

quran.ayah_ar: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
quran.ayah_en: we would have truly been Allah’s devoted servants.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَفَرُوا۟ بِهِۦ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: But ˹now˺ they reject it, so they will soon know.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Our Word has already gone forth to Our servants, the messengers,

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ ٱلْمَنصُورُونَ
quran.ayah_en: that they would surely be helped,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ ٱلْغَٰلِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and that Our forces will certainly prevail.

quran.ayah_ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: So turn away from the deniers for a while ˹O Prophet˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: You will see ˹what will happen to˺ them, and they too will see!

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Do they ˹really˺ wish to hasten Our punishment?

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Yet when it descends upon them: how evil will that morning be for those who had been warned!

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And turn away from them for a while.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: You will see, and they too will see!

quran.ayah_ar: سُبْحَٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Glorified is your Lord—the Lord of Honour and Power—above what they claim!

quran.ayah_ar: وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَى ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Peace be upon the messengers.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And praise be to Allah—Lord of all worlds.

quran.ayah_ar: صٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ذِى ٱلذِّكْرِ
quran.ayah_en: sãd. By the Quran, full of reminders!

quran.ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍۢ وَشِقَاقٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: ˹This is the truth,˺ yet the disbelievers are ˹entrenched˺ in arrogance and opposition.

quran.ayah_ar: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍۢ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Imagine˺ how many peoples We destroyed before them, and they cried out when it was too late to escape.

quran.ayah_ar: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَٰحِرٌۭ كَذَّابٌ
quran.ayah_en: Now, the pagans are astonished that a warner has come to them from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, “This is a magician, a total liar!

quran.ayah_ar: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْءَالِهَةَ إِلَٰهًۭا وَٰحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Has he reduced ˹all˺ the gods to One God? Indeed, this is something totally astonishing.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَىْءٌۭ يُرَادُ
quran.ayah_en: The chiefs among them went forth saying, “Carry on, and stand firm in devotion to your gods. Certainly this is just a scheme ˹for power˺.

quran.ayah_ar: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَٰقٌ
quran.ayah_en: We have never heard of this in the previous faith. This is nothing but a fabrication.

quran.ayah_ar: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّۢ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ
quran.ayah_en: Has the Reminder been revealed ˹only˺ to him out of ˹all of˺ us?” In fact, they are ˹only˺ in doubt of My ˹revealed˺ Reminder. In fact, ˹they do so because˺ they have not yet tasted My punishment.

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ
quran.ayah_en: Or ˹is it because˺ they possess the treasuries of the mercy of your Lord—the Almighty, the Giver ˹of all bounties˺.

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَٰبِ
quran.ayah_en: Or ˹is it because˺ the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and everything in between belongs to them? Let them then climb their way ˹to heaven, if their claim is true˺.

quran.ayah_ar: جُندٌۭ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ
quran.ayah_en: This is just another ˹enemy˺ force bound for defeat out there.

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ وَعَادٌۭ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
quran.ayah_en: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth˺, as did ’ad, Pharaoh of the mighty structures,

quran.ayah_ar: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍۢ وَأَصْحَٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ
quran.ayah_en: Thamûd, the people of Lot, and the residents of the Forest. These were ˹all˺ enemy forces.

quran.ayah_ar: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
quran.ayah_en: Each rejected their messenger, so My punishment was justified.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: These ˹pagans˺ are awaiting nothing but a single Blast that cannot be stopped.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
quran.ayah_en: They say ˹mockingly˺, “Our Lord! Hasten for us our share ˹of the punishment˺ before the Day of Reckoning.”

quran.ayah_ar: ٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
quran.ayah_en: Be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say. And remember Our servant, David, the man of strength. Indeed, he ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا ٱلْجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ
quran.ayah_en: We truly subjected the mountains to hymn ˹Our praises˺ along with him in the evening and after sunrise.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةًۭ ۖ كُلٌّۭ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: And ˹We subjected˺ the birds, flocking together. All turned to him ˹echoing his hymns˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ
quran.ayah_en: We strengthened his kingship, and gave him wisdom and sound judgment.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا۟ ٱلْمِحْرَابَ
quran.ayah_en: Has the story of the two plaintiffs, who scaled the ˹wall of David’s˺ sanctuary, reached you ˹O Prophet˺?

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَٱهْدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ
quran.ayah_en: When they came into David’s presence, he was startled by them. They said, “Have no fear. ˹We are merely˺ two in a dispute: one of us has wronged the other. So judge between us with truth—do not go beyond ˹it˺—and guide us to the right way.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَآ أَخِى لَهُۥ تِسْعٌۭ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةًۭ وَلِىَ نَعْجَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى ٱلْخِطَابِ
quran.ayah_en: This is my brother. He has ninety-nine sheep while I have ˹only˺ one. ˹Still˺ he asked me to give it up to him, overwhelming me with ˹his˺ argument.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبْغِى بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَقَلِيلٌۭ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّٰهُ فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًۭا وَأَنَابَ ۩
quran.ayah_en: David ˹eventually˺ ruled, “He has definitely wronged you in demanding ˹to add˺ your sheep to his. And certainly many partners wrong each other, except those who believe and do good—but how few are they!” Then David realized that We had tested him so he asked for his Lord’s forgiveness, fell down in prostration, and turned ˹to Him in repentance˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: So We forgave that for him. And he will indeed have ˹a status of˺ closeness to Us and an honourable destination!

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَٰكَ خَلِيفَةًۭ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا نَسُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْحِسَابِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹We instructed him:˺ “O David! We have surely made you an authority in the land, so judge between people with truth. And do not follow ˹your˺ desires or they will lead you astray from Allah’s Way. Surely those who go astray from Allah’s Way will suffer a severe punishment for neglecting the Day of Reckoning.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَٰطِلًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: We have not created the heavens and earth and everything in between without purpose—as the disbelievers think. So woe to the disbelievers because of the Fire!

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلْفُجَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: Or should We treat those who believe and do good like those who make mischief throughout the land? Or should We treat the righteous like the wicked?

quran.ayah_ar: كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَٰرَكٌۭ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹This is˺ a blessed Book which We have revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺ so that they may contemplate its verses, and people of reason may be mindful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَٰنَ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
quran.ayah_en: And We blessed David with Solomon—what an excellent servant ˹he was˺! Indeed, he ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ ٱلصَّٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلْجِيَادُ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Remember˺ when the well-trained, swift horses were paraded before him in the evening.

quran.ayah_ar: فَقَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ ٱلْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّى حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِٱلْحِجَابِ
quran.ayah_en: He then proclaimed, “I am truly in love with ˹these˺ fine things out of remembrance for Allah,” until they went out of sight.

quran.ayah_ar: رُدُّوهَا عَلَىَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹He ordered,˺ “Bring them back to me!” Then he began to rub down their legs and necks.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَٰنَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدًۭا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
quran.ayah_en: And indeed, We tested Solomon, placing a ˹deformed˺ body on his throne, then he turned ˹to Allah in repentance˺.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًۭا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍۢ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
quran.ayah_en: He prayed, “My Lord! Forgive me, and grant me an authority that will never be matched by anyone after me. You are indeed the Giver ˹of all bounties˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
quran.ayah_en: So We subjected to him the wind, blowing gently at his command to wherever he pleased.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّآءٍۢ وَغَوَّاصٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And ˹We subjected to him˺ every builder and diver of the jinn,

quran.ayah_ar: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ
quran.ayah_en: and others bound together in chains.

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Allah said,˺ “This is Our gift, so give or withhold ˹as you wish˺, never to be called to account.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And he will indeed have ˹a status of˺ closeness to Us and an honourable destination!

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ بِنُصْبٍۢ وَعَذَابٍ
quran.ayah_en: And remember Our servant Job, when he cried out to his Lord, “Satan has afflicted me with distress and suffering.”

quran.ayah_ar: ٱرْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌۢ بَارِدٌۭ وَشَرَابٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: ˹We responded,˺ “Stomp your foot: ˹now˺ here is a cool ˹and refreshing˺ spring for washing and drinking.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةًۭ مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
quran.ayah_en: And We gave him back his family, twice as many, as a mercy from Us and a lesson for people of reason.

quran.ayah_ar: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًۭا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَٰهُ صَابِرًۭا ۚ نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: ˹And We said to him,˺ “Take in your hand a bundle of grass, and strike ˹your wife˺ with it, and do not break your oath.” We truly found him patient. What an excellent servant ˹he was˺! Indeed, he ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَٰرِ
quran.ayah_en: And remember Our servants: Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob—the men of strength and insight.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَخْلَصْنَٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٍۢ ذِكْرَى ٱلدَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: We truly chose them for the honour of proclaiming the Hereafter.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
quran.ayah_en: And in Our sight they are truly among the chosen and the finest.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
quran.ayah_en: Also remember Ishmael, Elisha, and Ⱬul-Kifl. All are among the best.

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذَا ذِكْرٌۭ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: This is ˹all˺ a reminder. And the righteous will certainly have an honourable destination:

quran.ayah_ar: جَنَّٰتِ عَدْنٍۢ مُّفَتَّحَةًۭ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ
quran.ayah_en: the Gardens of Eternity, whose gates will be open for them.

quran.ayah_ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَٰكِهَةٍۢ كَثِيرَةٍۢ وَشَرَابٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: There they will recline, calling for abundant fruit and drink.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
quran.ayah_en: And with them will be maidens of modest gaze and equal age.

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
quran.ayah_en: This is what you are promised for the Day of Reckoning.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ
quran.ayah_en: This is indeed Our provision that will never end.

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: That is that. And the transgressors will certainly have the worst destination:

quran.ayah_ar: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
quran.ayah_en: Hell, where they will burn. What an evil place to rest!

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌۭ وَغَسَّاقٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Let them then taste this: boiling water and ˹oozing˺ pus,

quran.ayah_ar: وَءَاخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجٌ
quran.ayah_en: and other torments of the same sort!

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذَا فَوْجٌۭ مُّقْتَحِمٌۭ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹The misleaders will say to one another,˺ “Here is a crowd ˹of followers˺ being thrown in with us. They are not welcome, ˹for˺ they ˹too˺ will burn in the Fire.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ
quran.ayah_en: The followers will respond, “No! You are not welcome! You brought this upon us. What an evil place for settlement!”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًۭا ضِعْفًۭا فِى ٱلنَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: Adding, “Our Lord! Whoever brought this upon us, double their punishment in the Fire.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًۭا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ
quran.ayah_en: The tyrants will ask ˹one another˺, “But why do we not see those we considered to be lowly?

quran.ayah_ar: أَتَّخَذْنَٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَٰرُ
quran.ayah_en: Were we wrong in mocking them ˹in the world˺? Or do our eyes ˹just˺ fail to see them ˹in the Fire˺?”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّۭ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: This dispute between the residents of the Fire will certainly come to pass.

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌۭ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I am only a warner. And there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Allah—the One, the Supreme.

quran.ayah_ar: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّٰرُ
quran.ayah_en: ˹He is the˺ Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between—the Almighty, Most Forgiving.”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَؤٌا۟ عَظِيمٌ
quran.ayah_en: Say, “This ˹Quran˺ is momentous news,

quran.ayah_ar: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
quran.ayah_en: from which you ˹pagans˺ are turning away.”

quran.ayah_ar: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹And say,˺ “I had no knowledge of the highest assembly ˹in heaven˺ when they differed ˹concerning Adam˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
quran.ayah_en: What is revealed to me is that I am only sent with a clear warning.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًۭا مِّن طِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Remember, O  Prophet˺ when your Lord said to the angels, “I am going to create a human being from clay.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So when I have fashioned him and had a spirit of My Own ˹creation˺ breathed into him, fall down in prostration to him.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: So the angels prostrated all together—

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ ٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: but not Iblis, becoming unfaithful.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَىَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْعَالِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Allah asked, “O Iblis! What prevented you from prostrating to what I created with My Own Hands? Did you ˹just˺ become proud? Or have you always been arrogant?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍۢ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: He replied, “I am better than he is: You created me from fire and him from clay.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Allah commanded, “Then get out of Paradise, for you are truly cursed.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: And surely upon you is My condemnation until the Day of Judgment.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Satan appealed, “My Lord! Then delay my end until the Day of their resurrection.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Allah said, “You will be delayed

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
quran.ayah_en: until the appointed Day.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Satan said, “By Your Glory! I will certainly mislead them all,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
quran.ayah_en: except Your chosen servants among them.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالَ فَٱلْحَقُّ وَٱلْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
quran.ayah_en: Allah concluded, “The truth is—and I ˹only˺ say the truth—:

quran.ayah_ar: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
quran.ayah_en: I will surely fill up Hell with you and whoever follows you from among them, all together.”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍۢ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹Quran˺, nor do I pretend to be someone I am not.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: It is only a reminder to the whole world.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعْدَ حِينٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: And you will certainly know its truth before long.”

quran.ayah_ar: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: The revelation of this Book is from Allah—the Almighty, All-Wise.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَٱعْبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًۭا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We have sent down the Book to you ˹O Prophet˺ in truth, so worship Allah ˹alone˺, being sincerely devoted to Him.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْخَالِصُ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِى مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَنْ هُوَ كَٰذِبٌۭ كَفَّارٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, sincere devotion is due ˹only˺ to Allah. As for those who take other lords besides Him, ˹saying,˺ “We worship them only so they may bring us closer to Allah,” surely Allah will judge between all regarding what they differed about. Allah certainly does not guide whoever persists in lying and disbelief.

quran.ayah_ar: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًۭا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
quran.ayah_en: Had it been Allah’s Will to have offspring, He could have chosen whatever He willed of His creation. Glory be to Him! He is Allah—the One, the Supreme.

quran.ayah_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ عَلَى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ ٱلنَّهَارَ عَلَى ٱلَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّۭ يَجْرِى لِأَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّٰرُ
quran.ayah_en: He created the heavens and the earth for a purpose. He wraps the night around the day, and wraps the day around the night. And He has subjected the sun and the moon, each orbiting for an appointed term. He is truly the Almighty, Most Forgiving.

quran.ayah_ar: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍۢ وَٰحِدَةٍۢ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنْعَٰمِ ثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍۢ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمْ خَلْقًۭا مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍۢ فِى ظُلُمَٰتٍۢ ثَلَٰثٍۢ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ ۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
quran.ayah_en: He created you ˹all˺ from a single soul, That is Allah—your Lord! All authority belongs to Him. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. How can you then be turned away?

quran.ayah_ar: إِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا۟ يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌۭ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
quran.ayah_en: If you disbelieve, then ˹know that˺ Allah is truly not in need of you, nor does He approve of disbelief from His servants. But if you become grateful ˹through faith˺, He will appreciate that from you. No soul burdened with sin will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you of what you used to do. He certainly knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ ضُرٌّۭ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعْمَةًۭ مِّنْهُ نَسِىَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مِن قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًۭا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: When one is touched with hardship, they cry out to their Lord, turning to Him ˹alone˺. But as soon as He showers them with blessings from Him, they ˹totally˺ forget the One they had cried to earlier, and set up equals to Allah to mislead ˹others˺ from His Way. Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Enjoy your disbelief for a little while! You will certainly be one of the inmates of the Fire.”

quran.ayah_ar: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيْلِ سَاجِدًۭا وَقَآئِمًۭا يَحْذَرُ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُوا۟ رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِۦ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Are they better˺ or those who worship ˹their Lord˺ devoutly in the hours of the night, prostrating and standing, fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of their Lord? Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Are those who know equal to those who do not know?” None will be mindful ˹of this˺ except people of reason.

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ يَٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌۭ ۗ وَأَرْضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Say ˹O Prophet, that Allah says˺, “O My servants who believe! Be mindful of your Lord. Those who do good in this world will have a good reward. And Allah’s earth is spacious. Only those who endure patiently will be given their reward without limit.”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًۭا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, “I am commanded to worship Allah, being sincerely devoted to Him ˹alone˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And I am commanded to be the first of those who submit ˹to His Will˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Say, “I truly fear—if I were to disobey my Lord—the torment of a tremendous Day.”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًۭا لَّهُۥ دِينِى
quran.ayah_en: Say, “It is ˹only˺ Allah that I worship, being sincere in my devotion to Him.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱعْبُدُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْخَٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
quran.ayah_en: Worship then whatever ˹gods˺ you want instead of Him.” Say, “The ˹true˺ losers are those who will lose themselves and their families on Judgment Day. That is indeed the clearest loss.”

quran.ayah_ar: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥ ۚ يَٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ
quran.ayah_en: They will have layers of fire above and below them. That is what Allah warns His servants with. So fear Me, O  My servants!

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَنَبُوا۟ ٱلطَّٰغُوتَ أَن يَعْبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ ۚ فَبَشِّرْ عِبَادِ
quran.ayah_en: And those who shun the worship of false gods, turning to Allah ˹alone˺, will have good news. So give good news to My servants ˹O Prophet˺—

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقَوْلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحْسَنَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
quran.ayah_en: those who listen to what is said and follow the best of it. These are the ones ˹rightly˺ guided by Allah, and these are ˹truly˺ the people of reason.

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَمَنْ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: What about those against whom the decree of torment has been justified? Is it you ˹O Prophet˺ who will then save those bound for the Fire?

quran.ayah_ar: لَٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ لَهُمْ غُرَفٌۭ مِّن فَوْقِهَا غُرَفٌۭ مَّبْنِيَّةٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
quran.ayah_en: But those mindful of their Lord will have ˹elevated˺ mansions, built one above the other, under which rivers flow. ˹That is˺ the promise of Allah. ˹And˺ Allah never fails in ˹His˺ promise.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَٰبِيعَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًۭا مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّۭا ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُۥ حُطَٰمًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
quran.ayah_en: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky—channelling it through streams in the earth—then produces with it crops of various colours, then they dry up and you see them wither, and then He reduces them to chaff? Surely in this is a reminder for people of reason.

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ ٱللَّهُ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَٰمِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْقَٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ فِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
quran.ayah_en: Can ˹the misguided be like˺ those whose hearts Allah has opened to Islam, so they are enlightened by their Lord? So woe to those whose hearts are hardened at the remembrance of Allah! It is they who are clearly astray.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ كِتَٰبًۭا مُّتَشَٰبِهًۭا مَّثَانِىَ تَقْشَعِرُّ مِنْهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمْ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
quran.ayah_en: ˹It is˺ Allah ˹Who˺ has sent down the best message—a Book of perfect consistency and repeated lessons—which causes the skin ˹and hearts˺ of those who fear their Lord to tremble, then their skin and hearts soften at the mention of ˹the mercy of˺ Allah. That is the guidance of Allah, through which He guides whoever He wills. But whoever Allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide.

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِى بِوَجْهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ ۚ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Are those who will only have their ˹bare˺ faces to shield themselves from the awful torment on Judgment Day ˹better than those in Paradise˺? It will ˹then˺ be said to the wrongdoers: “Reap what you sowed!”

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Those before them ˹also˺ rejected ˹the truth˺, then the torment came upon them from where they least expected.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخِزْىَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: So Allah made them taste humiliation in this worldly life, but far worse is the punishment of the Hereafter, if only they knew.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍۢ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: We have certainly set forth every ˹kind of˺ lesson for people in this Quran, so perhaps they will be mindful.

quran.ayah_ar: قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيْرَ ذِى عِوَجٍۢ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹It is˺ a Quran ˹revealed˺ in Arabic without any crookedness, so perhaps they will be conscious ˹of Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًۭا رَّجُلًۭا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلًۭا سَلَمًۭا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًا ۚ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Allah sets forth the parable of a slave owned by several quarrelsome masters, and a slave owned by only one master. Are they equal in condition? Praise be to Allah! In fact, most of them do not know.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٌۭ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ
quran.ayah_en: You ˹O Prophet˺ will certainly die, and they will die too.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمْ تَخْتَصِمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Then on the Day of Judgment you will ˹all settle your˺ dispute before your Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ إِذْ جَآءَهُۥٓ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًۭى لِّلْكَٰفِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Who then does more wrong than those who lie about Allah and reject the truth after it has reached them? Is Hell not a ˹fitting˺ home for the disbelievers?

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ ۙ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And the one who has brought the truth and those who embrace it—it is they who are the righteous.

quran.ayah_ar: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They will have whatever they desire with their Lord. That is the reward of the good-doers.

quran.ayah_ar: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ أَسْوَأَ ٱلَّذِى عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِيَهُمْ أَجْرَهُم بِأَحْسَنِ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: As such, Allah will absolve them of ˹even˺ the worst of what they did and reward them according to the best of what they used to do.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبْدَهُۥ ۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Is Allah not sufficient for His servant? Yet they threaten you with other ˹powerless˺ gods besides Him! Whoever Allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّ ۗ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٍۢ ذِى ٱنتِقَامٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And whoever Allah guides, none can lead astray. Is Allah not Almighty, capable of punishment?

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قُلْ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَادَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلْ هُنَّ كَٰشِفَٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوْ أَرَادَنِى بِرَحْمَةٍ هَلْ هُنَّ مُمْسِكَٰتُ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ عَلَيْهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: If you ask them ˹O Prophet˺ who created the heavens and the earth, they will certainly say, “Allah!” Ask ˹them˺, “Consider then whatever ˹idols˺ you invoke besides Allah: if it was Allah’s Will to harm me, could they undo that harm? Or if He willed ˹some˺ mercy for me, could they withhold His mercy?” Say, “Allah is sufficient for me. In Him ˹alone˺ the faithful put their trust.”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ يَٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَٰمِلٌۭ ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “O my people! Persist in your ways, for I ˹too˺ will persist in mine. You will soon come to know

quran.ayah_ar: مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌۭ يُخْزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌۭ مُّقِيمٌ
quran.ayah_en: who will be visited by a humiliating torment ˹in this life˺ and overwhelmed by an everlasting punishment ˹in the next˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ لِلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍ
quran.ayah_en: Surely We have revealed to you the Book ˹O Prophet˺ with the truth for humanity. So whoever chooses to be guided, it is for their own good. And whoever chooses to stray, it is only to their own loss. You are not a keeper over them.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلْأَنفُسَ حِينَ مَوْتِهَا وَٱلَّتِى لَمْ تَمُتْ فِى مَنَامِهَا ۖ فَيُمْسِكُ ٱلَّتِى قَضَىٰ عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ وَيُرْسِلُ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹It is˺ Allah ˹Who˺ calls back the souls ˹of people˺ upon their death as well as ˹the souls˺ of the living during their sleep. Then He keeps those for whom He has ordained death, and releases the others until ˹their˺ appointed time. Surely in this are signs for people who reflect.

quran.ayah_ar: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَ ۚ قُلْ أَوَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or have they taken others besides Allah as intercessors? Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “˹Would they do so,˺ even though those ˹idols˺ have neither authority nor intelligence?”

quran.ayah_ar: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ جَمِيعًۭا ۖ لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, “All intercession belongs to Allah ˹alone˺. To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. Then to Him you will ˹all˺ be returned.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ ٱشْمَأَزَّتْ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ ۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Yet when Allah alone is mentioned, the hearts of those who disbelieve in the Hereafter are filled with disgust. But as soon as those ˹gods˺ other than Him are mentioned, they are filled with joy.

quran.ayah_ar: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ عَٰلِمَ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحْكُمُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِكَ فِى مَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “O Allah—Originator of the heavens and the earth, Knower of the seen and unseen! You will judge between Your servants regarding their differences.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَوْ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا وَمِثْلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفْتَدَوْا۟ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ ۚ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَحْتَسِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Even if the wrongdoers were to possess everything in the world twice over, they would certainly offer it to ransom themselves from the horrible punishment on Judgment Day, for they will see from Allah what they had never expected.

quran.ayah_ar: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds will unfold before them, and they will be overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ ضُرٌّۭ دَعَانَا ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلْنَٰهُ نِعْمَةًۭ مِّنَّا قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍۭ ۚ بَلْ هِىَ فِتْنَةٌۭ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: When one is touched with hardship, they cry out to Us ˹alone˺. Then when We shower Our blessings upon them, they say, “I have been granted all this only because of ˹my˺ knowledge.” Not at all! It is ˹no more than˺ a test. But most of them do not know.

quran.ayah_ar: قَدْ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: The same had already been said by those ˹destroyed˺ before them, but their ˹worldly˺ gains were of no benefit to them.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَصَابَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَمَا هُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds overtook them. And the wrongdoers among these ˹pagans˺ will be overtaken by the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds. And they will have no escape.

quran.ayah_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Do they not know that Allah gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills? Surely in this are signs for people who believe.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ قُلْ يَٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet, that Allah says,˺ “O My servants who have exceeded the limits against their souls! Do not lose hope in Allah’s mercy, for Allah certainly forgives all sins. He is indeed the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنِيبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَأَسْلِمُوا۟ لَهُۥ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Turn to your Lord ˹in repentance˺, and ˹fully˺ submit to Him before the punishment reaches you, ˹for˺ then you will not be helped.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱتَّبِعُوٓا۟ أَحْسَنَ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ بَغْتَةًۭ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Follow ˹the Quran,˺ the best of what has been revealed to you from your Lord, before the punishment takes you by surprise while you are unaware,

quran.ayah_ar: أَن تَقُولَ نَفْسٌۭ يَٰحَسْرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِى جَنۢبِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّٰخِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: so that no ˹sinful˺ soul will say ˹on Judgment Day˺, ‘Woe to me for neglecting ˹my duties towards˺ Allah, while ridiculing ˹the truth˺.’

quran.ayah_ar: أَوْ تَقُولَ لَوْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Or ˹a soul will˺ say, ‘If only Allah had guided me, I would have certainly been one of the righteous.’

quran.ayah_ar: أَوْ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى ٱلْعَذَابَ لَوْ أَنَّ لِى كَرَّةًۭ فَأَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Or say, upon seeing the torment, ‘If only I had a second chance, I would have been one of the good-doers.’

quran.ayah_ar: بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَتْكَ ءَايَٰتِى فَكَذَّبْتَ بِهَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرْتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Not at all! My revelations had already come to you, but you rejected them, acted arrogantly, and were one of the disbelievers.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ تَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وُجُوهُهُم مُّسْوَدَّةٌ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًۭى لِّلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: On the Day of Judgment you will see those who lied about Allah with their faces gloomy. Is Hell not a ˹fitting˺ home for the arrogant?

quran.ayah_ar: وَيُنَجِّى ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ بِمَفَازَتِهِمْ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And Allah will deliver those who were mindful ˹of Him˺ to their place of ˹ultimate˺ triumph. No evil will touch them, nor will they grieve.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَكِيلٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the Maintainer of everything.

quran.ayah_ar: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَٰسِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: To Him belong the keys ˹of the treasuries˺ of the heavens and the earth. As for those who rejected the signs of Allah, it is they who will be the ˹true˺ losers.

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ أَفَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأْمُرُوٓنِّىٓ أَعْبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلْجَٰهِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Are you urging me to worship ˹anyone˺ other than Allah, O  ignorant ones?”

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكَ لَئِنْ أَشْرَكْتَ لَيَحْبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْخَٰسِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: It has already been revealed to you—and to those ˹prophets˺ before you—that if you associate others ˹with Allah˺, your deeds will certainly be void and you will truly be one of the losers.

quran.ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعْبُدْ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Rather, worship Allah ˹alone˺ and be one of the grateful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦ وَٱلْأَرْضُ جَمِيعًۭا قَبْضَتُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ مَطْوِيَّٰتٌۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They have not shown Allah His proper reverence—when on the Day of Judgment the ˹whole˺ earth will be in His Grip, and the heavens will be rolled up in His Right Hand. Glorified and Exalted is He above what they associate ˹with Him˺!

quran.ayah_ar: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ نُفِخَ فِيهِ أُخْرَىٰ فَإِذَا هُمْ قِيَامٌۭ يَنظُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: The Trumpet will be blown and all those in the heavens and all those on the earth will fall dead, except those Allah wills ˹to spare˺. Then it will be blown again and they will rise up at once, looking on ˹in anticipation˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَشْرَقَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِنُورِ رَبِّهَا وَوُضِعَ ٱلْكِتَٰبُ وَجِا۟ىٓءَ بِٱلنَّبِيِّۦنَ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءِ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: The earth will shine with the light of its Lord, the record ˹of deeds˺ will be laid ˹open˺, the prophets and the witnesses will be brought forward—and judgment will be passed on all with fairness. None will be wronged.

quran.ayah_ar: وَوُفِّيَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ مَّا عَمِلَتْ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَفْعَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Every soul will be paid in full for its deeds, for Allah knows best what they have done.

quran.ayah_ar: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ رُسُلٌۭ مِّنكُمْ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّكُمْ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَٰذَا ۚ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنْ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Those who disbelieved will be driven to Hell in ˹successive˺ groups. When they arrive there, its gates will be opened and its keepers will ask them: “Did messengers not come to you from among yourselves, reciting to you the revelations of your Lord and warning you of the coming of this Day of yours?” The disbelievers will cry, “Yes ˹indeed˺! But the decree of torment has come to pass against the disbelievers.”

quran.ayah_ar: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلُوٓا۟ أَبْوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: It will be said to them, “Enter the gates of Hell, to stay there forever.” What an evil home for the arrogant!

quran.ayah_ar: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْجَنَّةِ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ طِبْتُمْ فَٱدْخُلُوهَا خَٰلِدِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And those who were mindful of their Lord will be led to Paradise in ˹successive˺ groups. When they arrive at its ˹already˺ open gates, its keepers will say, “Peace be upon you! You have done well, so come in, to stay forever.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى صَدَقَنَا وَعْدَهُۥ وَأَوْرَثَنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ حَيْثُ نَشَآءُ ۖ فَنِعْمَ أَجْرُ ٱلْعَٰمِلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: The righteous will say, “Praise be to Allah Who has fulfilled His promise to us, and made us inherit the ˹everlasting˺ land to settle in Paradise wherever we please.” How excellent is the reward of those who work ˹righteousness˺!

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَرَى ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنْ حَوْلِ ٱلْعَرْشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَقِيلَ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: You will see the angels all around the Throne, glorifying the praises of their Lord, for judgment will have been passed on all with fairness. And it will be said, “Praise be to Allah—Lord of all worlds!”

quran.ayah_ar: حمٓ
quran.ayah_en: ha-Mĩm.

quran.ayah_ar: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: The revelation of this Book is from Allah—the Almighty, All-Knowing,

quran.ayah_ar: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوْبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلْعِقَابِ ذِى ٱلطَّوْلِ ۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ إِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
quran.ayah_en: the Forgiver of sin and Accepter of repentance, the Severe in punishment, and Infinite in bounty. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. To Him ˹alone˺  is the final return.

quran.ayah_ar: مَا يُجَٰدِلُ فِىٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَلَا يَغْرُرْكَ تَقَلُّبُهُمْ فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
quran.ayah_en: None disputes the signs of Allah except the disbelievers, so do not be deceived by their prosperity throughout the land.

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ وَٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۖ وَهَمَّتْ كُلُّ أُمَّةٍۭ بِرَسُولِهِمْ لِيَأْخُذُوهُ ۖ وَجَٰدَلُوا۟ بِٱلْبَٰطِلِ لِيُدْحِضُوا۟ بِهِ ٱلْحَقَّ فَأَخَذْتُهُمْ ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ
quran.ayah_en: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth˺, as did ˹other˺ enemy forces afterwards. Every community plotted against its prophet to seize him, and argued in falsehood, ˹hoping˺ to discredit the truth with it. So I seized them. And how ˹horrible˺ was My punishment!

quran.ayah_ar: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: And so your Lord’s decree has been proven true against the disbelievers—that they will be the inmates of the Fire.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يَحْمِلُونَ ٱلْعَرْشَ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهُۥ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ وَيُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَسْتَغْفِرُونَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ رَبَّنَا وَسِعْتَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍۢ رَّحْمَةًۭ وَعِلْمًۭا فَٱغْفِرْ لِلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ سَبِيلَكَ وَقِهِمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: Those ˹angels˺ who carry the Throne and those around it glorify the praises of their Lord, have faith in Him, and seek forgiveness for the believers, ˹praying:˺ “Our Lord! You encompass everything in ˹Your˺ mercy and knowledge. So forgive those who repent and follow Your Way, and protect them from the torment of the Hellfire.

quran.ayah_ar: رَبَّنَا وَأَدْخِلْهُمْ جَنَّٰتِ عَدْنٍ ٱلَّتِى وَعَدتَّهُمْ وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنْ ءَابَآئِهِمْ وَأَزْوَٰجِهِمْ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: Our Lord! Admit them into the Gardens of Eternity which You have promised them, along with the righteous among their parents, spouses, and descendants. You ˹alone˺ are truly the Almighty, All-Wise.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقِهِمُ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ ۚ وَمَن تَقِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ فَقَدْ رَحِمْتَهُۥ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: And protect them from ˹the consequences of their˺ evil deeds. For whoever You protect from the evil of their deeds on that Day will have been shown Your mercy. That is ˹truly˺ the ultimate triumph.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُنَادَوْنَ لَمَقْتُ ٱللَّهِ أَكْبَرُ مِن مَّقْتِكُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ إِذْ تُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلْإِيمَٰنِ فَتَكْفُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, it will be announced to the disbelievers, “Allah’s contempt for you—as you disbelieved when invited to belief—was far worse than your contempt for one another ˹Today˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ أَمَتَّنَا ٱثْنَتَيْنِ وَأَحْيَيْتَنَا ٱثْنَتَيْنِ فَٱعْتَرَفْنَا بِذُنُوبِنَا فَهَلْ إِلَىٰ خُرُوجٍۢ مِّن سَبِيلٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: They will plead, “Our Lord! You made us lifeless twice, and gave us life twice. Now we confess our sins. So is there any way out?”

quran.ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّهُۥٓ إِذَا دُعِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُۥ كَفَرْتُمْ ۖ وَإِن يُشْرَكْ بِهِۦ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ ۚ فَٱلْحُكْمُ لِلَّهِ ٱلْعَلِىِّ ٱلْكَبِيرِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will be told,˺ “˹No!˺ This is because when Allah alone was invoked, you ˹staunchly˺ disbelieved. But when others were associated with Him ˹in worship˺, you ˹readily˺ believed. So ˹Today˺ judgment belongs to Allah ˹alone˺—the Most High, All-Great.”

quran.ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُرِيكُمْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقًۭا ۚ وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ
quran.ayah_en: He is the One Who shows you His signs and sends down ˹rain as˺ a provision for you from the sky. ˹But˺ none will be mindful except those who turn ˹to Him˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱدْعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: So call upon Allah with sincere devotion, even to the dismay of the disbelievers.

quran.ayah_ar: رَفِيعُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتِ ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ يُلْقِى ٱلرُّوحَ مِنْ أَمْرِهِۦ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ لِيُنذِرَ يَوْمَ ٱلتَّلَاقِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹He is˺ Highly Exalted in rank, Lord of the Throne. He sends down the revelation by His command to whoever He wills of His servants to warn ˹all˺ of the Day of Meeting—

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ هُم بَٰرِزُونَ ۖ لَا يَخْفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنْهُمْ شَىْءٌۭ ۚ لِّمَنِ ٱلْمُلْكُ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ لِلَّهِ ٱلْوَٰحِدِ ٱلْقَهَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: the Day all will appear ˹before Allah˺. Nothing about them will be hidden from Him. ˹He will ask,˺ “Who does all authority belong to this Day? To Allah—the One, the Supreme!

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلْيَوْمَ تُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ ۚ لَا ظُلْمَ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلْحِسَابِ
quran.ayah_en: Today every soul will be rewarded for what it has done. No injustice Today! Surely Allah is swift in reckoning.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْءَازِفَةِ إِذِ ٱلْقُلُوبُ لَدَى ٱلْحَنَاجِرِ كَٰظِمِينَ ۚ مَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ مِنْ حَمِيمٍۢ وَلَا شَفِيعٍۢ يُطَاعُ
quran.ayah_en: Warn them ˹O Prophet˺ of the approaching Day when the hearts will jump into the throats, suppressing distress. The wrongdoers will have neither a close friend nor intercessor to be heard.

quran.ayah_ar: يَعْلَمُ خَآئِنَةَ ٱلْأَعْيُنِ وَمَا تُخْفِى ٱلصُّدُورُ
quran.ayah_en: Allah ˹even˺ knows the sly glances of the eyes and whatever the hearts conceal.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ يَقْضِى بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَقْضُونَ بِشَىْءٍ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْبَصِيرُ
quran.ayah_en: And Allah judges with the truth, while those ˹idols˺ they invoke besides Him cannot judge at all. Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ is the All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُوا۟ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَانُوا۟ هُمْ أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةًۭ وَءَاثَارًۭا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَاقٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Have they not travelled throughout the land to see what was the end of those ˹destroyed˺ before them? They were far superior in might and ˹richer in˺ monuments throughout the land. But Allah seized them for their sins, and they had no protector from Allah.
