quran.ayah_ar: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًۭا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
quran.ayah_en: The wrongdoers will certainly have a share ˹of the torment˺ like that of their predecessors. So do not let them ask Me to hasten ˹it˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe then to the disbelievers when they face their Day which they are warned of!

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلطُّورِ
quran.ayah_en: By Mount Ṭûr!

quran.ayah_ar: وَكِتَٰبٍۢ مَّسْطُورٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And by the Book written

quran.ayah_ar: فِى رَقٍّۢ مَّنشُورٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: on open pages ˹for all to read˺!

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
quran.ayah_en: And by the ˹Sacred˺ House frequently visited!

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
quran.ayah_en: And by the canopy raised ˹high˺!

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
quran.ayah_en: And by the seas set on fire!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will come to pass—

quran.ayah_ar: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: none will avert it—

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: on the Day the heavens will be shaken violently,

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and the mountains will be blown away entirely.

quran.ayah_ar: فَوَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Then woe on that Day to the deniers—

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍۢ يَلْعَبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: those who amuse themselves with falsehood!

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
quran.ayah_en: ˹It is˺ the Day they will be fiercely shoved into the Fire of Hell.

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Fire which you used to deny.

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Is this magic, or do you not see?

quran.ayah_ar: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Burn in it! It is the same whether you endure ˹it˺ patiently or not. You are only rewarded for what you used to do.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَنَعِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, the righteous will be in Gardens and bliss,

quran.ayah_ar: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: enjoying whatever their Lord will have granted them. And their Lord will have protected them from the torment of the Hellfire.

quran.ayah_ar: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”

quran.ayah_ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍۢ مَّصْفُوفَةٍۢ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: They will be reclining on thrones, ˹neatly˺ lined up ˹facing each other˺. And We will pair them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍۢ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: As for those who believe and whose descendants follow them in faith, We will elevate their descendants to their rank, never discounting anything ˹of the reward˺ of their deeds. Every person will reap only what they sowed.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمْدَدْنَٰهُم بِفَٰكِهَةٍۢ وَلَحْمٍۢ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And We will ˹continually˺ provide them with whatever fruit or meat they desire.

quran.ayah_ar: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًۭا لَّا لَغْوٌۭ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: They will pass around to each other a drink ˹of pure wine,˺ which leads to no idle talk or sinfulness.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌۭ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌۭ مَّكْنُونٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: And they will be waited on by their youthful servants like spotless pearls.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They will turn to one another inquisitively.

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: They will say, “Before ˹this reward˺ we used to be in awe ˹of Allah˺ in the midst of our people.

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
quran.ayah_en: So Allah has graced us and protected us from the torment of ˹Hell’s˺ scorching heat.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, we used to call upon Him ˹alone˺ before. He is truly the Most Kind, Most Merciful.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍۢ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
quran.ayah_en: So ˹continue to˺ remind ˹all, O  Prophet˺. For you, by the grace of your Lord, are not a fortune-teller or a madman.

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌۭ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
quran.ayah_en: Or do they say, “˹He is˺ a poet, for whom we ˹eagerly˺ await an ill-fate!”?

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, “Keep waiting! I too am waiting with you.”

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ طَاغُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or do their ˹intelligent˺ minds prompt them to this ˹paradox˺? Or are they ˹just˺ a transgressing people?

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or do they say, “He made this ˹Quran˺ up!”? In fact, they have no faith.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍۢ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَٰدِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Let them then produce something like it, if what they say is true!

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَٰلِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or were they created by nothing, or are they ˹their own˺ creators?

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? In fact, they have no firm belief ˹in Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or do they possess the treasuries of your Lord, or are they in control ˹of everything˺?

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌۭ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
quran.ayah_en: Or do they have a stairway, by which they eavesdrop ˹on the heavens˺? Then let those who do so bring a compelling proof.

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or does He have daughters ˹as you claim˺, while you ˹prefer to˺ have sons?

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًۭا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍۢ مُّثْقَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or are you ˹O Prophet˺ asking them for a reward ˹for the message˺ so that they are overburdened by debt?

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or do they have access to ˹the Record in˺ the unseen, so they copy it ˹for all to see˺?

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًۭا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or do they intend to scheme ˹against the Prophet˺? Then it is the disbelievers who will fall victim to ˹their˺ schemes.

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Or do they have a god other than Allah? Glorified is Allah far above what they associate ˹with Him˺!

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًۭا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌۭ مَّرْكُومٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: If they were to see a ˹deadly˺ piece of the sky fall down ˹upon them˺, still they would say, “˹This is just˺ a pile of clouds.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: So leave them until they face their Day in which they will be struck dead—

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: the Day their scheming will be of no benefit to them whatsoever, nor will they be helped.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًۭا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Also, the wrongdoers will certainly have another torment before that ˹Day˺, but most of them do not know.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
quran.ayah_en: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, for you are truly under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes. And glorify the praises of your Lord when you rise.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
quran.ayah_en: And glorify Him during part of the night and at the fading of the stars.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: By the stars when they fade away!

quran.ayah_ar: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Your fellow man is neither misguided nor astray.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: Nor does he speak of his own whims.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْىٌۭ يُوحَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: It is only a revelation sent down ˹to him˺.

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَّمَهُۥ شَدِيدُ ٱلْقُوَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: He has been taught by one ˹angel˺ of mighty power

quran.ayah_ar: ذُو مِرَّةٍۢ فَٱسْتَوَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and great perfection, who once rose to ˹his˺ true form

quran.ayah_ar: وَهُوَ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: while on the highest point above the horizon,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: then he approached ˹the Prophet˺, coming so close

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ أَوْ أَدْنَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: that he was only two arms-lengths away or even less.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَوْحَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ مَآ أَوْحَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Then Allah revealed to His servant what He revealed ˹through Gabriel˺.

quran.ayah_ar: مَا كَذَبَ ٱلْفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: The ˹Prophet’s˺ heart did not doubt what he saw.

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَتُمَٰرُونَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: How can you ˹O pagans˺ then dispute with him regarding what he saw?

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ نَزْلَةً أُخْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And he certainly saw that ˹angel descend˺ a second time

quran.ayah_ar: عِندَ سِدْرَةِ ٱلْمُنتَهَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: at the Lote Tree of the most extreme limit ˹in the seventh heaven˺—

quran.ayah_ar: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: near which is the Garden of ˹Eternal˺ Residence—

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ يَغْشَى ٱلسِّدْرَةَ مَا يَغْشَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: while the Lote Tree was overwhelmed with ˹heavenly˺ splendours!

quran.ayah_ar: مَا زَاغَ ٱلْبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: The ˹Prophet’s˺ sight never wandered, nor did it overreach.

quran.ayah_ar: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: He certainly saw some of his Lord’s greatest signs.

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ ٱللَّٰتَ وَٱلْعُزَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Now, have you considered ˹the idols of˺ Lat and ’Uzza,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَنَوٰةَ ٱلثَّالِثَةَ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: and the third one, Manat, as well?

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَكُمُ ٱلذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Do you ˹prefer to˺ have sons while ˹you attribute˺ to Him daughters?

quran.ayah_ar: تِلْكَ إِذًۭا قِسْمَةٌۭ ضِيزَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: Then this is ˹truly˺ a biased distribution!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّآ أَسْمَآءٌۭ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَٰنٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى ٱلْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: These ˹idols˺ are mere names that you and your forefathers have made up—a practice Allah has never authorized. They follow nothing but ˹inherited˺ assumptions and whatever ˹their˺ souls desire, although ˹true˺ guidance has already come to them from their Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَٰنِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Or should every person ˹simply˺ have whatever ˹intercessors˺ they desire?

quran.ayah_ar: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْءَاخِرَةُ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: In fact, to Allah ˹alone˺ belongs this world and the next.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍۢ فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغْنِى شَفَٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرْضَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Imagine˺ how many ˹noble˺ angels are in the heavens! ˹Even˺ their intercession would be of no benefit whatsoever, until Allah gives permission to whoever He wills and ˹only for the people He˺ approves.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter label angels as female,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ شَيْـًۭٔا
quran.ayah_en: although they have no knowledge ˹in support˺ of this. They follow nothing but ˹inherited˺ assumptions. And surely assumptions can in no way replace the truth.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
quran.ayah_en: So turn away ˹O Prophet˺ from whoever has shunned Our Reminder, only seeking the ˹fleeting˺ life of this world.

quran.ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: This is the extent of their knowledge. Surely your Lord knows best who has strayed from His Way and who is ˹rightly˺ guided.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَٰٓـُٔوا۟ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ بِٱلْحُسْنَى
quran.ayah_en: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth so that He may reward the evildoers according to what they did, and reward the good-doers with the finest reward—

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَٰٓئِرَ ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَٰسِعُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌۭ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: those who avoid major sins and shameful deeds, despite ˹stumbling on˺ minor sins. Surely your Lord is infinite in forgiveness. He knew well what would become of you as He created you from the earth So do not ˹falsely˺ elevate yourselves. He knows best who is ˹truly˺ righteous.

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى تَوَلَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Have you seen the one who turned away ˹from Islam,˺

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَعْطَىٰ قَلِيلًۭا وَأَكْدَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹initially˺ paid a little ˹for his salvation˺, and then stopped?

quran.ayah_ar: أَعِندَهُۥ عِلْمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: Does he have the knowledge of the unseen so that he sees ˹the Hereafter˺?

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِى صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Or has he not been informed of what is in the Scripture of Moses,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلَّذِى وَفَّىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹that of˺ Abraham, who ˹perfectly˺ fulfilled ˹his covenant˺?

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌۭ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They state˺ that no soul burdened with sin will bear the burden of another,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and that each person will only have what they endeavoured towards,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُۥ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and that ˹the outcome of˺ their endeavours will be seen ˹in their record˺,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ يُجْزَىٰهُ ٱلْجَزَآءَ ٱلْأَوْفَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: then they will be fully rewarded,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلْمُنتَهَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and that to your Lord ˹alone˺ is the ultimate return ˹of all things˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Moreover, He is the One Who brings about joy and sadness.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا
quran.ayah_en: And He is the One Who gives life and causes death.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ خَلَقَ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And He created the pairs—males and females—

quran.ayah_ar: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: from a sperm-drop when it is emitted.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And it is upon Him to bring about re-creation.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَغْنَىٰ وَأَقْنَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And He is the One Who enriches and impoverishes.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلشِّعْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And He alone is the Lord of Sirius.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥٓ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا ٱلْأُولَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And He destroyed the first ˹people of˺ ’Ȃd,

quran.ayah_ar: وَثَمُودَا۟ فَمَآ أَبْقَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹then˺ Thamûd, sparing no one.

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍۢ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And before ˹that He destroyed˺ the people of Noah, who were truly far worse in wrongdoing and transgression.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And ˹it was˺ He ˹Who˺ turned the cities ˹of Sodom and Gomorrah˺ upside down.

quran.ayah_ar: فَغَشَّىٰهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: How overwhelming was what covered ˹them˺!

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Now, which of your Lord’s favours will you dispute?

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذَا نَذِيرٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلنُّذُرِ ٱلْأُولَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: This ˹Prophet˺ is a warner like earlier ones.

quran.ayah_ar: أَزِفَتِ ٱلْءَازِفَةُ
quran.ayah_en: The approaching ˹Hour˺ has drawn near.

quran.ayah_ar: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
quran.ayah_en: None but Allah can disclose it.

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَمِنْ هَٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Do you find this revelation astonishing,

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ
quran.ayah_en: laughing ˹at it˺ and not weeping ˹in awe˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنتُمْ سَٰمِدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: while persisting in heedlessness?

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَٱعْبُدُوا۟ ۩
quran.ayah_en: Instead, prostrate to Allah and worship ˹Him alone˺!

quran.ayah_ar: ٱقْتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلْقَمَرُ
quran.ayah_en: The Hour has drawn near and the moon was split ˹in two˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ ءَايَةًۭ يُعْرِضُوا۟ وَيَقُولُوا۟ سِحْرٌۭ مُّسْتَمِرٌّۭ
quran.ayah_en: Yet, whenever they see a sign, they turn away, saying, “Same old magic!”

quran.ayah_ar: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍۢ مُّسْتَقِرٌّۭ
quran.ayah_en: They rejected ˹the truth˺ and followed their own desires—and every matter will be settled—

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
quran.ayah_en: even though the stories ˹of destroyed nations˺ that have already come to them are a sufficient deterrent.

quran.ayah_ar: حِكْمَةٌۢ بَٰلِغَةٌۭ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
quran.ayah_en: ˹This Quran is˺ profound ˹in˺ wisdom, but warnings are of no benefit ˹to them˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَىْءٍۢ نُّكُرٍ
quran.ayah_en: So turn away from them ˹O Prophet˺. ˹And wait for˺ the Day ˹when˺ the caller

quran.ayah_ar: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌۭ مُّنتَشِرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: With eyes downcast, they will come forth from the graves as if they were swarming locusts,

quran.ayah_ar: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: rushing towards the caller. The disbelievers will cry, “This is a difficult Day!”

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجْنُونٌۭ وَٱزْدُجِرَ
quran.ayah_en: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth˺ and rejected Our servant, calling ˹him˺ insane. And he was intimidated.

quran.ayah_ar: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَغْلُوبٌۭ فَٱنتَصِرْ
quran.ayah_en: So he cried out to his Lord, “I am helpless, so help ˹me˺!”

quran.ayah_ar: فَفَتَحْنَآ أَبْوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٍۢ مُّنْهَمِرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: So We opened the gates of the sky with pouring rain,

quran.ayah_ar: وَفَجَّرْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ عُيُونًۭا فَٱلْتَقَى ٱلْمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍۢ قَدْ قُدِرَ
quran.ayah_en: and caused the earth to burst with springs, so the waters met for a fate already set.

quran.ayah_ar: وَحَمَلْنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَٰحٍۢ وَدُسُرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: We carried him on that ˹Ark made˺ of planks and nails,

quran.ayah_ar: تَجْرِى بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَآءًۭ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
quran.ayah_en: sailing under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes—a ˹fair˺ punishment on behalf of the one ˹they˺ denied.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَٰهَآ ءَايَةًۭ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: We certainly left this as a sign. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
quran.ayah_en: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌۭ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
quran.ayah_en: ’Ȃd ˹also˺ rejected ˹the truth˺. Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًۭا صَرْصَرًۭا فِى يَوْمِ نَحْسٍۢ مُّسْتَمِرٍّۢ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We sent against them a furious wind, on a day of unrelenting misery,

quran.ayah_ar: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍۢ مُّنقَعِرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: that snatched people up, leaving them like trunks of uprooted palm trees.

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
quran.ayah_en: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
quran.ayah_en: Thamûd rejected the warnings ˹as well˺,

quran.ayah_ar: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرًۭا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدًۭا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذًۭا لَّفِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ وَسُعُرٍ
quran.ayah_en: arguing, “How can we follow one ˹average˺ human being from among us? We would then truly be misguided and insane.

quran.ayah_ar: أَءُلْقِىَ ٱلذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Has the revelation been sent down ˹only˺ to him out of ˹all of˺ us? In fact, he is a boastful liar.”

quran.ayah_ar: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًۭا مَّنِ ٱلْكَذَّابُ ٱلْأَشِرُ
quran.ayah_en: ˹It was revealed to salih,˺ “They will soon know who the boastful liar is.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةًۭ لَّهُمْ فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ
quran.ayah_en: We are sending the she-camel as a test for them. So watch them ˹closely˺, and have patience.

quran.ayah_ar: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلْمَآءَ قِسْمَةٌۢ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍۢ مُّحْتَضَرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: And tell them that the ˹drinking˺ water must be divided between them ˹and her˺, each taking a turn to drink ˹every other day˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَنَادَوْا۟ صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
quran.ayah_en: But they roused a companion of theirs, so he dared to kill ˹her˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
quran.ayah_en: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We sent against them ˹only˺ one ˹mighty˺ blast, leaving them like the twigs of fence-builders.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
quran.ayah_en: The people of Lot ˹also˺ rejected the warnings.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍۢ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَٰهُم بِسَحَرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: We unleashed upon them a storm of stones. As for ˹the believers of˺ Lot’s family, We delivered them before dawn

quran.ayah_ar: نِّعْمَةًۭ مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَن شَكَرَ
quran.ayah_en: as a blessing from Us. This is how We reward whoever gives thanks.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
quran.ayah_en: He had already warned them of Our ˹crushing˺ blow but they disputed the warnings.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِۦ فَطَمَسْنَآ أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
quran.ayah_en: And they even demanded his angel-guests from him, so We blinded their eyes. ˹And they were told,˺ “Taste then My punishment and warnings!”

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌۭ مُّسْتَقِرٌّۭ
quran.ayah_en: And indeed, by the early morning they were overwhelmed by an unrelenting torment.

quran.ayah_ar: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Again they were told,˺ “Taste now My punishment and warnings!”

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
quran.ayah_en: And indeed, the warnings ˹also˺ came to the people of Pharaoh.

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَٰهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍۢ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
quran.ayah_en: ˹But˺ they rejected all of Our signs, so We seized them with the ˹crushing˺ grip of the Almighty, Most Powerful.

quran.ayah_ar: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٌۭ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
quran.ayah_en: Now, are you ˹Meccan˺ disbelievers superior to those ˹destroyed peoples˺? Or have you ˹been granted˺ immunity ˹from punishment˺ in divine Books?

quran.ayah_ar: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌۭ مُّنتَصِرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Or do they say, “We are all ˹a˺ united ˹front˺, bound to prevail.”?

quran.ayah_ar: سَيُهْزَمُ ٱلْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Soon˺ their united front will be defeated and ˹forced to˺ flee.

quran.ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
quran.ayah_en: Better yet, the Hour is their appointed time—and the Hour will be most catastrophic and most bitter.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ وَسُعُرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, the wicked are ˹entrenched˺ in misguidance, and ˹are bound for˺ blazes.

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
quran.ayah_en: On the Day they will be dragged into the Fire on their faces, ˹they will be told,˺ “Taste the touch of Hell!”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَٰهُ بِقَدَرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We have created everything, perfectly preordained.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَمْرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٌۭ كَلَمْحٍۭ بِٱلْبَصَرِ
quran.ayah_en: Our command done in the blink of an eye.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَآ أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: We have already destroyed the likes of you. So will any ˹of you˺ be mindful?

quran.ayah_ar: وَكُلُّ شَىْءٍۢ فَعَلُوهُ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
quran.ayah_en: Everything they have done is ˹listed˺ in ˹their˺ records.

quran.ayah_ar: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍۢ وَكَبِيرٍۢ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
quran.ayah_en: Every matter, small and large, is written ˹precisely˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَنَهَرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and rivers,

quran.ayah_ar: فِى مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍۢ مُّقْتَدِرٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: at the Seat of Honour in the presence of the Most Powerful Sovereign.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ
quran.ayah_en: The Most Compassionate

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَّمَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ
quran.ayah_en: taught the Quran,

quran.ayah_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ
quran.ayah_en: created humanity,

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَّمَهُ ٱلْبَيَانَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹and˺ taught them speech.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ بِحُسْبَانٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: The sun and the moon ˹travel˺ with precision.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّجْمُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ يَسْجُدَانِ
quran.ayah_en: The stars and the trees bow down ˹in submission˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ ٱلْمِيزَانَ
quran.ayah_en: As for the sky, He raised it ˹high˺, and set the balance ˹of justice˺

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَّا تَطْغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْمِيزَانِ
quran.ayah_en: so that you do not defraud the scales.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلْوَزْنَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا۟ ٱلْمِيزَانَ
quran.ayah_en: Weigh with justice, and do not give short measure.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ
quran.ayah_en: He laid out the earth for all beings.

quran.ayah_ar: فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٌۭ وَٱلنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ ٱلْأَكْمَامِ
quran.ayah_en: In it are fruit, palm trees with date stalks,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْحَبُّ ذُو ٱلْعَصْفِ وَٱلرَّيْحَانُ
quran.ayah_en: and grain with husks, and aromatic plants.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you ˹humans and jinn˺ both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلْصَٰلٍۢ كَٱلْفَخَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: He created humankind from ˹sounding˺ clay like pottery,

quran.ayah_ar: وَخَلَقَ ٱلْجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٍۢ مِّن نَّارٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: and created jinn from a ˹smokeless˺ flame of fire.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَغْرِبَيْنِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹He is˺ Lord of the two easts and the two wests.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ
quran.ayah_en: He merges the two bodies of ˹fresh and salt˺ water,

quran.ayah_ar: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌۭ لَّا يَبْغِيَانِ
quran.ayah_en: yet between them is a barrier they never cross.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا ٱللُّؤْلُؤُ وَٱلْمَرْجَانُ
quran.ayah_en: Out of both ˹waters˺ come forth pearls and coral.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَهُ ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَٰمِ
quran.ayah_en: To Him belong the ships with raised sails, sailing through the seas like mountains.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: كُلُّ مَنْ عَلَيْهَا فَانٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Every being on earth is bound to perish.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
quran.ayah_en: Only your Lord Himself,

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: يَسْـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِى شَأْنٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: All those in the heavens and the earth are dependent on Him. Day in and day out He has something to bring about.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: سَنَفْرُغُ لَكُمْ أَيُّهَ ٱلثَّقَلَانِ
quran.ayah_en: We will soon attend to you ˹for judgment˺, O  two multitudes ˹of jinn and humans˺!

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا۟ مِنْ أَقْطَارِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنفُذُوا۟ ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَٰنٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: O  assembly of jinn and humans! If you can penetrate beyond the realms of the heavens and the earth, then do so. ˹But˺ you cannot do that without ˹Our˺ authority.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌۭ مِّن نَّارٍۢ وَنُحَاسٌۭ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Flames of fire and ˹molten˺ copper will be sent against you, and you will not be able to defend one another.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةًۭ كَٱلدِّهَانِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹How horrible will it be˺ when the heavens will split apart, becoming rose-red like ˹burnt˺ oil!

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: فَيَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّا يُسْـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٌۭ وَلَا جَآنٌّۭ
quran.ayah_en: On that Day there will be no need for any human or jinn to be asked about their sins.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: يُعْرَفُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَٰهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِى وَٱلْأَقْدَامِ
quran.ayah_en: The wicked will be recognized by their appearance, then will be seized by ˹their˺ forelocks and feet.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Hell which the wicked denied.”

quran.ayah_ar: يَطُوفُونَ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ ءَانٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: They will alternate between its flames and scalding water.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ جَنَّتَانِ
quran.ayah_en: And whoever is in awe of standing before their Lord will have two Gardens.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: ذَوَاتَآ أَفْنَانٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Both will be˺ with lush branches.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ تَجْرِيَانِ
quran.ayah_en: In each ˹Garden˺ will be two flowing springs.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: فِيهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَٰكِهَةٍۢ زَوْجَانِ
quran.ayah_en: In each will be two types of every fruit.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍۢ ۚ وَجَنَى ٱلْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Those ˹believers˺ will recline on furnishings lined with rich brocade. And the fruit of both Gardens will hang within reach.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌۭ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّۭ
quran.ayah_en: In both ˹Gardens˺ will be maidens of modest gaze, who no human or jinn has ever touched before.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: كَأَنَّهُنَّ ٱلْيَاقُوتُ وَٱلْمَرْجَانُ
quran.ayah_en: Those ˹maidens˺ will be ˹as elegant˺ as rubies and coral.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: هَلْ جَزَآءُ ٱلْإِحْسَٰنِ إِلَّا ٱلْإِحْسَٰنُ
quran.ayah_en: Is there any reward for goodness except goodness?

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: وَمِن دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ
quran.ayah_en: And below these two ˹Gardens˺ will be two others.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: مُدْهَآمَّتَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Both will be dark green.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ
quran.ayah_en: In each will be two gushing springs.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: فِيهِمَا فَٰكِهَةٌۭ وَنَخْلٌۭ وَرُمَّانٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: In both will be fruit, palm trees, and pomegranates.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: فِيهِنَّ خَيْرَٰتٌ حِسَانٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: In all Gardens will be noble, pleasant mates.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: حُورٌۭ مَّقْصُورَٰتٌۭ فِى ٱلْخِيَامِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will be˺ maidens with gorgeous eyes, reserved in pavilions.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌۭ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّۭ
quran.ayah_en: No human or jinn has ever touched these ˹maidens˺ before.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍۢ وَعَبْقَرِىٍّ حِسَانٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: All ˹believers˺ will be reclining on green cushions and splendid carpets.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
quran.ayah_en: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

quran.ayah_ar: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِى ٱلْجَلَٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
quran.ayah_en: Blessed is the Name of your Lord, full of Majesty and Honour.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذَا وَقَعَتِ ٱلْوَاقِعَةُ
quran.ayah_en: When the Inevitable Event takes place,

quran.ayah_ar: لَيْسَ لِوَقْعَتِهَا كَاذِبَةٌ
quran.ayah_en: then no one can deny it has come.

quran.ayah_ar: خَافِضَةٌۭ رَّافِعَةٌ
quran.ayah_en: It will debase ˹some˺ and elevate ˹others˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذَا رُجَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ رَجًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: When the earth will be violently shaken,

quran.ayah_ar: وَبُسَّتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ بَسًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: and the mountains will be crushed to pieces,

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَانَتْ هَبَآءًۭ مُّنۢبَثًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: becoming scattered ˹particles of˺ dust,

quran.ayah_ar: وَكُنتُمْ أَزْوَٰجًۭا ثَلَٰثَةًۭ
quran.ayah_en: you will ˹all˺ be ˹divided into˺ three groups:

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ مَآ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ
quran.ayah_en: the people of the right, how ˹blessed˺ will they be;

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ مَآ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
quran.ayah_en: the people of the left, how ˹miserable˺ will they be;

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّٰبِقُونَ ٱلسَّٰبِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and the foremost ˹in faith˺ will be the foremost ˹in Paradise˺.

quran.ayah_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They are the ones nearest ˹to Allah˺,

quran.ayah_ar: فِى جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: in the Gardens of Bliss.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُلَّةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will be˺ a multitude from earlier generations

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَلِيلٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and a few from later generations.

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍۢ مَّوْضُونَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: ˹All will be˺ on jewelled thrones,

quran.ayah_ar: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَيْهَا مُتَقَٰبِلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: reclining face to face.

quran.ayah_ar: يَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌۭ مُّخَلَّدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They will be waited on by eternal youths

quran.ayah_ar: بِأَكْوَابٍۢ وَأَبَارِيقَ وَكَأْسٍۢ مِّن مَّعِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: with cups, pitchers, and a drink ˹of pure wine˺ from a flowing stream,

quran.ayah_ar: لَّا يُصَدَّعُونَ عَنْهَا وَلَا يُنزِفُونَ
quran.ayah_en: that will cause them neither headache nor intoxication.

quran.ayah_ar: وَفَٰكِهَةٍۢ مِّمَّا يَتَخَيَّرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will also be served˺ any fruit they choose

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَحْمِ طَيْرٍۢ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and meat from any bird they desire.

quran.ayah_ar: وَحُورٌ عِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: And ˹they will have˺ maidens with gorgeous eyes,

quran.ayah_ar: كَأَمْثَٰلِ ٱللُّؤْلُؤِ ٱلْمَكْنُونِ
quran.ayah_en: like pristine pearls,

quran.ayah_ar: جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹all˺ as a reward for what they used to do.

quran.ayah_ar: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًۭا وَلَا تَأْثِيمًا
quran.ayah_en: There they will never hear any idle or sinful talk—

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا قِيلًۭا سَلَٰمًۭا سَلَٰمًۭا
quran.ayah_en: only good and virtuous speech.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْيَمِينِ مَآ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْيَمِينِ
quran.ayah_en: And the people of the right—how ˹blessed˺ will they be!

quran.ayah_ar: فِى سِدْرٍۢ مَّخْضُودٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will be˺ amid thornless lote trees,

quran.ayah_ar: وَطَلْحٍۢ مَّنضُودٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: clusters of bananas,

quran.ayah_ar: وَظِلٍّۢ مَّمْدُودٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: extended shade,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآءٍۢ مَّسْكُوبٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: flowing water,

quran.ayah_ar: وَفَٰكِهَةٍۢ كَثِيرَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: abundant fruit—

quran.ayah_ar: لَّا مَقْطُوعَةٍۢ وَلَا مَمْنُوعَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: never out of season nor forbidden—

quran.ayah_ar: وَفُرُشٍۢ مَّرْفُوعَةٍ
quran.ayah_en: and elevated furnishings.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَنشَأْنَٰهُنَّ إِنشَآءًۭ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We will have perfectly created their mates,

quran.ayah_ar: فَجَعَلْنَٰهُنَّ أَبْكَارًا
quran.ayah_en: making them virgins,

quran.ayah_ar: عُرُبًا أَتْرَابًۭا
quran.ayah_en: loving and of equal age,

quran.ayah_ar: لِّأَصْحَٰبِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
quran.ayah_en: for the people of the right,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُلَّةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹who will be˺ a multitude from earlier generations

quran.ayah_ar: وَثُلَّةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and a multitude from later generations.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَصْحَٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ مَآ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ
quran.ayah_en: And the people of the left—how ˹miserable˺ will they be!

quran.ayah_ar: فِى سَمُومٍۢ وَحَمِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will be˺ in scorching heat and boiling water,

quran.ayah_ar: وَظِلٍّۢ مِّن يَحْمُومٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: in the shade of black smoke,

quran.ayah_ar: لَّا بَارِدٍۢ وَلَا كَرِيمٍ
quran.ayah_en: neither cool nor refreshing.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُتْرَفِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, before this ˹torment˺ they were spoiled by luxury,

quran.ayah_ar: وَكَانُوا۟ يُصِرُّونَ عَلَى ٱلْحِنثِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: and persisted in the worst of sin.

quran.ayah_ar: وَكَانُوا۟ يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًۭا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They used to ask ˹mockingly˺, “When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be resurrected?

quran.ayah_ar: أَوَءَابَآؤُنَا ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And our forefathers as well?”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ وَٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Most certainly, earlier and later generations

quran.ayah_ar: لَمَجْمُوعُونَ إِلَىٰ مِيقَٰتِ يَوْمٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: will surely be gathered ˹together˺ for the appointed Day.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ ٱلْمُكَذِّبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Then you, O  misguided deniers,

quran.ayah_ar: لَءَاكِلُونَ مِن شَجَرٍۢ مِّن زَقُّومٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: will certainly eat from ˹the fruit of˺ the trees of Zaqqûm,

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ
quran.ayah_en: filling up ˹your˺ bellies with it.

quran.ayah_ar: فَشَٰرِبُونَ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: Then on top of that you will drink boiling water—

quran.ayah_ar: فَشَٰرِبُونَ شُرْبَ ٱلْهِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: and you will drink ˹it˺ like thirsty camels do.”

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذَا نُزُلُهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: This will be their accommodation on the Day of Judgment.

quran.ayah_ar: نَحْنُ خَلَقْنَٰكُمْ فَلَوْلَا تُصَدِّقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: It is We Who created you. Will you not then believe ˹in resurrection˺?

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تُمْنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Have you considered what you ejaculate?

quran.ayah_ar: ءَأَنتُمْ تَخْلُقُونَهُۥٓ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْخَٰلِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Is it you who create ˹a child out of˺ it, or is it We Who do so?

quran.ayah_ar: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We have ordained death for ˹all of˺ you, and We cannot be prevented

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمْثَٰلَكُمْ وَنُنشِئَكُمْ فِى مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: from transforming and recreating you in forms unknown to you.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: You already know how you were first created. Will you not then be mindful?

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَحْرُثُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Have you considered what you sow?

quran.ayah_ar: ءَأَنتُمْ تَزْرَعُونَهُۥٓ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلزَّٰرِعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Is it you who cause it to grow, or is it We Who do so?

quran.ayah_ar: لَوْ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلْنَٰهُ حُطَٰمًۭا فَظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّهُونَ
quran.ayah_en: If We willed, We could simply reduce this ˹harvest˺ to chaff, leaving you to lament,

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا لَمُغْرَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: “We have truly suffered a ˹great˺ loss.

quran.ayah_ar: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
quran.ayah_en: In fact, we have been deprived ˹of our livelihood˺.”

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ ٱلْمَآءَ ٱلَّذِى تَشْرَبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Have you considered the water you drink?

quran.ayah_ar: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلْمُزْنِ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنزِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Is it you who bring it down from the clouds, or is it We Who do so?

quran.ayah_ar: لَوْ نَشَآءُ جَعَلْنَٰهُ أُجَاجًۭا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: If We willed, We could make it salty. Will you not then give thanks?

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِى تُورُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Have you considered the fire you kindle?

quran.ayah_ar: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنشَأْتُمْ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنشِـُٔونَ
quran.ayah_en: Is it you who produce its trees, or is it We Who do so?

quran.ayah_ar: نَحْنُ جَعَلْنَٰهَا تَذْكِرَةًۭ وَمَتَٰعًۭا لِّلْمُقْوِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We have made it ˹as˺ a reminder ˹of the Hellfire˺ and a provision for the travellers.

quran.ayah_ar: فَسَبِّحْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِمَوَٰقِعِ ٱلنُّجُومِ
quran.ayah_en: So I do swear by the positions of the stars—

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَقَسَمٌۭ لَّوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عَظِيمٌ
quran.ayah_en: and this, if only you knew, is indeed a great oath—

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ لَقُرْءَانٌۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: that this is truly a noble Quran,

quran.ayah_ar: فِى كِتَٰبٍۢ مَّكْنُونٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: in a well-preserved Record,

quran.ayah_ar: لَّا يَمَسُّهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلْمُطَهَّرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: touched by none except the purified ˹angels˺.

quran.ayah_ar: تَنزِيلٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹It is˺ a revelation from the Lord of all worlds.

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَبِهَٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ أَنتُم مُّدْهِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: How can you then take this message lightly,

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَجْعَلُونَ رِزْقَكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ تُكَذِّبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and repay ˹Allah for˺ your provisions with denial?

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَوْلَآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلْحُلْقُومَ
quran.ayah_en: Why then ˹are you helpless˺ when the soul ˹of a dying person˺ reaches ˹their˺ throat,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنتُمْ حِينَئِذٍۢ تَنظُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: while you are looking on?

quran.ayah_ar: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنكُمْ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُبْصِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And We are nearer to such a person than you, but you cannot see.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَوْلَآ إِن كُنتُمْ غَيْرَ مَدِينِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Now, if you are not subject to Our Will ˹as you claim˺,

quran.ayah_ar: تَرْجِعُونَهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: bring that soul back, if what you say is true.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So, if the deceased is one of those brought near ˹to Us˺,

quran.ayah_ar: فَرَوْحٌۭ وَرَيْحَانٌۭ وَجَنَّتُ نَعِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: then ˹such a person will have˺ serenity, fragrance, and a Garden of Bliss.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنْ أَصْحَٰبِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
quran.ayah_en: And if the deceased is one of the people of the right,

quran.ayah_ar: فَسَلَٰمٌۭ لَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَٰبِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
quran.ayah_en: then ˹they will be told,˺ “Greetings to you from the people of the right.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
quran.ayah_en: But if such person is one of the misguided deniers,

quran.ayah_ar: فَنُزُلٌۭ مِّنْ حَمِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: then their accommodation will be boiling water ˹to drink˺

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَصْلِيَةُ جَحِيمٍ
quran.ayah_en: and burning in Hellfire.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ حَقُّ ٱلْيَقِينِ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, this is the absolute truth.

quran.ayah_ar: فَسَبِّحْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest.

quran.ayah_ar: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: Whatever is in the heavens and the earth glorifies Allah, for He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

quran.ayah_ar: لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
quran.ayah_en: To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. He gives life and causes death. And He is Most Capable of everything.

quran.ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱلْأَوَّلُ وَٱلْءَاخِرُ وَٱلظَّٰهِرُ وَٱلْبَاطِنُ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
quran.ayah_en: He is the First and the Last, the Most High and Most Near, and He has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

quran.ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍۢ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا ۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: He is the One Who created the heavens and the earth in six Days, For Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

quran.ayah_ar: لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
quran.ayah_en: To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. And to Allah all matters are returned.

quran.ayah_ar: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيْلَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِى ٱلَّيْلِ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
quran.ayah_en: He merges the night into day and the day into night. And He knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

quran.ayah_ar: ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَأَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسْتَخْلَفِينَ فِيهِ ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَأَنفَقُوا۟ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌۭ كَبِيرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Believe in Allah and His Messenger, and donate from what He has entrusted you with. So those of you who believe and donate will have a mighty reward.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا لَكُمْ لَا تُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ ۙ وَٱلرَّسُولُ يَدْعُوكُمْ لِتُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِرَبِّكُمْ وَقَدْ أَخَذَ مِيثَٰقَكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Why do you not believe in Allah while the Messenger is inviting you to have faith in your Lord, although He has already taken your covenant, if you will ever believe.

quran.ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٍۭ بَيِّنَٰتٍۢ لِّيُخْرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُمْ لَرَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: He is the One Who sends down clear revelations to His servant to bring you out of darkness and into light. For indeed Allah is Ever Gracious and Most Merciful to you.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا لَكُمْ أَلَّا تُنفِقُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَٰثُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا يَسْتَوِى مِنكُم مَّنْ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبْلِ ٱلْفَتْحِ وَقَٰتَلَ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَعْظَمُ دَرَجَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنفَقُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدُ وَقَٰتَلُوا۟ ۚ وَكُلًّۭا وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: And why should you not spend in the cause of Allah, while Allah is the ˹sole˺ inheritor of the heavens and the earth? Those of you who donated and fought before the victory ˹over Mecca˺ are unparalleled. They are far greater in rank than those who donated and fought afterwards. Yet Allah has promised each a fine reward. And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

quran.ayah_ar: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِى يُقْرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًۭا فَيُضَٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥ وَلَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Who is it that will lend to Allah a good loan which Allah will multiply ˹many times over˺ for them, and they will have an honourable reward?

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ تَرَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ يَسْعَىٰ نُورُهُم بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَبِأَيْمَٰنِهِم بُشْرَىٰكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ جَنَّٰتٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: On that Day you will see believing men and women with their light shining ahead of them and on their right. ˹They will be told,˺ “Today you have good news of Gardens, under which rivers flow, ˹for you˺ to stay in forever. This is ˹truly˺ the ultimate triumph.”

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَقُولُ ٱلْمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلْمُنَٰفِقَٰتُ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱنظُرُونَا نَقْتَبِسْ مِن نُّورِكُمْ قِيلَ ٱرْجِعُوا۟ وَرَآءَكُمْ فَٱلْتَمِسُوا۟ نُورًۭا فَضُرِبَ بَيْنَهُم بِسُورٍۢ لَّهُۥ بَابٌۢ بَاطِنُهُۥ فِيهِ ٱلرَّحْمَةُ وَظَٰهِرُهُۥ مِن قِبَلِهِ ٱلْعَذَابُ
quran.ayah_en: On that Day hypocrite men and women will beg the believers, “Wait for us so that we may have some of your light.” It will be said ˹mockingly˺, “Go back ˹to the world˺ and seek a light ˹there˺!” Then a ˹separating˺ wall with a gate will be erected between them. On the near side will be grace and on the far side will be torment.

quran.ayah_ar: يُنَادُونَهُمْ أَلَمْ نَكُن مَّعَكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنَّكُمْ فَتَنتُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَتَرَبَّصْتُمْ وَٱرْتَبْتُمْ وَغَرَّتْكُمُ ٱلْأَمَانِىُّ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْغَرُورُ
quran.ayah_en: The tormented will cry out to those graced, “Were we not with you?” They will reply, “Yes ˹you were˺. But you chose to be tempted ˹by hypocrisy˺, ˹eagerly˺ awaited ˹our demise˺, doubted ˹the truth˺, and were deluded by false hopes until Allah’s decree ˹of your death˺ came to pass. And ˹so˺ the Chief Deceiver deceived you about Allah.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا يُؤْخَذُ مِنكُمْ فِدْيَةٌۭ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ مَأْوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ ۖ هِىَ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
quran.ayah_en: So Today no ransom will be accepted from you ˹hypocrites˺, nor from the disbelievers. Your home is the Fire—it is the ˹only˺ fitting place for you. What an evil destination!”

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ أَلَمْ يَأْنِ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَن تَخْشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمْ لِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا يَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبْلُ فَطَالَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْأَمَدُ فَقَسَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ فَٰسِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Has the time not yet come for believers’ hearts to be humbled at the remembrance of Allah and what has been revealed of the truth, and not be like those given the Scripture before—˹those˺ who were spoiled for so long that their hearts became hardened. And many of them are ˹still˺ rebellious.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحْىِ ٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۚ قَدْ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلْءَايَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Know that Allah revives the earth after its death. We have certainly made the signs clear for you so perhaps you will understand.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَٱلْمُصَّدِّقَٰتِ وَأَقْرَضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًۭا يُضَٰعَفُ لَهُمْ وَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, those men and women who give in charity and lend to Allah a good loan will have it multiplied for them, and they will have an honourable reward.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦٓ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصِّدِّيقُونَ ۖ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ لَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ وَنُورُهُمْ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹As for˺ those who believe in Allah and His messengers, it is they who are ˹truly˺ the people of truth. And the martyrs, with their Lord, will have their reward and their light. But ˹as for˺ those who disbelieve and reject Our signs, it is they who will be the residents of the Hellfire.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌۭ وَلَهْوٌۭ وَزِينَةٌۭ وَتَفَاخُرٌۢ بَيْنَكُمْ وَتَكَاثُرٌۭ فِى ٱلْأَمْوَٰلِ وَٱلْأَوْلَٰدِ ۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيْثٍ أَعْجَبَ ٱلْكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّۭا ثُمَّ يَكُونُ حُطَٰمًۭا ۖ وَفِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ عَذَابٌۭ شَدِيدٌۭ وَمَغْفِرَةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنٌۭ ۚ وَمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَآ إِلَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلْغُرُورِ
quran.ayah_en: Know that this worldly life is no more than play, amusement, luxury, mutual boasting, and competition in wealth and children. This is like rain that causes plants to grow, to the delight of the planters. But later the plants dry up and you see them wither, then they are reduced to chaff. And in the Hereafter there will be either severe punishment or forgiveness and pleasure of Allah, whereas the life of this world is no more than the delusion of enjoyment.

quran.ayah_ar: سَابِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَغْفِرَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرْضُهَا كَعَرْضِ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ أُعِدَّتْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹So˺ compete with one another for forgiveness from your Lord and a Paradise as vast as the heavens and the earth, prepared for those who believe in Allah and His messengers. This is the favour of Allah. He grants it to whoever He wills. And Allah is the Lord of infinite bounty.

quran.ayah_ar: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍۢ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ إِلَّا فِى كِتَٰبٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِ أَن نَّبْرَأَهَآ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: No calamity ˹or blessing˺ occurs on earth or in yourselves without being ˹written˺ in a Record before We bring it into being. This is certainly easy for Allah.

quran.ayah_ar: لِّكَيْلَا تَأْسَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمْ وَلَا تَفْرَحُوا۟ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخْتَالٍۢ فَخُورٍ
quran.ayah_en: ˹We let you know this˺ so that you neither grieve over what you have missed nor boast over what He has granted you. For Allah does not like whoever is arrogant, boastful—

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يَبْخَلُونَ وَيَأْمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلْبُخْلِ ۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْغَنِىُّ ٱلْحَمِيدُ
quran.ayah_en: those who are stingy and promote stinginess among people. And whoever turns away ˹should know that˺ Allah ˹alone˺ is truly the Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.

quran.ayah_ar: لَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا بِٱلْبَيِّنَٰتِ وَأَنزَلْنَا مَعَهُمُ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَٱلْمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ ٱلنَّاسُ بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۖ وَأَنزَلْنَا ٱلْحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأْسٌۭ شَدِيدٌۭ وَمَنَٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعْلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥ وَرُسُلَهُۥ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We sent Our messengers with clear proofs, and with them We sent down the Scripture and the balance ˹of justice˺ so that people may administer justice. And We sent down iron with its great might, benefits for humanity, and means for Allah to prove who ˹is willing to˺ stand up for Him and His messengers without seeing Him. Surely Allah is All-Powerful, Almighty.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًۭا وَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَجَعَلْنَا فِى ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلْكِتَٰبَ ۖ فَمِنْهُم مُّهْتَدٍۢ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ فَٰسِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: And indeed, We sent Noah and Abraham and reserved prophethood and revelation for their descendants. Some of them are ˹rightly˺ guided, while most are rebellious.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ قَفَّيْنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم بِرُسُلِنَا وَقَفَّيْنَا بِعِيسَى ٱبْنِ مَرْيَمَ وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُ ٱلْإِنجِيلَ وَجَعَلْنَا فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ رَأْفَةًۭ وَرَحْمَةًۭ وَرَهْبَانِيَّةً ٱبْتَدَعُوهَا مَا كَتَبْنَٰهَا عَلَيْهِمْ إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ رِضْوَٰنِ ٱللَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوْهَا حَقَّ رِعَايَتِهَا ۖ فَـَٔاتَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ أَجْرَهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ فَٰسِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Then in the footsteps of these ˹prophets˺, We sent Our messengers, and ˹after them˺ We sent Jesus, son of Mary, and granted him the Gospel, and instilled compassion and mercy into the hearts of his followers. As for monasticism, they made it up—We never ordained it for them—only seeking to please Allah, yet they did not ˹even˺ observe it strictly. So We rewarded those of them who were faithful. But most of them are rebellious.

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَءَامِنُوا۟ بِرَسُولِهِۦ يُؤْتِكُمْ كِفْلَيْنِ مِن رَّحْمَتِهِۦ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ نُورًۭا تَمْشُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: O people of faith! Fear Allah and believe in His Messenger. ˹And˺ He will grant you a double share of His mercy, provide you with a light to walk in ˹on Judgment Day˺, and forgive you. For Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: لِّئَلَّا يَعْلَمَ أَهْلُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ أَلَّا يَقْدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَىْءٍۢ مِّن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَأَنَّ ٱلْفَضْلَ بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹This is so˺ that the People of the Book ˹who deny the Prophet˺ may know that they do not have any control over Allah’s grace, and that all grace is in Allah’s Hands. He grants it to whoever He wills. For Allah is the Lord of infinite bounty.

quran.ayah_ar: قَدْ سَمِعَ ٱللَّهُ قَوْلَ ٱلَّتِى تُجَٰدِلُكَ فِى زَوْجِهَا وَتَشْتَكِىٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ يَسْمَعُ تَحَاوُرَكُمَآ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۢ بَصِيرٌ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, Allah has heard the argument of the woman who pleaded with you ˹O Prophet˺ concerning her husband, and appealed to Allah. Allah has heard your exchange. Surely Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُظَٰهِرُونَ مِنكُم مِّن نِّسَآئِهِم مَّا هُنَّ أُمَّهَٰتِهِمْ ۖ إِنْ أُمَّهَٰتُهُمْ إِلَّا ٱلَّٰٓـِٔى وَلَدْنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَيَقُولُونَ مُنكَرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ وَزُورًۭا ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Those of you who ˹sinfully˺ divorce their wives by comparing them to their mothers ˹should know that˺ their wives are in no way their mothers. None can be their mothers except those who gave birth to them. What they say is certainly detestable and false. Yet Allah is truly Ever-Pardoning, All-Forgiving.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُظَٰهِرُونَ مِن نِّسَآئِهِمْ ثُمَّ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا قَالُوا۟ فَتَحْرِيرُ رَقَبَةٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَتَمَآسَّا ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ تُوعَظُونَ بِهِۦ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Those who divorce their wives in this manner, then ˹wish to˺ retract what they said, must free a slave before they touch each other. This ˹penalty˺ is meant to deter you. And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ شَهْرَيْنِ مُتَتَابِعَيْنِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَتَمَآسَّا ۖ فَمَن لَّمْ يَسْتَطِعْ فَإِطْعَامُ سِتِّينَ مِسْكِينًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِتُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۚ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَلِلْكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
quran.ayah_en: But if the husband cannot afford this, let him then fast two consecutive months before the couple touch each other. But if he is unable ˹to fast˺, then let him feed sixty poor people. This is to re-affirm your faith in Allah and His Messenger. These are the limits set by Allah. And the disbelievers will suffer a painful punishment.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ كُبِتُوا۟ كَمَا كُبِتَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ وَقَدْ أَنزَلْنَآ ءَايَٰتٍۭ بَيِّنَٰتٍۢ ۚ وَلِلْكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابٌۭ مُّهِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, those who defy Allah and His Messenger will be debased, just like those before them. We have certainly sent down clear revelations. And the disbelievers will suffer a humiliating punishment.

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَبْعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعًۭا فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوٓا۟ ۚ أَحْصَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ وَنَسُوهُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدٌ
quran.ayah_en: On the Day Allah resurrects them all together, He will then inform them of what they have done. Allah has kept account of it all, while they have forgotten it. For Allah is a Witness over all things.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ مَا يَكُونُ مِن نَّجْوَىٰ ثَلَٰثَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ رَابِعُهُمْ وَلَا خَمْسَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ سَادِسُهُمْ وَلَآ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكْثَرَ إِلَّا هُوَ مَعَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ ۖ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
quran.ayah_en: Do you not see that Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth? If three converse privately, He is their fourth. If five, He is their sixth. Whether fewer or more, He is with them wherever they may be. Then, on the Day of Judgment, He will inform them of what they have done. Surely Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ نُهُوا۟ عَنِ ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ ثُمَّ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا نُهُوا۟ عَنْهُ وَيَتَنَٰجَوْنَ بِٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْعُدْوَٰنِ وَمَعْصِيَتِ ٱلرَّسُولِ وَإِذَا جَآءُوكَ حَيَّوْكَ بِمَا لَمْ يُحَيِّكَ بِهِ ٱللَّهُ وَيَقُولُونَ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَوْلَا يُعَذِّبُنَا ٱللَّهُ بِمَا نَقُولُ ۚ حَسْبُهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ يَصْلَوْنَهَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
quran.ayah_en: Have you not seen those who were forbidden from secret talks, yet they ˹always˺ return to what they were forbidden from, conspiring in sin, aggression, and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you ˹O Prophet˺, they greet you not as Allah greets you, and say to one another, “Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?” Hell is enough for them—they will burn in it. And what an evil destination!

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا تَنَٰجَيْتُمْ فَلَا تَتَنَٰجَوْا۟ بِٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْعُدْوَٰنِ وَمَعْصِيَتِ ٱلرَّسُولِ وَتَنَٰجَوْا۟ بِٱلْبِرِّ وَٱلتَّقْوَىٰ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: O believers! When you converse privately, let it not be for sin, aggression, or disobedience to the Messenger, but let it be for goodness and righteousness. And fear Allah, to Whom you will ˹all˺ be gathered.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّمَا ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ مِنَ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنِ لِيَحْزُنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَلَيْسَ بِضَآرِّهِمْ شَيْـًٔا إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Secret talks are only inspired by Satan to grieve the believers. Yet he cannot harm them whatsoever except by Allah’s Will. So in Allah let the believers put their trust.

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمْ تَفَسَّحُوا۟ فِى ٱلْمَجَٰلِسِ فَٱفْسَحُوا۟ يَفْسَحِ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا قِيلَ ٱنشُزُوا۟ فَٱنشُزُوا۟ يَرْفَعِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ دَرَجَٰتٍۢ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: O believers! When you are told to make room in gatherings, then do so. Allah will make room for you ˹in His grace˺. And if you are told to rise, then do so. Allah will elevate those of you who are faithful, and ˹raise˺ those gifted with knowledge in rank. And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا نَٰجَيْتُمُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَقَدِّمُوا۟ بَيْنَ يَدَىْ نَجْوَىٰكُمْ صَدَقَةًۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ وَأَطْهَرُ ۚ فَإِن لَّمْ تَجِدُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ
quran.ayah_en: O believers! When you consult the Messenger privately, give something in charity before your consultation. That is better and purer for you. But if you lack the means, then Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: ءَأَشْفَقْتُمْ أَن تُقَدِّمُوا۟ بَيْنَ يَدَىْ نَجْوَىٰكُمْ صَدَقَٰتٍۢ ۚ فَإِذْ لَمْ تَفْعَلُوا۟ وَتَابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْكُمْ فَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Are you afraid of spending in charity before your private consultations ˹with him˺? Since you are unable to do so, and Allah has turned to you in mercy, then ˹continue to˺ establish prayer, pay alms-tax, and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ تَوَلَّوْا۟ قَوْمًا غَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مَّا هُم مِّنكُمْ وَلَا مِنْهُمْ وَيَحْلِفُونَ عَلَى ٱلْكَذِبِ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Have you not seen those ˹hypocrites˺ who ally themselves with a people with whom Allah is displeased? They are neither with you nor with them. And they swear to lies knowingly.

quran.ayah_ar: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ عَذَابًۭا شَدِيدًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ سَآءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Evil indeed is what they do.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ أَيْمَٰنَهُمْ جُنَّةًۭ فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ مُّهِينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: They have made their ˹false˺ oaths as a shield, hindering ˹others˺ from the cause of Allah. So they will suffer a humiliating punishment.

quran.ayah_ar: لَّن تُغْنِىَ عَنْهُمْ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Neither their wealth nor children will be of any help to them against Allah whatsoever. It is they who will be the residents of the Fire. They will be there forever.

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَبْعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعًۭا فَيَحْلِفُونَ لَهُۥ كَمَا يَحْلِفُونَ لَكُمْ ۖ وَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمْ عَلَىٰ شَىْءٍ ۚ أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْكَٰذِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: On the Day Allah resurrects them all, they will ˹falsely˺ swear to Him as they swear to you, thinking they have something to stand on. Indeed, it is they who are the ˹total˺ liars.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱسْتَحْوَذَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ فَأَنسَىٰهُمْ ذِكْرَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ حِزْبُ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنِ ۚ أَلَآ إِنَّ حِزْبَ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنِ هُمُ ٱلْخَٰسِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Satan has taken hold of them, causing them to forget the remembrance of Allah. They are the party of Satan. Surely Satan’s party is bound to lose.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ فِى ٱلْأَذَلِّينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹As for˺ those who defy Allah and His Messenger, they will definitely be among the most debased.

quran.ayah_ar: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغْلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِىٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Allah has decreed, “I and My messengers will certainly prevail.” Surely Allah is All-Powerful, Almighty.

quran.ayah_ar: لَّا تَجِدُ قَوْمًۭا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْءَاخِرِ يُوَآدُّونَ مَنْ حَآدَّ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَوْ كَانُوٓا۟ ءَابَآءَهُمْ أَوْ أَبْنَآءَهُمْ أَوْ إِخْوَٰنَهُمْ أَوْ عَشِيرَتَهُمْ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ كَتَبَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلْإِيمَٰنَ وَأَيَّدَهُم بِرُوحٍۢ مِّنْهُ ۖ وَيُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنَّٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ رَضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ حِزْبُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أَلَآ إِنَّ حِزْبَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
quran.ayah_en: You will never find a people who ˹truly˺ believe in Allah and the Last Day loyal to those who defy Allah and His Messenger, even if they were their parents, children, siblings, or extended family. For those ˹believers˺, Allah has instilled faith in their hearts and strengthened them with a spirit from Him. He will admit them into Gardens under which rivers flow, to stay there forever. Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. They are the party of Allah. Indeed, Allah’s party is bound to succeed.

quran.ayah_ar: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
quran.ayah_en: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth glorifies Allah. For He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

quran.ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمْ لِأَوَّلِ ٱلْحَشْرِ ۚ مَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن يَخْرُجُوا۟ ۖ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُم مَّانِعَتُهُمْ حُصُونُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَمْ يَحْتَسِبُوا۟ ۖ وَقَذَفَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعْبَ ۚ يُخْرِبُونَ بُيُوتَهُم بِأَيْدِيهِمْ وَأَيْدِى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ فَٱعْتَبِرُوا۟ يَٰٓأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَبْصَٰرِ
quran.ayah_en: He is the One Who expelled the disbelievers of the People of the Book from their homes for ˹their˺ first banishment ˹ever˺. You never thought they would go. And they thought their strongholds would put them out of Allah’s reach. But ˹the decree of˺ Allah came upon them from where they never expected. And He cast horror into their hearts so they destroyed their houses with their own hands and the hands of the believers. So take a lesson ˹from this˺, O  people of insight!

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَوْلَآ أَن كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْجَلَآءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ عَذَابُ ٱلنَّارِ
quran.ayah_en: Had Allah not decreed exile for them, He would have certainly punished them in this world. And in the Hereafter they will suffer the punishment of the Fire.

quran.ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ شَآقُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۖ وَمَن يُشَآقِّ ٱللَّهَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
quran.ayah_en: This is because they defied Allah and His Messenger. And whoever defies Allah, then Allah is truly severe in punishment.

quran.ayah_ar: مَا قَطَعْتُم مِّن لِّينَةٍ أَوْ تَرَكْتُمُوهَا قَآئِمَةً عَلَىٰٓ أُصُولِهَا فَبِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيُخْزِىَ ٱلْفَٰسِقِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Whatever palm trees you ˹believers˺ cut down or left standing intact, it was ˹all˺ by Allah’s Will, so that He might disgrace the rebellious.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَوْجَفْتُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ خَيْلٍۢ وَلَا رِكَابٍۢ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسَلِّطُ رُسُلَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: As for the gains Allah has turned over to His Messenger from them—you did not ˹even˺ spur on any horse or camel for such gains. But Allah gives authority to His messengers over whoever He wills. For Allah is Most Capable of everything.

quran.ayah_ar: مَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْقُرَىٰ فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ كَىْ لَا يَكُونَ دُولَةًۢ بَيْنَ ٱلْأَغْنِيَآءِ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ فَخُذُوهُ وَمَا نَهَىٰكُمْ عَنْهُ فَٱنتَهُوا۟ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
quran.ayah_en: As for gains granted by Allah to His Messenger from the people of ˹other˺ lands, they are for Allah and the Messenger, his close relatives, orphans, the poor, and ˹needy˺ travellers so that wealth may not merely circulate among your rich. Whatever the Messenger gives you, take it. And whatever he forbids you from, leave it. And fear Allah. Surely Allah is severe in punishment.

quran.ayah_ar: لِلْفُقَرَآءِ ٱلْمُهَٰجِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُخْرِجُوا۟ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمْ وَأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًۭا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنًۭا وَيَنصُرُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّٰدِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Some of the gains will be˺ for poor emigrants who were driven out of their homes and wealth, seeking Allah’s bounty and pleasure, and standing up for Allah and His Messenger. They are the ones true in faith.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَبَوَّءُو ٱلدَّارَ وَٱلْإِيمَٰنَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ يُحِبُّونَ مَنْ هَاجَرَ إِلَيْهِمْ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ فِى صُدُورِهِمْ حَاجَةًۭ مِّمَّآ أُوتُوا۟ وَيُؤْثِرُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَلَوْ كَانَ بِهِمْ خَصَاصَةٌۭ ۚ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِۦ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
quran.ayah_en: As for those who had settled in the city and ˹embraced˺ the faith before ˹the arrival of˺ the emigrants, they love whoever immigrates to them, never having a desire in their hearts for whatever ˹of the gains˺ is given to the emigrants. They give ˹the emigrants˺ preference over themselves even though they may be in need. And whoever is saved from the selfishness of their own souls, it is they who are ˹truly˺ successful.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَآءُو مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلِإِخْوَٰنِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِٱلْإِيمَٰنِ وَلَا تَجْعَلْ فِى قُلُوبِنَا غِلًّۭا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ رَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ
quran.ayah_en: And those who come after them will pray, “Our Lord! Forgive us and our fellow believers who preceded us in faith, and do not allow bitterness into our hearts towards those who believe. Our Lord! Indeed, You are Ever Gracious, Most Merciful.”

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ نَافَقُوا۟ يَقُولُونَ لِإِخْوَٰنِهِمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ لَئِنْ أُخْرِجْتُمْ لَنَخْرُجَنَّ مَعَكُمْ وَلَا نُطِيعُ فِيكُمْ أَحَدًا أَبَدًۭا وَإِن قُوتِلْتُمْ لَنَنصُرَنَّكُمْ وَٱللَّهُ يَشْهَدُ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Have you ˹O Prophet˺ not seen the hypocrites who say to their fellow disbelievers from the People of the Book, “If you are expelled, we will certainly leave with you, and We will never obey anyone against you. And if you are fought against, we will surely help you.”? But Allah bears witness that they are truly liars.

quran.ayah_ar: لَئِنْ أُخْرِجُوا۟ لَا يَخْرُجُونَ مَعَهُمْ وَلَئِن قُوتِلُوا۟ لَا يَنصُرُونَهُمْ وَلَئِن نَّصَرُوهُمْ لَيُوَلُّنَّ ٱلْأَدْبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, if they are expelled, the hypocrites will never leave with them. And if they are fought against, the hypocrites will never help them. And even if the hypocrites did so, they would certainly flee, then the disbelievers would be left with no help.

quran.ayah_ar: لَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ رَهْبَةًۭ فِى صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, there is more fear in their hearts for you ˹believers˺ than for Allah. That is because they are a people who do not comprehend.

quran.ayah_ar: لَا يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمْ جَمِيعًا إِلَّا فِى قُرًۭى مُّحَصَّنَةٍ أَوْ مِن وَرَآءِ جُدُرٍۭ ۚ بَأْسُهُم بَيْنَهُمْ شَدِيدٌۭ ۚ تَحْسَبُهُمْ جَمِيعًۭا وَقُلُوبُهُمْ شَتَّىٰ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَعْقِلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Even united, they would not ˹dare˺ fight against you except ˹from˺ within fortified strongholds or from behind walls. Their malice for each other is intense: you think they are united, yet their hearts are divided. That is because they are a people with no ˹real˺ understanding.

quran.ayah_ar: كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ قَرِيبًۭا ۖ ذَاقُوا۟ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: They are ˹both just˺ like those who recently went down before them: they tasted the evil consequences of their doings. And they will suffer a painful punishment.

quran.ayah_ar: كَمَثَلِ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنِ إِذْ قَالَ لِلْإِنسَٰنِ ٱكْفُرْ فَلَمَّا كَفَرَ قَالَ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌۭ مِّنكَ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They are˺ like Satan when he lures someone to disbelieve. Then after they have done so, he will say ˹on Judgment Day˺, “I have absolutely nothing to do with you. I truly fear Allah—the Lord of all worlds.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَانَ عَٰقِبَتَهُمَآ أَنَّهُمَا فِى ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدَيْنِ فِيهَا ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So they will both end up in the Fire, staying there forever. That is the reward of the wrongdoers.

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلْتَنظُرْ نَفْسٌۭ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ لِغَدٍۢ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: O believers! Be mindful of Allah and let every soul look to what ˹deeds˺ it has sent forth for tomorrow. And fear Allah, ˹for˺ certainly Allah is All-Aware of what you do.
