quran.ayah_en: to ensure that the messengers fully deliver the messages of their Lord—though He ˹already˺ knows all about them, and keeps account of everything.”

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ
quran.ayah_en: O you wrapped ˹in your clothes˺!

quran.ayah_ar: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Stand all night ˹in prayer˺ except a little—

quran.ayah_ar: نِّصْفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: ˹pray˺ half the night, or a little less,

quran.ayah_ar: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَرْتِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: or a little more—and recite the Quran ˹properly˺ in a measured way.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِى عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًۭا ثَقِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: ˹For˺ We will soon send upon you a weighty revelation.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيْلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَطْـًۭٔا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, worship in the night is more impactful and suitable for recitation.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبْحًۭا طَوِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: For during the day you are over-occupied ˹with worldly duties˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹Always˺ remember the Name of your Lord, and devote yourself to Him wholeheartedly.

quran.ayah_ar: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹He is the˺ Lord of the east and the west. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him, so take Him ˹alone˺ as a Trustee of Affairs.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًۭا جَمِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say, and depart from them courteously.

quran.ayah_ar: وَذَرْنِى وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُو۟لِى ٱلنَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: And leave to Me the deniers—the people of luxury—and bear with them for a little while.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالًۭا وَجَحِيمًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹For˺ We certainly have shackles, a ˹raging˺ Fire,

quran.ayah_ar: وَطَعَامًۭا ذَا غُصَّةٍۢ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا
quran.ayah_en: choking food, and a painful punishment ˹in store for them˺

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًۭا مَّهِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: on the Day the earth and mountains will shake ˹violently˺, and mountains will be ˹reduced to˺ dunes of shifting sand.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًۭا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We have sent to you a messenger as a witness over you, just as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh.

quran.ayah_ar: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَٰهُ أَخْذًۭا وَبِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a stern grip.

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًۭا يَجْعَلُ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنَ شِيبًا
quran.ayah_en: If you ˹pagans˺ persist in disbelief, then how will you guard yourselves against ˹the horrors of˺ a Day which will turn children’s hair grey?

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا
quran.ayah_en: It will ˹even˺ cause the sky to split apart. His promise ˹of judgment˺ must be fulfilled.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the ˹Right˺ Way to their Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَىِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًۭا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍۢ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًۭا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًۭا ۚ وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۢ
quran.ayah_en: Surely your Lord knows that you ˹O Prophet˺ stand ˹in prayer˺ for nearly two-thirds of the night, or ˹sometimes˺ half of it, or a third, as do some of those with you. Allah ˹alone˺ keeps a ˹precise˺ measure of the day and night. He knows that you ˹believers˺ are unable to endure this, and has turned to you in mercy. And seek Allah’s forgiveness. Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُدَّثِّرُ
quran.ayah_en: O you covered up ˹in your clothes˺!

quran.ayah_ar: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
quran.ayah_en: Arise and warn ˹all˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
quran.ayah_en: Revere your Lord ˹alone˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
quran.ayah_en: Purify your garments.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلرُّجْزَ فَٱهْجُرْ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Continue to˺ shun idols.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
quran.ayah_en: Do not do a favour expecting more ˹in return˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصْبِرْ
quran.ayah_en: And persevere for ˹the sake of˺ your Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِى ٱلنَّاقُورِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹For˺ when the Trumpet will be sounded,

quran.ayah_ar: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
quran.ayah_en: that will ˹truly˺ be a difficult Day—

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: far from easy for the disbelievers.

quran.ayah_ar: ذَرْنِى وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًۭا
quran.ayah_en: And leave to me ˹O Prophet˺ the one I created all by Myself,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُۥ مَالًۭا مَّمْدُودًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and granted him abundant wealth,

quran.ayah_ar: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and children always by his side,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمْهِيدًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and made life very easy for him.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
quran.ayah_en: Yet he is hungry for more.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِءَايَٰتِنَا عَنِيدًۭا
quran.ayah_en: But no! ˹For˺ he has been truly stubborn with Our revelations.

quran.ayah_ar: سَأُرْهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا
quran.ayah_en: I will make his fate unbearable,

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
quran.ayah_en: for he contemplated and determined ˹a degrading label for the Quran˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
quran.ayah_en: May he be condemned! How evil was what he determined!

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
quran.ayah_en: May he be condemned even more! How evil was what he determined!

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
quran.ayah_en: Then he re-contemplated ˹in frustration˺,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
quran.ayah_en: then frowned and scowled,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَٱسْتَكْبَرَ
quran.ayah_en: then turned his back ˹on the truth˺ and acted arrogantly,

quran.ayah_ar: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌۭ يُؤْثَرُ
quran.ayah_en: saying, “This ˹Quran˺ is nothing but magic from the ancients.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا قَوْلُ ٱلْبَشَرِ
quran.ayah_en: This is no more than the word of a man.”

quran.ayah_ar: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
quran.ayah_en: Soon I will burn him in Hell!

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ
quran.ayah_en: And what will make you realize what Hell is?

quran.ayah_ar: لَا تُبْقِى وَلَا تَذَرُ
quran.ayah_en: It does not let anyone live or die,

quran.ayah_ar: لَوَّاحَةٌۭ لِّلْبَشَرِ
quran.ayah_en: scorching the skin.

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
quran.ayah_en: It is overseen by nineteen ˹keepers˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا جَعَلْنَآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَٰٓئِكَةًۭ ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةًۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَيَزْدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِيمَٰنًۭا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ وَٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًۭا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِىَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
quran.ayah_en: We have appointed only ˹stern˺ angels as wardens of the Fire. And We have made their number only as a test for the disbelievers, so that the People of the Book will be certain, and the believers will increase in faith, and neither the People of the Book nor the believers will have any doubts, and so that those ˹hypocrites˺ with sickness in their hearts and the disbelievers will argue, “What does Allah mean by such a number?” In this way Allah leaves whoever He wills to stray and guides whoever He wills. And none knows the forces of your Lord except He. And this ˹description of Hell˺ is only a reminder to humanity.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا وَٱلْقَمَرِ
quran.ayah_en: But no! By the moon,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
quran.ayah_en: and the night as it retreats,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَآ أَسْفَرَ
quran.ayah_en: and the day as it breaks!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى ٱلْكُبَرِ
quran.ayah_en: Surely Hell is one of the mightiest catastrophes—

quran.ayah_ar: نَذِيرًۭا لِّلْبَشَرِ
quran.ayah_en: a warning to humankind,

quran.ayah_ar: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
quran.ayah_en: to whichever of you chooses to take the lead or lag behind.

quran.ayah_ar: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
quran.ayah_en: Every soul will be detained for what it has done,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلْيَمِينِ
quran.ayah_en: except the people of the right,

quran.ayah_ar: فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: who will be in Gardens, asking one another

quran.ayah_ar: عَنِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: about the wicked ˹who will then be asked˺:

quran.ayah_ar: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِى سَقَرَ
quran.ayah_en: “What has landed you in Hell?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ
quran.ayah_en: They will reply, “We were not of those who prayed,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ ٱلْمِسْكِينَ
quran.ayah_en: nor did we feed the poor.

quran.ayah_ar: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلْخَآئِضِينَ
quran.ayah_en: We used to indulge ˹in falsehood˺ along with others,

quran.ayah_ar: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: and deny the Day of Judgment,

quran.ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلْيَقِينُ
quran.ayah_en: until the inevitable came to us.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَٰعَةُ ٱلشَّٰفِعِينَ
quran.ayah_en: So the pleas of intercessors will be of no benefit to them.

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ ٱلتَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Now, what is the matter with them that they are turning away from the reminder,

quran.ayah_ar: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌۭ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: as if they were spooked zebras

quran.ayah_ar: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: fleeing from a lion?

quran.ayah_ar: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًۭا مُّنَشَّرَةًۭ
quran.ayah_en: In fact, each one of them wishes to be given a ˹personal˺ letter ˹from Allah˺ for all ˹to read˺.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ
quran.ayah_en: But no! In fact, they do not fear the Hereafter.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Enough! Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a reminder.

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ
quran.ayah_en: But they cannot do so unless Allah wills. He ˹alone˺ is worthy to be feared and entitled to forgive.

quran.ayah_ar: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ
quran.ayah_en: I do swear by the Day of Judgment!

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلنَّفْسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
quran.ayah_en: And I do swear by the self-reproaching soul!

quran.ayah_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: Do people think We cannot reassemble their bones?

quran.ayah_ar: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّىَ بَنَانَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: Yes ˹indeed˺! We are ˹most˺ capable of restoring ˹even˺ their very fingertips.

quran.ayah_ar: بَلْ يُرِيدُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: Still people want to deny what is yet to come,

quran.ayah_ar: يَسْـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ
quran.ayah_en: asking ˹mockingly˺, “When is this Day of Judgment?”

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلْبَصَرُ
quran.ayah_en: But when the sight is stunned,

quran.ayah_ar: وَخَسَفَ ٱلْقَمَرُ
quran.ayah_en: and the moon is dimmed,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ
quran.ayah_en: and the sun and the moon are brought together,

quran.ayah_ar: يَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ ٱلْمَفَرُّ
quran.ayah_en: on that Day one will cry, “Where is the escape?”

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
quran.ayah_en: But no! There will be no refuge.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمُسْتَقَرُّ
quran.ayah_en: On that Day all will end up before your Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: يُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
quran.ayah_en: All will then be informed of what they have sent forth and left behind.

quran.ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: In fact, people will testify against their own souls,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: despite the excuses they come up with.

quran.ayah_ar: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
quran.ayah_en: Do not rush your tongue trying to memorize ˹a revelation of˺ the Quran.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُۥ وَقُرْءَانَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: It is certainly upon Us to ˹make you˺ memorize and recite it.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعْ قُرْءَانَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: So once We have recited a revelation ˹through Gabriel˺, follow its recitation ˹closely˺.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: Then it is surely upon Us to make it clear ˹to you˺.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ
quran.ayah_en: But no! In fact, you love this fleeting world,

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ
quran.ayah_en: and neglect the Hereafter.

quran.ayah_ar: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ نَّاضِرَةٌ
quran.ayah_en: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: looking at their Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: وَوُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بَاسِرَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: And ˹other˺ faces will be gloomy,

quran.ayah_ar: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: anticipating something devastating to befall them.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِىَ
quran.ayah_en: But no! ˹Beware of the day˺ when the soul reaches the collar bone ˹as it leaves˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: and it will be said, “Is there any healer ˹who can save this life˺?”

quran.ayah_ar: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلْفِرَاقُ
quran.ayah_en: And the dying person realizes it is ˹their˺ time to depart,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹then˺ their feet are tied together ˹in a shroud˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمَسَاقُ
quran.ayah_en: On that day they will be driven to your Lord ˹alone˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: This denier neither believed nor prayed,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: but persisted in denial and turned away,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ يَتَمَطَّىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: then went to their own people, walking boastfully.

quran.ayah_ar: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Woe to you, and more woe!

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: Again, woe to you, and even more woe!

quran.ayah_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
quran.ayah_en: Do people think they will be left without purpose?

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةًۭ مِّن مَّنِىٍّۢ يُمْنَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Were they not ˹once˺ a sperm-drop emitted?

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةًۭ فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Then they became a clinging clot ˹of blood˺, then He developed and perfected their form,

quran.ayah_ar: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: producing from it both sexes, male and female.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْۦِىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Is such ˹a Creator˺ unable to bring the dead back to life?

quran.ayah_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَٰنِ حِينٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًۭٔا مَّذْكُورًا
quran.ayah_en: Is there not a period of time when each human is nothing yet worth mentioning?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍۢ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
quran.ayah_en: ˹For˺ indeed, We ˹alone˺ created humans from a drop of mixed fluids, ˹in order˺ to test them, so We made them hear and see.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًۭا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
quran.ayah_en: We already showed them the Way, whether they ˹choose to˺ be grateful or ungrateful.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَٰلًۭا وَسَعِيرًا
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains, shackles, and a blazing Fire.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍۢ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, the virtuous will have a drink ˹of pure wine˺—flavoured with camphor—

quran.ayah_ar: عَيْنًۭا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹from˺ a spring where Allah’s servants will drink, flowing at their will.

quran.ayah_ar: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًۭا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: They ˹are those who˺ fulfil ˹their˺ vows and fear a Day of sweeping horror,

quran.ayah_ar: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًۭا وَيَتِيمًۭا وَأَسِيرًا
quran.ayah_en: and give food—despite their desire for it—to the poor, the orphan, and the captive,

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءًۭ وَلَا شُكُورًا
quran.ayah_en: ˹saying to themselves,˺ “We feed you only for the sake of Allah, seeking neither reward nor thanks from you.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًۭا قَمْطَرِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: We fear from our Lord a horribly distressful Day.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةًۭ وَسُرُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: So Allah will deliver them from the horror of that Day, and grant them radiance and joy,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةًۭ وَحَرِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and reward them for their perseverance with a Garden ˹in Paradise˺ and ˹garments of˺ silk.

quran.ayah_ar: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًۭا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: There they will be reclining on ˹canopied˺ couches, never seeing scorching heat or bitter cold.

quran.ayah_ar: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: The Garden’s shade will be right above them, and its fruit will be made very easy to reach.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍۢ مِّن فِضَّةٍۢ وَأَكْوَابٍۢ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
quran.ayah_en: They will be waited on with silver vessels and cups of crystal—

quran.ayah_ar: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍۢ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: crystalline silver, filled precisely as desired.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًۭا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: And they will be given a drink ˹of pure wine˺ flavoured with ginger

quran.ayah_ar: عَيْنًۭا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: from a spring there, called Salsabil.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌۭ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًۭا مَّنثُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: They will be waited on by eternal youths. If you saw them, you would think they were scattered pearls.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًۭا وَمُلْكًۭا كَبِيرًا
quran.ayah_en: And if you looked around, you would see ˹indescribable˺ bliss and a vast kingdom.

quran.ayah_ar: عَٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌۭ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌۭ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍۢ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًۭا طَهُورًا
quran.ayah_en: The virtuous will be ˹dressed˺ in garments of fine green silk and rich brocade, and adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءًۭ وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
quran.ayah_en: ˹And they will be told,˺ “All this is surely a reward for you. Your striving has been appreciated.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, it is We Who have revealed the Quran to you ˹O Prophet˺ in stages.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not yield to any evildoer or ˹staunch˺ disbeliever from among them.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةًۭ وَأَصِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹Always˺ remember the Name of your Lord morning and evening,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًۭا طَوِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: and prostrate before Him during part of the night,

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًۭا ثَقِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Surely those ˹pagans˺ love this fleeting world, ˹totally˺ neglecting a weighty Day ahead of them.

quran.ayah_ar: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
quran.ayah_en: It is We Who created them and perfected their ˹physical˺ form. But if We will, We can easily replace them with others.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the ˹Right˺ Way to their Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا
quran.ayah_en: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺ unless Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

quran.ayah_ar: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
quran.ayah_en: He admits whoever He wills into His mercy. As for the wrongdoers, He has prepared for them a painful punishment

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْمُرْسَلَٰتِ عُرْفًۭا
quran.ayah_en: By those ˹winds˺ sent forth successively,

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلْعَٰصِفَٰتِ عَصْفًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and those blowing violently,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّٰشِرَٰتِ نَشْرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and those scattering ˹rainclouds˺ widely!

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلْفَٰرِقَٰتِ فَرْقًۭا
quran.ayah_en: And ˹by˺ those ˹angels˺ fully distinguishing ˹truth from falsehood˺,

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلْمُلْقِيَٰتِ ذِكْرًا
quran.ayah_en: and those delivering revelation,

quran.ayah_ar: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
quran.ayah_en: ending excuses and giving warnings.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Surely, what you are promised will come to pass.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
quran.ayah_en: So when the stars are put out,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and the sky is torn apart,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and the mountains are blown away,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and the messengers’ time ˹to testify˺ comes up—

quran.ayah_ar: لِأَىِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
quran.ayah_en: for which Day has all this been set?

quran.ayah_ar: لِيَوْمِ ٱلْفَصْلِ
quran.ayah_en: For the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision!

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ
quran.ayah_en: And what will make you realize what the Day of Decision is?

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Did We not destroy earlier disbelievers?

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
quran.ayah_en: And We will make the later disbelievers follow them.

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: This is how We deal with the wicked.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٍۢ مَّهِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Did We not create you from a humble fluid,

quran.ayah_ar: فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ فِى قَرَارٍۢ مَّكِينٍ
quran.ayah_en: placing it in a secure place

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: until an appointed time?

quran.ayah_ar: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْقَٰدِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: We ˹perfectly˺ ordained ˹its development˺. How excellent are We in doing so!

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
quran.ayah_en: Have We not made the earth a lodging

quran.ayah_ar: أَحْيَآءًۭ وَأَمْوَٰتًۭا
quran.ayah_en: for the living and the dead,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَٰمِخَٰتٍۢ وَأَسْقَيْنَٰكُم مَّآءًۭ فُرَاتًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and placed upon it towering, firm mountains, and given you fresh water to drink?

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

quran.ayah_ar: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹The disbelievers will be told,˺ “Proceed into that ˹Fire˺ which you used to deny!

quran.ayah_ar: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّۢ ذِى ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Proceed into the shade ˹of smoke˺ which rises in three columns,

quran.ayah_ar: لَّا ظَلِيلٍۢ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
quran.ayah_en: providing neither coolness nor shelter from the flames.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِى بِشَرَرٍۢ كَٱلْقَصْرِ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, it hurls sparks ˹as big˺ as huge castles,

quran.ayah_ar: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَٰلَتٌۭ صُفْرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹as dark˺ as black camels.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
quran.ayah_en: On that Day they will not ˹be in a position to˺ speak,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: nor will they be permitted to offer excuses.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

quran.ayah_ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَٰكُمْ وَٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will be told by Allah,˺ “This is the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision: We have gathered you along with earlier disbelievers ˹for punishment˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌۭ فَكِيدُونِ
quran.ayah_en: So if you have a scheme ˹to save yourselves˺, then use it against Me.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى ظِلَٰلٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, the righteous will be amid ˹cool˺ shade and springs

quran.ayah_ar: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and any fruit they desire.

quran.ayah_ar: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Surely this is how We reward the good-doers.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹But˺ woe on that Day to the deniers!

quran.ayah_ar: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: “Eat and enjoy yourselves for a little while, ˹for˺ you are truly wicked.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: When it is said to them, “Bow down ˹before Allah,” they do not bow.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

quran.ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: So what message after this ˹Quran˺ would they believe in?

quran.ayah_ar: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: What are they asking one another about?

quran.ayah_ar: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: About the momentous news,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
quran.ayah_en: over which they disagree.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: But no! They will come to know.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Again, no! They will come to know.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِهَٰدًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Have We not smoothed out the earth ˹like a bed˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and ˹made˺ the mountains as ˹its˺ pegs,

quran.ayah_ar: وَخَلَقْنَٰكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and created you in pairs,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and made your sleep for rest,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and made the night as a cover,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and made the day for livelihood,

quran.ayah_ar: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًۭا شِدَادًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and built above you seven mighty ˹heavens˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًۭا وَهَّاجًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and placed ˹in them˺ a shining lamp,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمُعْصِرَٰتِ مَآءًۭ ثَجَّاجًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and sent down from rainclouds pouring water,

quran.ayah_ar: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبًّۭا وَنَبَاتًۭا
quran.ayah_en: producing by it grain and ˹various˺ plants,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَنَّٰتٍ أَلْفَافًا
quran.ayah_en: and dense orchards?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَٰتًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision is an appointed time—

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ˹it is˺ the Day the Trumpet will be blown, and you will ˹all˺ come forth in crowds.

quran.ayah_ar: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَٰبًۭا
quran.ayah_en: The sky will be ˹split˺ open, becoming ˹many˺ gates,

quran.ayah_ar: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
quran.ayah_en: and the mountains will be blown away, becoming ˹like˺ a mirage.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, Hell is lying in ambush

quran.ayah_ar: لِّلطَّٰغِينَ مَـَٔابًۭا
quran.ayah_en: as a home for the transgressors,

quran.ayah_ar: لَّٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحْقَابًۭا
quran.ayah_en: where they will remain for ˹endless˺ ages.

quran.ayah_ar: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًۭا وَلَا شَرَابًا
quran.ayah_en: There they will not taste any coolness or drink,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا حَمِيمًۭا وَغَسَّاقًۭا
quran.ayah_en: except boiling water and ˹oozing˺ pus—

quran.ayah_ar: جَزَآءًۭ وِفَاقًا
quran.ayah_en: a fitting reward.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًۭا
quran.ayah_en: For they never expected any reckoning,

quran.ayah_ar: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كِذَّابًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and totally rejected Our signs.

quran.ayah_ar: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَٰهُ كِتَٰبًۭا
quran.ayah_en: And We have everything recorded precisely.

quran.ayah_ar: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
quran.ayah_en: ˹So the deniers will be told,˺ “Taste ˹the punishment˺, for all you will get from Us is more torment.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, the righteous will have salvation—

quran.ayah_ar: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعْنَٰبًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Gardens, vineyards,

quran.ayah_ar: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and full-bosomed maidens of equal age,

quran.ayah_ar: وَكَأْسًۭا دِهَاقًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and full cups ˹of pure wine˺,

quran.ayah_ar: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًۭا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًۭا
quran.ayah_en: never to hear any idle talk or lying therein—

quran.ayah_ar: جَزَآءًۭ مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابًۭا
quran.ayah_en: a ˹fitting˺ reward as a generous gift from your Lord,

quran.ayah_ar: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًۭا
quran.ayah_en: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, the Most Compassionate. No one will dare speak to Him

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّۭا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًۭا
quran.ayah_en: on the Day the ˹holy˺ spirit and the angels will stand in ranks. None will talk, except those granted permission by the Most Compassionate and whose words are true.

quran.ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
quran.ayah_en: That Day is the ˹ultimate˺ truth. So let whoever wills take the path leading back to their Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَٰكُمْ عَذَابًۭا قَرِيبًۭا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We have warned you of an imminent punishment—the Day every person will see ˹the consequences of˺ what their hands have done, and the disbelievers will cry, “I wish I were dust.”

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّٰزِعَٰتِ غَرْقًۭا
quran.ayah_en: By those ˹angels˺ stripping out ˹evil souls˺ harshly,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّٰشِطَٰتِ نَشْطًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and those pulling out ˹good souls˺ gently,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّٰبِحَٰتِ سَبْحًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and those gliding ˹through heavens˺ swiftly,

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلسَّٰبِقَٰتِ سَبْقًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and those taking the lead vigorously,

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلْمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمْرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and those conducting affairs ˹obediently˺!

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Consider˺ the Day ˹when˺ the quaking Blast will come to pass,

quran.ayah_ar: تَتْبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
quran.ayah_en: followed by a second Blast.

quran.ayah_ar: قُلُوبٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ وَاجِفَةٌ
quran.ayah_en: ˹The deniers’˺ hearts on that Day will be trembling ˹in horror˺,

quran.ayah_ar: أَبْصَٰرُهَا خَٰشِعَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: with their eyes downcast.

quran.ayah_ar: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِى ٱلْحَافِرَةِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹But now˺ they ask ˹mockingly˺, “Will we really be restored to our former state,

quran.ayah_ar: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمًۭا نَّخِرَةًۭ
quran.ayah_en: even after we have been reduced to decayed bones?”

quran.ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ تِلْكَ إِذًۭا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Adding, “Then such a return would be a ˹total˺ loss ˹for us˺!”

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: But indeed, it will take only one ˹mighty˺ Blast,

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
quran.ayah_en: and at once they will be above ground.

quran.ayah_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: Has the story of Moses reached you ˹O Prophet˺?

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
quran.ayah_en: His Lord called him in the sacred valley of Ṭuwa,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: ˹commanding,˺ “Go to Pharaoh, for he has truly transgressed ˹all bounds˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And say, ‘Would you ˹be willing to˺ purify yourself,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and let me guide you to your Lord so that you will be in awe ˹of Him˺?’”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلْءَايَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Then Moses showed him the great sign,

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: but he denied and disobeyed ˹Allah˺,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: then turned his back, striving ˹against the truth˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Then he summoned ˹his people˺ and called out,

quran.ayah_ar: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: saying, “I am your lord, the most high!”

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ وَٱلْأُولَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: So Allah overtook him, making him an example in this life and the next.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةًۭ لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: Surely in this is a lesson for whoever stands in awe of ˹Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ ۚ بَنَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: Which is harder to create: you or the sky? He built it,

quran.ayah_ar: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: raising it high and forming it flawlessly.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: He dimmed its night, and brought forth its daylight.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ
quran.ayah_en: As for the earth, He spread it out as well,

quran.ayah_ar: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرْعَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: bringing forth its water and pastures

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَرْسَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: and setting the mountains firmly ˹upon it˺—

quran.ayah_ar: مَتَٰعًۭا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ
quran.ayah_en: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: But, when the Supreme Disaster comes to pass—

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: the Day every person will remember all ˹their˺ striving,

quran.ayah_ar: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and the Hellfire will be displayed for all to see—

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: then as for those who transgressed

quran.ayah_ar: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
quran.ayah_en: and preferred the ˹fleeting˺ life of this world,

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: the Hellfire will certainly be ˹their˺ home.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And as for those who were in awe of standing before their Lord and restrained themselves from ˹evil˺ desires,

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَنَّةَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Paradise will certainly be ˹their˺ home.

quran.ayah_ar: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: They ask you ˹O Prophet˺ regarding the Hour, “When will it be?”

quran.ayah_ar: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَىٰهَآ
quran.ayah_en: But it is not for you to tell its time.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ
quran.ayah_en: That knowledge rests with your Lord ˹alone˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: Your duty is only to warn whoever is in awe of it.

quran.ayah_ar: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: On the Day they see it, it will be as if they had stayed ˹in the world˺ no more than one evening or its morning.

quran.ayah_ar: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: He frowned and turned ˹his attention˺ away,

quran.ayah_ar: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: ˹simply˺ because the blind man came to him ˹interrupting˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: You never know ˹O Prophet˺, perhaps he may be purified,

quran.ayah_ar: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: or he may be mindful, benefitting from the reminder.

quran.ayah_ar: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: As for the one who was indifferent,

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: you gave him your ˹undivided˺ attention,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: even though you are not to blame if he would not be purified.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: But as for the one who came to you, eager ˹to learn˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: being in awe ˹of Allah˺,

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: you were inattentive to him.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: But no! This ˹revelation˺ is truly a reminder.

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.

quran.ayah_ar: فِى صُحُفٍۢ مُّكَرَّمَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: It is ˹written˺ on pages held in honour—

quran.ayah_ar: مَّرْفُوعَةٍۢ مُّطَهَّرَةٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: highly esteemed, purified—

quran.ayah_ar: بِأَيْدِى سَفَرَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: by the hands of angel-scribes,

quran.ayah_ar: كِرَامٍۭ بَرَرَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: honourable and virtuous.

quran.ayah_ar: قُتِلَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَآ أَكْفَرَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: Condemned are ˹disbelieving˺ humans! How ungrateful they are ˹to Allah˺!

quran.ayah_ar: مِنْ أَىِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: From what substance did He create them?

quran.ayah_ar: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: He created them from a sperm-drop, and ordained their development.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: Then He makes the way easy for them,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقْبَرَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: then causes them to die and be buried.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: Then when He wills, He will resurrect them.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: But no! They have failed to comply with what He ordered.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
quran.ayah_en: Let people then consider their food:

quran.ayah_ar: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا ٱلْمَآءَ صَبًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: how We pour down rain in abundance

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ شَقًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: and meticulously split the earth open ˹for sprouts˺,

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: causing grain to grow in it,

quran.ayah_ar: وَعِنَبًۭا وَقَضْبًۭا
quran.ayah_en: as well as grapes and greens,

quran.ayah_ar: وَزَيْتُونًۭا وَنَخْلًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and olives and palm trees,

quran.ayah_ar: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلْبًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and dense orchards,

quran.ayah_ar: وَفَٰكِهَةًۭ وَأَبًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: and fruit and fodder—

quran.ayah_ar: مَّتَٰعًۭا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ
quran.ayah_en: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ
quran.ayah_en: Then, when the Deafening Blast comes to pass—

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
quran.ayah_en: on that Day every person will flee from their own siblings,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹even˺ their mother and father,

quran.ayah_ar: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹even˺ their spouse and children.

quran.ayah_ar: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ شَأْنٌۭ يُغْنِيهِ
quran.ayah_en: For then everyone will have enough concern of their own.

quran.ayah_ar: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ مُّسْفِرَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright,

quran.ayah_ar: ضَاحِكَةٌۭ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: laughing and rejoicing,

quran.ayah_ar: وَوُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: while ˹other˺ faces will be dusty,

quran.ayah_ar: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
quran.ayah_en: cast in gloom—

quran.ayah_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَفَرَةُ ٱلْفَجَرَةُ
quran.ayah_en: those are the disbelievers, the ˹wicked˺ sinners.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذَا ٱلشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: When the sun is put out,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when the stars fall down,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when the mountains are blown away,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when pregnant camels are left untended,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when wild beasts are gathered together,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when the seas are set on fire,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when the souls ˹and their bodies˺ are paired ˹once more˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْمَوْءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when baby girls, buried alive, are asked

quran.ayah_ar: بِأَىِّ ذَنۢبٍۢ قُتِلَتْ
quran.ayah_en: for what crime they were put to death,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when the records ˹of deeds˺ are laid open,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when the sky is stripped away,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when the Hellfire is fiercely flared up,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when Paradise is brought near—

quran.ayah_ar: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌۭ مَّآ أَحْضَرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: ˹on that Day˺ each soul will know what ˹deeds˺ it has brought along.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلْخُنَّسِ
quran.ayah_en: I do swear by the receding stars

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْكُنَّسِ
quran.ayah_en: which travel and hide,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
quran.ayah_en: and the night as it falls

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
quran.ayah_en: and the day as it breaks!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍۢ كَرِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the Word of ˹Allah delivered by Gabriel,˺ a noble messenger-angel,

quran.ayah_ar: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: full of power, held in honour by the Lord of the Throne,

quran.ayah_ar: مُّطَاعٍۢ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: obeyed there ˹in heaven˺, and trustworthy.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And your fellow man is not insane.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
quran.ayah_en: And he did see that ˹angel˺ on the clear horizon,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: and he does not withhold ˹what is revealed to him of˺ the unseen.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَٰنٍۢ رَّجِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: And this ˹Quran˺ is not the word of an outcast devil.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: So what ˹other˺ path would you take?

quran.ayah_ar: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is only a reminder to the whole world—

quran.ayah_ar: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
quran.ayah_en: to whoever of you wills to take the Straight Way.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺, except by the Will of Allah, the Lord of all worlds.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: When the sky splits open,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when the stars fall away,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when the seas burst forth,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when the graves spill out,

quran.ayah_ar: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌۭ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
quran.ayah_en: ˹then˺ each soul will know what it has sent forth or left behind.

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: O humanity! What has emboldened you against your Lord, the Most Generous,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
quran.ayah_en: Who created you, fashioned you, and perfected your design,

quran.ayah_ar: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍۢ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
quran.ayah_en: moulding you in whatever form He willed?

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: But no! In fact, you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَٰفِظِينَ
quran.ayah_en: while you are certainly observed by vigilant,

quran.ayah_ar: كِرَامًۭا كَٰتِبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: honourable angels, recording ˹everything˺.

quran.ayah_ar: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: They know whatever you do.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, the virtuous will be in bliss,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ ٱلْفُجَّارَ لَفِى جَحِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: and the wicked will be in Hell,

quran.ayah_ar: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: burning in it on Judgment Day,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and they will have no escape from it.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: What will make you realize what Judgment Day is?

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: Again, what will make you realize what Judgment Day is?

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌۭ لِّنَفْسٍۢ شَيْـًۭٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلَّهِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹It is˺ the Day no soul will be of ˹any˺ benefit to another whatsoever, for all authority on that Day belongs to Allah ˹entirely˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe to the defrauders!

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Those who take full measure ˹when they buy˺ from people,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: but give less when they measure or weigh for buyers.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Do such people not think that they will be resurrected

quran.ayah_ar: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: for a tremendous Day—

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: the Day ˹all˺ people will stand before the Lord of all worlds?

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: But no! The wicked are certainly bound for Sijjin ˹in the depths of Hell˺—

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: and what will make you realize what Sijjin is?—

quran.ayah_ar: كِتَٰبٌۭ مَّرْقُومٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: a fate ˹already˺ sealed.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Woe on that Day to the deniers—

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: those who deny Judgment Day!

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
quran.ayah_en: None would deny it except every evildoing transgressor.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them, they say, “Ancient fables!”

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: But no! In fact, their hearts have been stained by all ˹the evil˺ they used to commit!

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Undoubtedly, they will be sealed off from their Lord on that Day.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: Moreover, they will surely burn in Hell,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and then be told, “This is what you used to deny.”

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ
quran.ayah_en: But no! The virtuous are certainly bound for ’Illiyûn ˹in elevated Gardens˺—

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
quran.ayah_en: and what will make you realize what ’Illiyûn is?—

quran.ayah_ar: كِتَٰبٌۭ مَّرْقُومٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: a fate ˹already˺ sealed,

quran.ayah_ar: يَشْهَدُهُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: witnessed by those nearest ˹to Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ
quran.ayah_en: Surely the virtuous will be in bliss,

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹seated˺ on ˹canopied˺ couches, gazing around.

quran.ayah_ar: تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: You will recognize on their faces the glow of delight.

quran.ayah_ar: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍۢ مَّخْتُومٍ
quran.ayah_en: They will be given a drink of sealed, pure wine,

quran.ayah_ar: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌۭ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
quran.ayah_en: whose last sip will smell like musk. So let whoever aspires to this strive ˹diligently˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
quran.ayah_en: And this drink’s flavour will come from Tasnim—

quran.ayah_ar: عَيْنًۭا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: a spring from which those nearest ˹to Allah˺ will drink.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, the wicked used to laugh at the believers,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
quran.ayah_en: wink to one another whenever they passed by,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and muse ˹over these exploits˺ upon returning to their own people.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
quran.ayah_en: And when they saw the faithful, they would say, “These ˹people˺ are truly astray,”

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أُرْسِلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ حَٰفِظِينَ
quran.ayah_en: even though they were not sent as keepers over the believers.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
quran.ayah_en: But on that Day the believers will be laughing at the disbelievers,

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: as they sit on ˹canopied˺ couches, looking on.

quran.ayah_ar: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹The believers will be asked,˺ “Have the disbelievers ˹not˺ been paid back for what they used to do?”

quran.ayah_ar: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ
quran.ayah_en: When the sky bursts open,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
quran.ayah_en: obeying its Lord as it must,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
quran.ayah_en: and when the earth is flattened out,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
quran.ayah_en: and ejects ˹all˺ its contents and becomes empty,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
quran.ayah_en: obeying its Lord as it must, ˹surely you will all be judged˺.

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًۭا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
quran.ayah_en: O humanity! Indeed, you are labouring restlessly towards your Lord, and will ˹eventually˺ meet the consequences.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ
quran.ayah_en: As for those who are given their record in their right hand,

quran.ayah_ar: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًۭا يَسِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: they will have an easy reckoning,

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and will return to their people joyfully.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
quran.ayah_en: And as for those who are given their record ˹in their left hand˺ from behind their backs,

quran.ayah_ar: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًۭا
quran.ayah_en: they will cry for ˹instant˺ destruction,

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
quran.ayah_en: and will burn in the blazing Fire.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِىٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا
quran.ayah_en: For they used to be prideful among their people,

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
quran.ayah_en: thinking they would never return ˹to Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Yes ˹they would˺! Surely their Lord has always been All-Seeing of them.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
quran.ayah_en: So, I do swear by the twilight!

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
quran.ayah_en: And by the night and whatever it envelops!

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
quran.ayah_en: And by the moon when it waxes full!

quran.ayah_ar: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: You will certainly pass from one state to another.

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
quran.ayah_en: So what is the matter with them that they do not believe,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
quran.ayah_en: and when the Quran is recited to them, they do not bow down ˹in submission˺?

quran.ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُكَذِّبُونَ
quran.ayah_en: In fact, the disbelievers persist in denial.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: But Allah knows best whatever they hide.

quran.ayah_ar: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
quran.ayah_en: So give them good news of a painful punishment.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: But those who believe and do good will have a never-ending reward.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ
quran.ayah_en: By the sky full of constellations,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْمَوْعُودِ
quran.ayah_en: and the promised Day ˹of Judgment˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَشَاهِدٍۢ وَمَشْهُودٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: and the witness and what is witnessed!

quran.ayah_ar: قُتِلَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْأُخْدُودِ
quran.ayah_en: Condemned are the makers of the ditch—

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلْوَقُودِ
quran.ayah_en: the fire ˹pit˺, filled with fuel—

quran.ayah_ar: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: when they sat around it,

quran.ayah_ar: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: watching what they had ˹ordered to be˺ done to the believers,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
quran.ayah_en: who they resented for no reason other than belief in Allah—the Almighty, the Praiseworthy—

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدٌ
quran.ayah_en: ˹the One˺ to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and earth. And Allah is a Witness over all things.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
quran.ayah_en: Those who persecute the believing men and women and then do not repent will certainly suffer the punishment of Hell and the torment of burning.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّٰتٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
quran.ayah_en: Surely those who believe and do good will have Gardens under which rivers flow. That is the greatest triumph.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, the ˹crushing˺ grip of your Lord is severe.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
quran.ayah_en: ˹For˺ He is certainly the One Who originates and resurrects ˹all˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلْوَدُودُ
quran.ayah_en: And He is the All-Forgiving, All-Loving—

quran.ayah_ar: ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْمَجِيدُ
quran.ayah_en: Lord of the Throne, the All-Glorious,

quran.ayah_ar: فَعَّالٌۭ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
quran.ayah_en: Doer of whatever He wills.

quran.ayah_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْجُنُودِ
quran.ayah_en: Has the story of the ˹destroyed˺ forces reached you ˹O Prophet˺—

quran.ayah_ar: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹the forces of˺ Pharaoh and Thamûd?

quran.ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى تَكْذِيبٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Yet the disbelievers ˹still˺ persist in denial.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطٌۢ
quran.ayah_en: But Allah encompasses them from all sides.

quran.ayah_ar: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْءَانٌۭ مَّجِيدٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: In fact, this is a glorious Quran,

quran.ayah_ar: فِى لَوْحٍۢ مَّحْفُوظٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: ˹recorded˺ in a Preserved Tablet.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
quran.ayah_en: By the heaven and the nightly star!

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
quran.ayah_en: And what will make you realize what the nightly star is?

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلنَّجْمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
quran.ayah_en: ˹It is˺ the star of piercing brightness.

quran.ayah_ar: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: There is no soul without a vigilant angel ˹recording everything˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
quran.ayah_en: Let people then consider what they were created from!

quran.ayah_ar: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٍۢ دَافِقٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: ˹They were˺ created from a spurting fluid,

quran.ayah_ar: يَخْرُجُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ ٱلصُّلْبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
quran.ayah_en: stemming from between the backbone and the ribcage.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Surely He is fully capable of bringing them back ˹to life˺

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ
quran.ayah_en: on the Day all secrets will be disclosed.

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍۢ وَلَا نَاصِرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Then one will have neither power nor ˹any˺ helper.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجْعِ
quran.ayah_en: By the sky with its recurring cycles,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدْعِ
quran.ayah_en: and the earth with its sprouting plants!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلٌۭ فَصْلٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a decisive word,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلْهَزْلِ
quran.ayah_en: and is not to be taken lightly.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًۭا
quran.ayah_en: They are certainly devising ˹evil˺ plans,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًۭا
quran.ayah_en: but I too am planning.

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًۢا
quran.ayah_en: So bear with the disbelievers ˹O Prophet˺. Let them be for ˹just˺ a little while.

quran.ayah_ar: سَبِّحِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلْأَعْلَى
quran.ayah_en: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Who created and ˹perfectly˺ fashioned ˹all˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِى قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and Who ordained precisely and inspired accordingly,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلْمَرْعَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and Who brings forth ˹green˺ pasture,

quran.ayah_ar: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحْوَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: then reduces it to withered chaff.

quran.ayah_ar: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: We will have you recite ˹the Quran, O  Prophet,˺ so you will not forget ˹any of it˺,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: unless Allah wills otherwise. He surely knows what is open and what is hidden.

quran.ayah_ar: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: We will facilitate for you the Way of Ease.

quran.ayah_ar: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: So ˹always˺ remind ˹with the Quran˺—˹even˺ if the reminder is beneficial ˹only to some˺.

quran.ayah_ar: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Those in awe ˹of Allah˺ will be mindful ˹of it˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَشْقَى
quran.ayah_en: But it will be shunned by the most wretched,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى يَصْلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: who will burn in the greatest Fire,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: where they will not ˹be able to˺ live or die.

quran.ayah_ar: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Successful indeed are those who purify themselves,

quran.ayah_ar: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: remember the Name of their Lord, and pray.

quran.ayah_ar: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
quran.ayah_en: But you ˹deniers only˺ prefer the life of this world,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: even though the Hereafter is far better and more lasting.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: This is certainly ˹mentioned˺ in the earlier Scriptures—

quran.ayah_ar: صُحُفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: the Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

quran.ayah_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَٰشِيَةِ
quran.ayah_en: Has the news of the Overwhelming Event reached you ˹O Prophet˺?

quran.ayah_ar: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ
quran.ayah_en: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be downcast,

quran.ayah_ar: عَامِلَةٌۭ نَّاصِبَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: ˹totally˺ overburdened, exhausted,

quran.ayah_ar: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةًۭ
quran.ayah_en: burning in a scorching Fire,

quran.ayah_ar: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ ءَانِيَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: left to drink from a scalding spring.

quran.ayah_ar: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: They will have no food except a foul, thorny shrub,

quran.ayah_ar: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: neither nourishing nor satisfying hunger.

quran.ayah_ar: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ نَّاعِمَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: On that Day ˹other˺ faces will be glowing with bliss,

quran.ayah_ar: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: ˹fully˺ pleased with their striving,

quran.ayah_ar: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: in an elevated Garden,

quran.ayah_ar: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةًۭ
quran.ayah_en: where no idle talk will be heard.

quran.ayah_ar: فِيهَا عَيْنٌۭ جَارِيَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: In it will be a running spring,

quran.ayah_ar: فِيهَا سُرُرٌۭ مَّرْفُوعَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: along with thrones raised high,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَكْوَابٌۭ مَّوْضُوعَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: and cups set at hand,

quran.ayah_ar: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹fine˺ cushions lined up,

quran.ayah_ar: وَزَرَابِىُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹splendid˺ carpets spread out.

quran.ayah_ar: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
quran.ayah_en: Do they not ever reflect on camels—how they were ˹masterfully˺ created;

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and the sky—how it was raised ˹high˺;

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِلَى ٱلْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and the mountains—how they were firmly set up;

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
quran.ayah_en: and the earth—how it was levelled out?

quran.ayah_ar: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: So, ˹continue to˺ remind ˹all, O  Prophet˺, for your duty is only to remind.

quran.ayah_ar: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
quran.ayah_en: You are not ˹there˺ to compel them ˹to believe˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
quran.ayah_en: But whoever turns away, persisting in disbelief,

quran.ayah_ar: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَكْبَرَ
quran.ayah_en: then Allah will inflict upon them the major punishment.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَآ إِيَابَهُمْ
quran.ayah_en: Surely to Us is their return,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
quran.ayah_en: then surely with Us is their reckoning.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْفَجْرِ
quran.ayah_en: By the dawn,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: and the ten nights,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلشَّفْعِ وَٱلْوَتْرِ
quran.ayah_en: and the even and the odd,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
quran.ayah_en: and the night when it passes!

quran.ayah_ar: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌۭ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ
quran.ayah_en: Is all this ˹not˺ a sufficient oath for those who have sense?

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
quran.ayah_en: Did you not see how your Lord dealt with ’Ȃd—

quran.ayah_ar: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلْعِمَادِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹the people˺ of Iram—with ˹their˺ great stature,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
quran.ayah_en: unmatched in any other land;

quran.ayah_ar: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخْرَ بِٱلْوَادِ
quran.ayah_en: and Thamûd who carved ˹their homes into˺ the rocks in the ˹Stone˺ Valley;

quran.ayah_ar: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِى ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
quran.ayah_en: and the Pharaoh of mighty structures?

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
quran.ayah_en: They all transgressed throughout the land,

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَكْثَرُوا۟ فِيهَا ٱلْفَسَادَ
quran.ayah_en: spreading much corruption there.

quran.ayah_ar: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
quran.ayah_en: So your Lord unleashed on them a scourge of punishment.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلْمِرْصَادِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹For˺ your Lord is truly vigilant.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ
quran.ayah_en: Now, whenever a human being is tested by their Lord through ˹His˺ generosity and blessings, they boast, “My Lord has ˹deservedly˺ honoured me!”

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
quran.ayah_en: But when He tests them by limiting their provision, they protest, “My Lord has ˹undeservedly˺ humiliated me!”

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
quran.ayah_en: Absolutely not! In fact, you are not ˹even˺ gracious to the orphan,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا تَحَٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
quran.ayah_en: nor do you urge one another to feed the poor.

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَأْكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكْلًۭا لَّمًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: And you devour ˹others’˺ inheritance greedily,

quran.ayah_ar: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلْمَالَ حُبًّۭا جَمًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: and love wealth fervently.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّۭا دَكًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: Enough! When the earth is entirely crushed over and over,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلْمَلَكُ صَفًّۭا صَفًّۭا
quran.ayah_en: and your Lord comes ˹to judge˺ with angels, rank upon rank,

quran.ayah_ar: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and Hell is brought forth on that Day—this is when every ˹disbelieving˺ person will remember ˹their own sins˺. But what is the use of remembering then?

quran.ayah_ar: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِى
quran.ayah_en: They will cry, “I wish I had sent forth ˹something good˺ for my ˹true˺ life.”

quran.ayah_ar: فَيَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: On that Day He will punish ˹them˺ severely, like no other,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: and bind ˹them˺ tightly, like no other.

quran.ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفْسُ ٱلْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
quran.ayah_en: ˹Allah will say to the righteous,˺ “O tranquil soul!

quran.ayah_ar: ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةًۭ مَّرْضِيَّةًۭ
quran.ayah_en: Return to your Lord, well pleased ˹with Him˺ and well pleasing ˹to Him˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱدْخُلِى فِى عِبَٰدِى
quran.ayah_en: So join My servants,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱدْخُلِى جَنَّتِى
quran.ayah_en: and enter My Paradise.”

quran.ayah_ar: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
quran.ayah_en: I do swear by this city ˹of Mecca˺—

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
quran.ayah_en: even though you ˹O Prophet˺ are subject to abuse in this city—

quran.ayah_ar: وَوَالِدٍۢ وَمَا وَلَدَ
quran.ayah_en: and by every parent and ˹their˺ child!

quran.ayah_ar: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِى كَبَدٍ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We have created humankind in ˹constant˺ struggle.

quran.ayah_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Do they think that no one has power over them,

quran.ayah_ar: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًۭا لُّبَدًا
quran.ayah_en: boasting, “I have wasted enormous wealth!”?

quran.ayah_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
quran.ayah_en: Do they think that no one sees them?

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عَيْنَيْنِ
quran.ayah_en: Have We not given them two eyes,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلِسَانًۭا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
quran.ayah_en: a tongue, and two lips;

quran.ayah_ar: وَهَدَيْنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجْدَيْنِ
quran.ayah_en: and shown them the two ways ˹of right and wrong˺?

quran.ayah_ar: فَلَا ٱقْتَحَمَ ٱلْعَقَبَةَ
quran.ayah_en: If only they had attempted the challenging path ˹of goodness instead˺!

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْعَقَبَةُ
quran.ayah_en: And what will make you realize what ˹attempting˺ the challenging path is?

quran.ayah_ar: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
quran.ayah_en: It is to free a slave,

quran.ayah_ar: أَوْ إِطْعَٰمٌۭ فِى يَوْمٍۢ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: or to give food in times of famine

quran.ayah_ar: يَتِيمًۭا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
quran.ayah_en: to an orphaned relative

quran.ayah_ar: أَوْ مِسْكِينًۭا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: or to a poor person in distress,

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
quran.ayah_en: and—above all—to be one of those who have faith and urge each other to perseverance and urge each other to compassion.

quran.ayah_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ
quran.ayah_en: These are the people of the right.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
quran.ayah_en: As for those who deny Our signs, they are the people of the left.

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌۭ مُّؤْصَدَةٌۢ
quran.ayah_en: The Fire will be sealed over them.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: By the sun and its brightness,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: and the moon as it follows it,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: and the day as it unveils it,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: and the night as it conceals it!

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: And by heaven and ˹the One˺ Who built it,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: and the earth and ˹the One˺ Who spread it!

quran.ayah_ar: وَنَفْسٍۢ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: And by the soul and ˹the One˺ Who fashioned it,

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: then with ˹the knowledge of˺ right and wrong inspired it!

quran.ayah_ar: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: Successful indeed is the one who purifies their soul,

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: and doomed is the one who corrupts it!

quran.ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَىٰهَآ
quran.ayah_en: Thamûd rejected ˹the truth˺ out of arrogance,

quran.ayah_ar: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشْقَىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: when the most wicked of them was roused ˹to kill the she-camel˺.

quran.ayah_ar: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: But the messenger of Allah warned them, “˹Do not disturb˺ Allah’s camel and her ˹turn to˺ drink!”

quran.ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: Still they defied him and slaughtered her. So their Lord crushed them for their crime, levelling all to the ground.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَٰهَا
quran.ayah_en: He has no fear of consequences.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: By the night when it covers,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and the day when it shines!

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: And by ˹the One˺ Who created male and female!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Surely the ends you strive for are diverse.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: As for the one who is charitable, mindful ˹of Allah˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹firmly˺ believes in the finest reward,

quran.ayah_ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: We will facilitate for them the Way of Ease.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And as for the one who is stingy, indifferent ˹to Allah˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹staunchly˺ denies the finest reward,

quran.ayah_ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: We will facilitate for them the path of hardship.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: And their wealth will be of no benefit to them when they tumble ˹into Hell˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: It is certainly upon Us ˹alone˺ to show ˹the way to˺ guidance.

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْءَاخِرَةَ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And surely to Us ˹alone˺ belong this life and the next.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًۭا تَلَظَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And so I have warned you of a raging Fire,

quran.ayah_ar: لَا يَصْلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْأَشْقَى
quran.ayah_en: in which none will burn except the most wretched—

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: who deny and turn away.

quran.ayah_ar: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَتْقَى
quran.ayah_en: But the righteous will be spared from it—

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى يُؤْتِى مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
quran.ayah_en: who donate ˹some of˺ their wealth only to purify themselves,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍۢ تُجْزَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: not in return for someone’s favours,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: but seeking the pleasure of their Lord, the Most High.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: They will certainly be pleased.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: By the morning sunlight,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: and the night when it falls still!

quran.ayah_ar: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Your Lord ˹O Prophet˺ has not abandoned you, nor has He become hateful ˹of you˺.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And the next life is certainly far better for you than this one.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: And ˹surely˺ your Lord will give so much to you that you will be pleased.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًۭا فَـَٔاوَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Did He not find you as an orphan then sheltered you?

quran.ayah_ar: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلًّۭا فَهَدَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Did He not find you unguided then guided you?

quran.ayah_ar: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلًۭا فَأَغْنَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: And did He not find you needy then satisfied your needs?

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا ٱلْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
quran.ayah_en: So do not oppress the orphan,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
quran.ayah_en: nor repulse the beggar.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
quran.ayah_en: And proclaim the blessings of your Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
quran.ayah_en: Have We not uplifted your heart for you ˹O Prophet˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
quran.ayah_en: relieved you of the burden

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
quran.ayah_en: which weighed so heavily on your back,

quran.ayah_ar: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
quran.ayah_en: and elevated your renown for you?

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
quran.ayah_en: So, surely with hardship comes ease.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًۭا
quran.ayah_en: Surely with ˹that˺ hardship comes ˹more˺ ease.

quran.ayah_ar: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَٱنصَبْ
quran.ayah_en: So once you have fulfilled ˹your duty˺, strive ˹in devotion˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرْغَب
quran.ayah_en: turning to your Lord ˹alone˺ with hope.

quran.ayah_ar: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ
quran.ayah_en: By the fig and the olive ˹of Jerusalem˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
quran.ayah_en: and Mount Sinai,

quran.ayah_ar: وَهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ ٱلْأَمِينِ
quran.ayah_en: and this secure city ˹of Mecca˺!

quran.ayah_ar: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We created humans in the best form.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ
quran.ayah_en: But We will reduce them to the lowest of the low ˹in Hell˺,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: except those who believe and do good—they will have a never-ending reward.

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: Now, what makes you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment?

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ ٱلْحَٰكِمِينَ
quran.ayah_en: Is Allah not the most just of all judges?

quran.ayah_ar: ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ
quran.ayah_en: Read, ˹O Prophet,˺ in the Name of your Lord Who created—

quran.ayah_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
quran.ayah_en: created humans from a clinging clot.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْأَكْرَمُ
quran.ayah_en: Read! And your Lord is the Most Generous,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَ بِٱلْقَلَمِ
quran.ayah_en: Who taught by the pen—

quran.ayah_ar: عَلَّمَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
quran.ayah_en: taught humanity what they knew not.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطْغَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: Most certainly, one exceeds all bounds

quran.ayah_ar: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: once they think they are self-sufficient.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجْعَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: ˹But˺ surely to your Lord is the return ˹of all˺.

quran.ayah_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يَنْهَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Have you seen the man who prevents

quran.ayah_ar: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: a servant ˹of Ours˺ from praying?

quran.ayah_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: What if this ˹servant˺ is ˹rightly˺ guided,

quran.ayah_ar: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقْوَىٰٓ
quran.ayah_en: or encourages righteousness?

quran.ayah_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
