quran.ayah_en: What if that ˹man˺ persists in denial and turns away?

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
quran.ayah_en: Does he not know that Allah sees ˹all˺?

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
quran.ayah_en: But no! If he does not desist, We will certainly drag him by the forelock—

quran.ayah_ar: نَاصِيَةٍۢ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: a lying, sinful forelock.

quran.ayah_ar: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: So let him call his associates.

quran.ayah_ar: سَنَدْعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ
quran.ayah_en: We will call the wardens of Hell.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَٱسْجُدْ وَٱقْتَرِب ۩
quran.ayah_en: Again, no! Never obey him ˹O Prophet˺! Rather, ˹continue to˺ prostrate and draw near ˹to Allah˺.

quran.ayah_ar: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, ˹it is˺ We ˹Who˺ sent this ˹Quran˺ down on the Night of Glory.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ
quran.ayah_en: And what will make you realize what the Night of Glory is?

quran.ayah_ar: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: The Night of Glory is better than a thousand months.

quran.ayah_ar: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: That night the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit descend, by the permission of their Lord, for every ˹decreed˺ matter.

quran.ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ ٱلْفَجْرِ
quran.ayah_en: It is all peace until the break of dawn.

quran.ayah_ar: لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
quran.ayah_en: The disbelievers from the People of the Book and the polytheists were not going to desist ˹from disbelief˺ until the clear proof came to them:

quran.ayah_ar: رَسُولٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًۭا مُّطَهَّرَةًۭ
quran.ayah_en: a messenger from Allah, reciting scrolls of ˹utmost˺ purity,

quran.ayah_ar: فِيهَا كُتُبٌۭ قَيِّمَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: containing upright commandments.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
quran.ayah_en: It was not until this clear proof came to the People of the Book that they became divided ˹about his prophethood˺—

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ
quran.ayah_en: even though they were only commanded to worship Allah ˹alone˺ with sincere devotion to Him in all uprightness, establish prayer, and pay alms-tax. That is the upright Way.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, those who disbelieve from the People of the Book and the polytheists will be in the Fire of Hell, to stay there forever. They are the worst of ˹all˺ beings.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, those who believe and do good—they are the best of ˹all˺ beings.

quran.ayah_ar: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّٰتُ عَدْنٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۖ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: Their reward with their Lord will be Gardens of Eternity, under which rivers flow, to stay there for ever and ever. Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. This is ˹only˺ for those in awe of their Lord.

quran.ayah_ar: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
quran.ayah_en: When the earth is shaken ˹in˺ its ultimate quaking,

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَخْرَجَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
quran.ayah_en: and when the earth throws out ˹all˺ its contents,

quran.ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا
quran.ayah_en: and humanity cries, “What is wrong with it?”—

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
quran.ayah_en: on that Day the earth will recount everything,

quran.ayah_ar: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
quran.ayah_en: having been inspired by your Lord ˹to do so˺.

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًۭا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ
quran.ayah_en: On that Day people will proceed in separate groups to be shown ˹the consequences of˺ their deeds.

quran.ayah_ar: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًۭا يَرَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍۢ شَرًّۭا يَرَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: And whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبْحًۭا
quran.ayah_en: ’ By the galloping, panting horses,

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلْمُورِيَٰتِ قَدْحًۭا
quran.ayah_en: striking sparks of fire ˹with their hoofs˺,

quran.ayah_ar: فَٱلْمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبْحًۭا
quran.ayah_en: launching raids at dawn,

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِۦ نَقْعًۭا
quran.ayah_en: stirring up ˹clouds of˺ dust,

quran.ayah_ar: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِۦ جَمْعًا
quran.ayah_en: and penetrating into the heart of enemy lines!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: Surely humankind is ungrateful to their Lord—

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: and they certainly attest to this—

quran.ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
quran.ayah_en: and they are truly extreme in their love of ˹worldly˺ gains.

quran.ayah_ar: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
quran.ayah_en: Do they not know that when the contents of the graves will be spilled out,

quran.ayah_ar: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
quran.ayah_en: and the secrets of the hearts will be laid bare—

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّخَبِيرٌۢ
quran.ayah_en: surely their Lord is All-Aware of them on that Day.

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
quran.ayah_en: The Striking Disaster!

quran.ayah_ar: مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
quran.ayah_en: What is the Striking Disaster?

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
quran.ayah_en: And what will make you realize what the Striking Disaster is?

quran.ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلْفَرَاشِ ٱلْمَبْثُوثِ
quran.ayah_en: ˹It is˺ the Day people will be like scattered moths,

quran.ayah_ar: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ
quran.ayah_en: and the mountains will be like carded wool.

quran.ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: So as for those whose scale is heavy ˹with good deeds˺,

quran.ayah_ar: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍۢ رَّاضِيَةٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: they will be in a life of bliss.

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: And as for those whose scale is light,

quran.ayah_ar: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: their home will be the abyss.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهْ
quran.ayah_en: And what will make you realize what that is?

quran.ayah_ar: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌۢ
quran.ayah_en: ˹It is˺ a scorching Fire.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلْهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ
quran.ayah_en: Competition for more ˹gains˺ diverts you ˹from Allah˺,

quran.ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ ٱلْمَقَابِرَ
quran.ayah_en: until you end up in ˹your˺ graves.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: But no! You will soon come to know.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Again, no! You will soon come to know.

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, if you were to know ˹your fate˺ with certainty, ˹you would have acted differently˺.

quran.ayah_ar: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ
quran.ayah_en: ˹But˺ you will surely see the Hellfire.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
quran.ayah_en: Again, you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

quran.ayah_ar: ثُمَّ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
quran.ayah_en: Then, on that Day, you will definitely be questioned about ˹your worldly˺ pleasures.

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱلْعَصْرِ
quran.ayah_en: By the ˹passage of˺ time!

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ
quran.ayah_en: Surely humanity is in ˹grave˺ loss,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
quran.ayah_en: except those who have faith, do good, and urge each other to the truth, and urge each other to perseverance.

quran.ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍۢ لُّمَزَةٍ
quran.ayah_en: Woe to every backbiter, slanderer,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَالًۭا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: who amasses wealth ˹greedily˺ and counts it ˹repeatedly˺,

quran.ayah_ar: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ
quran.ayah_en: thinking that their wealth will make them immortal!

quran.ayah_ar: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِى ٱلْحُطَمَةِ
quran.ayah_en: Not at all! Such a person will certainly be tossed into the Crusher.

quran.ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحُطَمَةُ
quran.ayah_en: And what will make you realize what the Crusher is?

quran.ayah_ar: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُوقَدَةُ
quran.ayah_en: ˹It is˺ Allah’s kindled Fire,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّتِى تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةِ
quran.ayah_en: which rages over the hearts.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌۭ
quran.ayah_en: It will be sealed over them,

quran.ayah_ar: فِى عَمَدٍۢ مُّمَدَّدَةٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: ˹tightly secured˺ with long braces.

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
quran.ayah_en: Have you not seen ˹O Prophet˺ how your Lord dealt with the Army of the Elephant?

quran.ayah_ar: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْلِيلٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: Did He not frustrate their scheme?

quran.ayah_ar: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
quran.ayah_en: For He sent against them flocks of birds,

quran.ayah_ar: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍۢ مِّن سِجِّيلٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: that pelted them with stones of baked clay,

quran.ayah_ar: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍۢ مَّأْكُولٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: leaving them like chewed up straw.

quran.ayah_ar: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيْشٍ
quran.ayah_en: ˹At least˺ for ˹the favour of˺ making Quraysh habitually secure—

quran.ayah_ar: إِۦلَٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيْفِ
quran.ayah_en: secure in their trading caravan ˹to Yemen˺ in the winter and ˹Syria˺ in the summer—

quran.ayah_ar: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلْبَيْتِ
quran.ayah_en: let them worship the Lord of this ˹Sacred˺ House,

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍۢ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: Who has fed them against hunger and made them secure against fear.

quran.ayah_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
quran.ayah_en: Have you seen the one who denies the ˹final˺ Judgment?

quran.ayah_ar: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يَدُعُّ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
quran.ayah_en: That is the one who repulses the orphan,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
quran.ayah_en: and does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

quran.ayah_ar: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
quran.ayah_en: So woe to those ˹hypocrites˺ who pray

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
quran.ayah_en: yet are unmindful of their prayers;

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَآءُونَ
quran.ayah_en: those who ˹only˺ show off,

quran.ayah_ar: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ
quran.ayah_en: and refuse to give ˹even the simplest˺ aid.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَعْطَيْنَٰكَ ٱلْكَوْثَرَ
quran.ayah_en: Indeed, We have granted you ˹O Prophet˺ abundant goodness.

quran.ayah_ar: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنْحَرْ
quran.ayah_en: So pray and sacrifice to your Lord ˹alone˺.

quran.ayah_ar: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلْأَبْتَرُ
quran.ayah_en: Only the one who hates you is truly cut off ˹from any goodness˺.

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “O you disbelievers!

quran.ayah_ar: لَآ أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
quran.ayah_en: I do not worship what you worship,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
quran.ayah_en: nor do you worship what I worship.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٌۭ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
quran.ayah_en: I will never worship what you worship,

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
quran.ayah_en: nor will you ever worship what I worship.

quran.ayah_ar: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِىَ دِينِ
quran.ayah_en: You have your way, and I have my Way.”

quran.ayah_ar: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ
quran.ayah_en: When Allah’s ˹ultimate˺ help comes and the victory ˹over Mecca is achieved˺,

quran.ayah_ar: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًۭا
quran.ayah_en: and you ˹O Prophet˺ see the people embracing Allah’s Way in crowds,

quran.ayah_ar: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
quran.ayah_en: then glorify the praises of your Lord and seek His forgiveness, for certainly He is ever Accepting of Repentance.

quran.ayah_ar: تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍۢ وَتَبَّ
quran.ayah_en: May the hands of Abu Lahab perish, and he ˹himself˺ perish!

quran.ayah_ar: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
quran.ayah_en: Neither his wealth nor ˹worldly˺ gains will benefit him.

quran.ayah_ar: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًۭا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍۢ
quran.ayah_en: He will burn in a flaming Fire,

quran.ayah_ar: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلْحَطَبِ
quran.ayah_en: and ˹so will˺ his wife, the carrier of ˹thorny˺ kindling,

quran.ayah_ar: فِى جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌۭ مِّن مَّسَدٍۭ
quran.ayah_en: around her neck will be a rope of palm-fibre.

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “He is Allah—One ˹and Indivisible˺;

quran.ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ
quran.ayah_en: Allah—the Sustainer ˹needed by all˺.

quran.ayah_ar: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
quran.ayah_en: He has never had offspring, nor was He born.

quran.ayah_ar: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ
quran.ayah_en: And there is none comparable to Him.”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I seek refuge in the Lord of the daybreak

quran.ayah_ar: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
quran.ayah_en: from the evil of whatever He has created,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
quran.ayah_en: and from the evil of the night when it grows dark,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ
quran.ayah_en: and from the evil of those ˹witches casting spells by˺ blowing onto knots,

quran.ayah_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
quran.ayah_en: and from the evil of an envier when they envy.”

quran.ayah_ar: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ
quran.ayah_en: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I seek refuge in the Lord of humankind,

quran.ayah_ar: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ
quran.ayah_en: the Master of humankind,

quran.ayah_ar: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ
quran.ayah_en: the God of humankind,

quran.ayah_ar: مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ
quran.ayah_en: from the evil of the lurking whisperer—

quran.ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
quran.ayah_en: who whispers into the hearts of humankind—

quran.ayah_ar: مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
quran.ayah_en: from among jinn and humankind.”
